channel.description: Recent content in Strategy on Game Vibe

item.title: Alchemy Factory
item.description: Game Description Alchemy Factory is a large-scale project that turns the mystical art of alchemy into a well-functioning production mechanism. A novice adept of magical sciences comes under the control of the gamer, who will have to go from a modest shop owner to the head of an entire industrial empire. The company specializes in the creation of potions, metal processing and jewelry making. The main goal is to transform manual labor into a completely self-sufficient system, operating with virtually no intervention, where all processes from grinding herbs to transmuting ore into the Philosopher’s Stone are performed automatically.

item.title: I Sell Lemonade
item.description: Game Description I Sell Lemonade is a story about a 1980s summer spent on the sidewalk with a pitcher of soft drink. At the center of the story is a 10-year-old child who, after his father sells his gaming console, is forced to look for something to do on the street. An activity initially conceived as a way to pass the time gradually turns into an extended journey through childhood experiences, friendships and character formation.

item.title: Drill Rift
item.description: Game Description Drill Rift is a constant balancing act between survival and complete failure while managing a remote drilling outpost. Diving into a mysterious rift is fraught with enormous risk, as the process of drilling into ever deeper layers of rock inexorably affects the minds of the dwarves. The growing insanity serves as a kind of beacon for monsters hiding in the impenetrable darkness of the dungeons, turning every foray into a deadly undertaking.

item.title: Mamon King
item.description: Game Description Mamon King is a creature breeding simulator where the tactical depth of confrontations is determined by the unique abilities of each monster. Turn-based duels in the 1v1 format are built on a team basis, where the timely use of skills decides the outcome of the match. Activating skills requires the expenditure of special energy, and the use of the most powerful techniques can require serious sacrifices from the creatures, which adds an element of calculated risk to battles.

item.title: Death Howl
item.description: Game Description Death Howl is a tactical card roguelike with soulslike elements, where battles with otherworldly entities take place in arenas divided into square cells. Each move requires informed decisions, because the outcome of the fight depends on the correct use of cards with attacking and defensive skills. You will have to confront not only ordinary spirits, but also powerful bosses, defeating which will require a deep understanding of their behavior.

item.title: Dissimilar
item.description: Game Description Set in an ancient castle with futuristic technology, Dissimilar challenges players to unravel long-forgotten mysteries. The basis of the entire process is navigation through the labyrinths of the citadel called the Vault. Filled with high-tech gadgets and robots, this place stands in stark contrast to its ancient walls. Success in passing depends not only on victories in turn-based encounters, but also on careful study of the environment. Fully hand-rendered visuals combined with a soundtrack that mixes orchestral and synth music create a unique atmosphere.

item.title: Keep the Heroes Out
item.description: Game Description Keep the Heroes Out is an asymmetrical cooperative strategy game, an adaptation of the board game of the same name for 1-4 people. The entire gameplay is based on protecting the dungeon from the attacks of self-proclaimed heroes seeking to plunder the treasury. Participants will take control of monsters, each of which has a unique set of abilities and a starting deck of cards. Effective interaction and clever combination of monster skills, performing roles from crowd control to support, becomes the key to success in solving constantly changing tactical puzzles.

item.title: MineMogul
item.description: Game Description MineMogul is an opportunity to design and build a giant industrial complex in the bowels of the earth, where the main task is to tame chaos. The process is constantly complicated by unpredictable failures caused by a realistic physical model, which forces us to constantly search for creative solutions to keep the mechanisms working. The action takes place in a mysterious, deserted cave system, among the ruins of abandoned mining operations.

item.title: Eufloria Classic
item.description: Game Description Eufloria Classic is a strategic project whose main goal is to colonize asteroids with the help of living organisms. The basis of expansion is the cultivation of special units called seedlings, whose production is established on unique Dyson trees. The essence of the process is to direct a swarm of these creatures towards hostile asteroids. Their task is to reach the core of a celestial body and subjugate it, which requires refined tactical maneuvers and competent distribution of available resources.

item.title: Photographer's Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Photographers Life Simulator is about turning a dream into a successful business, where the initial capital consists only of an old camera and ambitions. The main goal is to establish the most reputable photography studio in the city, leaving its mark on history. The protagonist must find a delicate balance between creative fulfillment and commercial gain while managing all aspects of the enterprise. All processes are under full control: from fulfilling orders for portrait photography to creating thematic albums and providing printing services.

item.title: Toy Smash Kaboom!
item.description: Game Description Toy Smash Kaboom! is a hybrid project that combines elements of spatial organization, auto-battler and physical clashes. The playing field is a littered table on which you will have to command armies of animated toys. Squads are managed through a backpack-like inventory system, where each slot has strategic importance for the outcome of the upcoming battle. The troops can be led by unique captains, such as the Chef Doll, who specializes in defense, or Doctor Hamster, who relies on the numerical superiority of his charges.

item.title: Wild Growth
item.description: Game Description Wild Growth is an incremental action game in which the main goal is to maintain the combat effectiveness of the squad in the harsh world of Scandinavian myths. All responsibility for the survival of the allies falls on the shoulders of the protagonist, acting as a healer. The process of restoring the health of teammates is carried out through the use of healing spells activated by mouse clicks. The outcome of any clash with the enemy directly depends on the timeliness of these actions.

item.title: Air Defender
item.description: Game Description Air Defender is a strategic command simulator that puts full responsibility for the safety of the nation’s airspace on the user’s shoulders. Gameplay focuses on making critical decisions under time pressure when an unidentified contact appears on the radar. It is necessary to quickly determine its nature, distinguishing a civilian aircraft from a real threat, and, if necessary, issue orders for the departure of duty fighters. Every action has far-reaching consequences, and the cost of a mistake can be catastrophic for the entire country.

item.title: Super Cabbage Kabumi
item.description: Game Description Super Cabbage Kabumi is a roguelike game that focuses on creating unique builds of items and pets for maximum efficiency. The central element of the gameplay is the process of collecting artifacts, whose properties can be combined to produce unpredictable and powerful effects. Unlockable companions have a significant impact on the passage. These creatures have unique abilities that can, for example, modify the speed of a projectile or change the reaction of targets to interaction.

item.title: GLONK
item.description: Game Description GLONK is an incremental project in which the entire gameplay is built around feeding the creature of the same name. The central task is to constantly provide the pet with food for its subsequent increase in size, which directly affects financial well-being. The viability and continuous growth of the ward is the only source of income, so maintaining his health becomes a paramount task for accumulating gold. Successfully nurturing one creature opens up the opportunity to have several more, thereby scaling up profits and accelerating advancement to new levels.

item.title: FrostBound
item.description: Game Description FrostBound is a roguelike project with elements of card strategy and tower defense, where the main task is to repel endless enemy attacks in permafrost conditions. In each round, you need to make tactical decisions: attack the enemy or deploy new troops on the battlefield. A feature of the battles is the harsh climate, forcing most fighters to retreat after just one turn. Only the most resilient warriors and durable buildings are able to withstand the onslaught and continue the battle.

item.title: Veterum
item.description: Game Description Veterum is a turn-based tactical strategy with role-playing elements, the success of which directly depends on many interrelated factors. The detailed combat system forces you to take into account not only the relative position of the units, but also such parameters as morale, accumulated fatigue, the direction of the fighters' gaze, and even the level of illumination of each cell. The environment is fully interactive: you can build barricades, dig ditches, or freeze rivers to create crossings.

item.title: Holder of Place
item.description: Game Description Holder of Place is a dark sci-fi roguelike auto battler where the main task is to gather a squad of unique followers to confront an ancient evil. Each playthrough takes the wanderer deep into a dying world, offering a series of intense combat encounters and opportunities for strategic choice. The process comes down to a set of various follower cards and their location in the squad. After this, all that remains is to watch the automatic battles with waves of enemies, whose strength is constantly increasing.

item.title: Apes Warfare
item.description: Game Description Apes Warfare is a turn-based tactical strategy game that pits squads of armed primates against human armies on compact, caged battlefields. Success in a confrontation depends on the competent management of resources, synergy between different types of troops and the skillful use of landscape features that can provide a tactical advantage. Under the command of the gamer are not just monkeys, but full-fledged combat units with an impressive arsenal, including heavy armored vehicles, aviation and even naval forces.

item.title: Luna and Sol: Nightmare Ward
item.description: Game Description Luna and Sol: Nightmare Ward is a strategic project in which each new playthrough poses unique tactical challenges to the gamer. The core of the gameplay is constant adaptation to increasing challenges, requiring refined skills and flexible thinking. To enhance your capabilities during battles, you will have to collect over 100 different relics, the combinations of which provide access to unique fighting styles. Even defeat does not mean the end, since the guardian of dreams becomes stronger after each failure, which allows him to overcome increasingly difficult challenges and build a perfect line of defense against monsters.

item.title: Red Rogue Sea
item.description: Game Description Red Rogue Sea becomes a real test of strength for gamers, as the project sends him to a harsh archipelago full of risky decisions and dangers. Each journey takes you through a procedurally generated map, with ports, pirate lairs and castaways encountered between battles. Interacting with local adventurers, merchants, and commoners trying to survive shapes the captain’s reputation. The decisions you make directly affect the development of the plot, opening or permanently closing certain opportunities and plot branches.

item.title: Cross Blitz
item.description: Game Description Cross Blitz is a strategic role-playing adventure game that combines tactical combat and card collecting. Gamers participate in battles using various cards, each of which has unique abilities and synergies. The project features many heroes, each of which has its own playstyle and story campaigns. These heroes can be customized with different deck archetypes, allowing for a variety of strategies and gameplay. In Cross Blitz, gamers explore different regions, encountering different challenges and enemies.

item.title: Hunter's Moon: A Sovereign Syndicate Adventure
item.description: Game Description Hunters Moon: A Sovereign Syndicate Adventure is a card-based roguelike with fantasy elements, set in a Victorian steampunk world plagued by a mysterious plague. Each playthrough is unique, and to achieve success you need to study the habits and tactics of your opponents. Battles with dangerous creatures and formidable bosses take place in a step-by-step mode on city streets and in dark forests. Regardless of the outcome of the mission, be it success or retreat, the collected money, relics and materials are used to improve the agents and their airship.

item.title: Sit-Back Attack
item.description: Game Description Sit-Back Attack is a strategic Idle-RPG, where the central place is given to the detailed customization of the battle group and the selection of unique combinations of skills. You take control of a squad of four heroes who must be led through battles with more than 300 types of monsters and elite bosses. The project offers enormous variety in character development, allowing access to 60 different classes and over 500 skills, creating thousands of possible builds.

item.title: Galaxy Princess Zorana
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Princess Zorana is a strategic life simulator, the main task of which is to conquer the throne of the Heavenly Empire after the sudden death of your father. The previously carefree life of the second heir to the throne, known for her love of beautiful shoes and pets, is changing dramatically. After the death of his mother and the betrayal of his brother, who was considered a prince, the emperor disappears under mysterious circumstances.

item.title: Maktala: Slime Lootfest
item.description: Game Description Maktala: Slime Lootfest is an incremental project in which each battle opens up new ways to destroy countless hordes of opponents. To fine-tune and improve your character, a system for mining ore and processing precious stones is provided, allowing you to adapt the style of play to your liking. Significant support in battles is provided by a faithful archer, who independently enters the battle and exterminates enemies, being next to the main character.

item.title: Berserk B.I.T.S
item.description: Game Description Berserk BITS is a hybrid project that invites you to take on the role of a network detective. The main goal is to uncover the conspiracy behind a series of virus attacks that are shaking cyberspace. Progress along the storyline occurs through completing tasks received from email. During the investigations, you will explore a variety of digital biomes, fighting viruses and defeating powerful bosses. A key ally in this mission is a personal digital companion named B.

item.title: Dictator Simulator: Gradnar
item.description: Game Description Dictator Simulator: Gradnar is a political simulator where the government of the fictional Eastern European state of Gradnar is associated with the constant threat of a coup. In the role of dictator Vyslan Gatskolki will have to determine the fate of an entire nation, maneuvering between the democratic vector of development and harsh autocracy. Each decision directly affects key indicators, including the economy, army loyalty and party support. Neglect of these systems inevitably leads to the overthrow of the regime.

item.title: Fantasy Monster Hunt
item.description: Game Description Fantasy Monster Hunt is a fast-paced action game where the main goal is to hold off countless enemies over short session matches. The character development system is based on gaining experience points for each defeated enemy. Reaching a new level opens access to power-up cards, which can significantly strengthen the combat capabilities of the selected warrior. What gives depth to the tactical process is the interaction between different abilities.

item.title: HoloCafe
item.description: Game Description HoloCafe is a management simulator in which the player takes on the role of a manager and saves a small establishment from ruin. The plot takes place in an alternate universe, where instead of a VTuber agency, a cafe was opened, but the business quickly fell into disrepair. When the situation began to seem hopeless, virtual idols appear from a mysterious portal, ready to help restore business. The gamer has at his disposal a staff of 17 talents representing the Japanese, English and Indonesian divisions of Hololive.

item.title: SIDE EFFECTS
item.description: Game Description SIDE EFFECTS is a brutal pharmaceutical experiment turned into a deadly survival game. Participants play the role of test subjects caught in the middle of a failed clinical trial. They will have to plunge into the oppressive atmosphere of psychological horror, where hallucinations are indistinguishable from reality. The only goal is to outlast your opponent by taking one dose after another. The basis of the gameplay is turn-based roulette with tablets.

item.title: Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road
item.description: Game Description Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road means constantly fighting, strengthening and collecting resources on a desperate journey to the saving Arch. The basis of all gameplay is the defense of a constantly moving fortified city, which represents the last stronghold of civilization. On his way, merciless hordes of monsters stand in their way, seeking to wipe out this mobile shelter from the face of the earth. Survival directly depends on the ability to repel attacks from both small monsters and giant bosses that threaten the integrity of the tower.

item.title: Typhon: Bot vs Bot
item.description: Game Description Typhon: Bot vs Bot is a sci-fi tactical strategy game where you need to masterfully write Python scripts to defeat your opponents. Autonomous mechs are controlled through the creation of unique behavior algorithms that determine all actions of combat vehicles. It is the program code that becomes the main weapon responsible for navigation, combat and the execution of complex missions in real time. The main goal is to outwit your opponent by developing better and more adaptive logic for your mechanized forces on the battlefield.

item.title: WAR RATS: The Rat em Up
item.description: Game Description WAR RATS: The Rat em Up depicts the Great Rat War, plunging gamers into conflict with armies of TechnoRats. In this world inhabited exclusively by rats, the TechnoRat entity, a unified consciousness of cyborg rodents, seeks to consume all organic matter and turn it into metal structures. The gameplay features side-scrolling combat where you must fight alongside hired troops to reclaim the land of Ratopia. The task is to push back enemy forces and seize a bridgehead at the enemy base.

item.title: Xenopurge
item.description: Game Description Xenopurge puts you in the role of a Commander, controlling an elite squad from a remote command center. The main task is to eliminate aliens through indirect orders through the interfaces of several monitors. You will plan routes for fighters, set their priorities and determine tactics before they enter the combat zone. The team’s survival depends on this strategy and preparation, as you will have few direct ways to influence events once the operation begins.

item.title: Asbury Pines
item.description: Game Description Asbury Pines is a narrative incremental title where, in order to solve the mystery of a brutal murder, it is necessary to build production cycles that span the entire history of the town. The gameplay is based on the synthesis of the efforts of more than 50 unique creatures, artifacts and even plants. The union of the labor of such dissimilar personalities as the caveman Hrokk and the temporal physicist Moharan makes it possible to create and modify a complex mechanism for extracting resources.

item.title: Christmas Story
item.description: Game Description Christmas Story not only creates a deceptive feeling of festive warmth, but also immerses you in a chilling story where the line between fiction and reality is rapidly blurring. The narrative is transformed under the influence of the actions and choices of the gamer himself, turning a cozy Christmas night into a real nightmare. The symbols of the holiday familiar from childhood take on sinister features, and the crackling of wood in the fireplace gives way to oppressive silence.

item.title: Demonschool
item.description: Game Description Demonschool brings a new twist to tactical RPGs by making movement the core of your strategy. You lead Faye and her team through trials that blur the lines between the human and demon worlds. All this happens on a mysterious island where school life takes a demonic turn. A key mechanic allows you to rewind actions while planning, creating complex combos to defeat pesky enemies. This rewind feature adds a layer of challenge, forcing you to strategize like a chess grandmaster to outsmart your enemies.

item.title: SpaceBourne 2
item.description: Game Description The events of SpaceBourne 2 begin from the end of the first part, only now the player needs to build his own space empire and develop it in all directions. However, there is no need to rush with this global task. The game world is completely open to exploration of each solar system, where the user can first become famous or, on the contrary, become an enemy, and then make it easier for themselves to establish diplomatic relations.

item.title: Abra-Cooking-Dabra
item.description: Game Description Abra-Cooking-Dabra is a cozy card simulator with puzzle and management elements, which takes place in the kitchen of a mysterious castle. The player finds himself in the role of a new chef in a fantasy land who faces severe punishment for accidentally destroying an old recipe book. This book was vital to the coming Royal Feast, and now the only way is to restore the lost formulas of outlandish British cuisine.

item.title: ANIWARS: Call of the Void
item.description: Game Description ANIWARS: Call of the Void is a turn-based strategy game set in a world ravaged by endless and violent conflict. The global confrontation between three dominant factions creates an arena for intense tactical battles, where every move is critical to the outcome of the battle. Victory in these clashes requires the commander to carefully plan his actions and wisely use all available resources provided by the harsh reality of this world.

item.title: Dungeons and Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Dungeons and Kingdoms is a hybrid project that combines the features of a kingdom management simulator and role-playing action game with dungeon exploration. The advancement of technology and the overall prosperity of the settlement directly depend on bold forays into dangerous locations. Adventurers will have to descend into ancient ruins and temples filled with ferocious monsters. Battles with opponents, including powerful bosses, take place in third-person action format. Victory over enemies is rewarded with valuable resources necessary for the technological development of the entire kingdom, as well as for protecting roads from bandits.

item.title: Interstellar Espionage Inc.
item.description: Game Description Interstellar Espionage Inc., a strategy and management simulator, focuses on running an interstellar spy agency. The main task is to methodically ruin competing companies through industrial espionage. To do this, you need to explore a procedurally generated universe, find vulnerabilities in information security and strategically sell the obtained information to direct competitors. Each mission is designed for short sessions, allowing you to complete a full game in a relatively short period of time, which makes the gameplay accessible for regular visits.

item.title: Crownbound - Fantasy Kingdom Sim
item.description: Game Description Crownbound - Fantasy Kingdom Sim, whose central mechanic is the indirect control of subjects, immerses you in a world where adventurers have their own will. Warriors, mages, robbers and clerics roam the lands freely, guided by personal goals, fears and ambitions. These heroes are not faceless units; They gain experience in battles, discovering new skills and combat techniques. In their travels, they can find legendary swords and enchanted staves, but none of them are immune from permanent death.

item.title: Shelldiver
item.description: Game Description Shelldiver immerses you in exploring a vast ocean filled with unique biomes, from volcanic waters to crystalline caves. Instead of linear development, a branched skill tree is offered, which allows you to customize expeditions in detail to suit your own style of passage, focusing on the speed of collection or the depth of research. All these improvements serve one purpose - the development of an unusual business founded by an elderly turtle.

item.title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
item.description: Game Description Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite, a retro-stylized roguelike shooter that immerses you in the atmosphere of classic arcade games and invites you to take control of a spaceship to clear endless asteroid fields. The main task is to methodically destroy waves of space debris filling hostile space. Gamers will have to not only dodge countless threats, but also conduct targeted fire, turning chaotic clusters into valuable resources for further development.

item.title: Midnight Study
item.description: Game Description Midnight Study is a card-based roguelike horror game in which four high school girls must take back control of a school overrun by vengeful ghosts. You control four heroines, each of whom has a unique fighting style: archer Haneul, kendo master Sumi, chemist Arin and athlete Mirae. Their shared shamanic power allows them to use special talismans in battle. The project’s combat system is based on launching projectiles that ricochet off walls and other objects to hit placed amulets and drive out enemies blocking the path.

item.title: Soba's Gunpaw
item.description: Game Description Sobas Gunpaw is a dynamic action game in the style of Bullet Heaven, where survival directly depends on the constant and systematic strengthening of the protagonist. At the heart of it all is an extensive skill system that provides access to numerous character upgrades. The progression process is built on the cyclical destruction of everything on the screen, which allows you to accumulate valuable assets. It is these materials collected from defeated enemies that open new branches in the branched tree of talents.

item.title: DEFRAG
item.description: Game Description DEFRAG becomes a real optimization test for the gamer, since the project requires a careful approach to creating an effective system. The goal is to eliminate digital viruses that have infected system sectors. To achieve success, you will have to collect the resources necessary to strengthen the nodes. Combining these elements allows you to discover new fighting styles, which adds variety to the passage. The effectiveness of weapons is customized using special modules that form the basis for unique assemblies.

item.title: Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed
item.description: Game Description Indies' Lies 2: Fire Seed is a 2D tactical roguelike where controlling a squad of three heroes becomes a chess match in an ever-changing arena. Every turn requires careful decisions, whether it’s eliminating healers or interrupting attacks from elite opponents. Terrain becomes a full-fledged weapon, allowing you to separate enemy forces and lure bosses into traps. Success depends on the right combination of character skills, such as Qili’s positional combinations, Diego’s counterattack ambushes, or Daniel’s explosions that spread negative effects.

item.title: Rue Valley
item.description: Game Description Rue Valley plunges into the depths of human consciousness, allowing you to live countless lives in the body of one person. Each new cycle of a temporary anomaly becomes a chance to radically change the protagonist’s personality. Yesterday’s cold-blooded loner, inclined to analyze everything, the next day can turn into an expressive melancholic, trusting only instincts. These constant metamorphoses are not just an experiment, but the only tool for unraveling the mystery that holds the hero in an endless day and forces him to fight the shadows of his own mind.

item.title: A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition
item.description: Game Description A Planet of Mine MasterMine Edition is a comprehensive 4X strategy game in which the process of conquering space begins with detailed customization of the universe itself. Players are given the opportunity to set parameters for a procedurally generated star system, determining the type of sun, the number of planets and the distance to them. The path to dominance can lie through diplomacy, trade or open military clashes, and the conflict can be ended either by the complete defeat of the opponent or by signing a peace treaty.

item.title: Cyber ​​Shard Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cyber ​​Shard Clicker is an incremental project that focuses on strategic development and constant enhancement of hacking capabilities. The central element of the entire progression system is a branched skill tree, offering tactical choices between immediate improvements and permanent bonuses. The latter guarantee a significant advantage in future hacking attempts. The resource for acquiring new skills are data fragments obtained in the process of destroying geometric defense systems. Each click turns into a pulse of digital destruction, aimed at destroying enemy polygonal shields, cubic guards and triangular drones.

item.title: Million Depth
item.description: Game Description Million Depth offers a unique tactical experience where survival is directly dependent on the ability to manage time. The main character, Moma, has a device known as a biotope jammer, which allows her to completely freeze a moment while she herself remains motionless. This mechanic becomes the basis of the combat system: dangerous creatures hiding in the shadows of dungeons make their move only after the actions of the protagonist.

item.title: Swords and Sandals 3 Redux
item.description: Game Description Swords and Sandals 3 Redux plunges fighters into a world of merciless combat, where cutting off limbs does not mean inevitable defeat, but only strengthens the will to win. Turn-based battles in the Gladiae Ultratus arena, taking place both one-on-one and in teams of two, set the goal for the gladiator to defeat 24 legendary champions of the Brandor universe. The path to glory runs through seven deadly locations, from the eerie depths of the Bone Pit to the dizzying heights of the Tower of Vertigo.

item.title: Wall World 2
item.description: Game Description Wall World 2 continues the exploration of the vertical world. Players will control a complex spider robot as they delve into procedurally generated mines to mine resources and search for lost artifacts. The machine and its pilot will have to fight hostile organisms inhabiting the dark depths of the structure. Each expedition aims to discover forgotten technologies and uncover the fundamental secrets hidden within this massive structure. The entire experience is focused on survival, managing supplies, and battling the horrors that lurk in the darkness.

item.title: Wartorn
item.description: Game Description Wartorn follows the journey of sisters Yara and Elani, who have been exiled from their home and must traverse a world riven by conflict. They lead a caravan through the Talaura Islands, seeking safety in their ancestral fortress, Beinun. The expedition involves controlling a squad of fantastic creatures in numerous battles in real time. Along the way, they must also find lost relatives to piece together their story. The player’s actions determine the survival of this group in a hostile environment.

item.title: Below the Crown
item.description: Game Description Below the Crown takes you on a retro adventure where a deep secret lurks behind the façade of a treasure hunt. Periodic glitches on the screen interrupt the process, prompting you to take psychological tests. The answers to these questions gradually reveal the true background of the events, in the center of which is a powerful wizard, forced to go down into the dungeons. His main mission is to mine gold for the Emperor using unusual tactical skills.

item.title: Delicious - The First Course
item.description: Game Description Delicious - The First Course is a culinary time management adventure where the main goal is to help Emily establish her career. The passage process is based on timely service to visitors, whose patience is strictly limited. Orders include both prepared foods and dishes that require timed preparation, which introduces an element of multitasking to the mechanics. The storyline is dedicated to the origins of the protagonist’s professional path, revealing her first steps in the restaurant business.

item.title: Die For The Lich
item.description: Game Description Die For The Lich is a dark journey whose ultimate goal is the throne of the powerful Lich. The path to it is blocked by mythical monsters that came straight from classical folklore, among which there are Strigoi and Vetals. Each attempt to break through the darkness becomes a unique test, since death here is not the end, but only the beginning of a new, unique journey. The hero will have to rise from defeat over and over again, adapting his strategy and becoming stronger with each new cycle.

item.title: HoloSeeker
item.description: Game Description HoloSeeker is a card roguelike with RPG elements, the main goal of which is to conquer the adventure map with the help of a well-built deck. Players will have to choose one of four available characters, each of which has its own fighting style. Initially, only Usada Pekora is available, using the Carrot accumulation mechanic to gain an advantage. As you progress, other talents are unlocked: Nekomata Okayu, who relies on high evasion with low defense, Takanashi Kiara, who is able to revive after death thanks to Phoenix Feathers, as well as the FuwaMoco duo, which accumulates the Mischief Stock resource to play powerful cards.

item.title: Siegeturtle
item.description: Game Description Siegeturtle is a role-playing project with roguelite and auto-battler elements, which tells the story of the journey of a lonely turtle who is desperately trying to return home. The main character is a creature armed with a cannon, making its way through enemy waves in endless and ever-changing swims. Each new run brings fresh upgrades, teammates and loot, creating a cozy atmosphere and a sense of unstoppable power. At the heart of the story is a metaphor for personal growth, where strength is found through the bonds of friendship formed over a long and dangerous journey.

item.title: Surviving Mars: Relaunched
item.description: Game Description Surviving Mars: Relaunched invites players to lead not just a survival mission, but the process of establishing an entire civilization on a hostile planet. The key task is to form an independent Martian society, free from terrestrial influence. Through a new system called the Martian Assembly, political factions within the colony will be managed. Settlers will make their own demands and adhere to certain ideologies, which will force them to make laws and develop long-term development strategies, balancing between different interest groups.

item.title: Yes, My Queen
item.description: Game Description Yes, My Queen is a tactical strategy game where magic and absurd tricks break the canonical rules of chess. To break free from captivity, you will have to defeat a chain of opponents in a series of fights, whose power is constantly increasing, which will require both a sharp mind and a willingness to disregard the foundations. There are over forty different cards at your disposal, the use of which can radically change the situation on the board.

item.title: Drill Bird
item.description: Game Description Drill Bird invites you to immerse yourself in a world where every foray underground is critical. As darkness falls, the depths become filled with danger, forcing you to rush back to the safety of your nest. This story of survival and care is told without a single word, creating a special atmosphere in which comfort is mixed with constant tension. Every decision made directly affects the outcome, because time is running out inexorably, and the creatures waiting in the darkness do not forgive mistakes, turning each expedition into a risky undertaking.

item.title: Dragon Front: Adventures
item.description: Game Description Set in an unusual blend of fantasy and World War II aesthetics, Dragon Front: Adventures offers a deep tactical turn-based roguelike experience. This project is an ideological development of the universe previously presented in virtual reality format, and significantly expands the familiar setting with new conflicts. The gameplay is based on the concept of a tense confrontation, reminiscent of a tug of war, where every decision on the battlefield directly affects the shift of the front line.

item.title: Inn Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Inn Tycoon offers relaxation. Forget about the hustle and bustle of modern life. This adventure game will take you back to simpler times, where running an inn is the main event. No stress, no deadlines, just you and your virtual business. The gameplay is focused on managing the inn. You hire staff, decorate rooms and serve clients. It’s a simple concept done with a soft touch. No complex systems or mind-blowing tasks.

item.title: Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics
item.description: Game Description Line Clipper: Tennis Tactics is a tactical tennis simulator in which the outcome of the match is decided not by the speed of reaction, but by the depth of strategic planning. The gameplay is based on a turn-based system that encourages you to focus on analyzing your opponent’s playing style to gain a decisive advantage. A key mechanic is the ability to line up the perfect shot and pre-simulate its outcome before committing to the action on the court.

item.title: Mercantile Might
item.description: Game Description Mercantile Might is a detailed ruler simulator that asks you to take control of a small medieval settlement and lead it to prosperity through competent strategic planning. The basis for future greatness is social institutions, because it is a strong system of health care, education and law and order that distinguishes a great city from a simple settlement. The creation of a developed healthcare and education system allows not only to improve the quality of life of citizens and ensure the stability of the population, but also to accelerate technological progress.

item.title: Reentry - An Orbital Simulator
item.description: Game Description Reentry - An Orbital Simulator will tell about the everyday life of real astronauts participating in space programs. The game presents models of real vehicles that have ever left our planet. Having created your astronaut, manage his career and each flight. Each completed task will bring experience. Among these there will be both operations already written into history, and fictional ones that are designed to give the player a feel for themselves in unprecedented circumstances.

item.title: Restaurants
item.description: Game Description Restaurats is a medieval restaurant management simulator where the main characters are a team of resourceful rats. Gamers will have to take full control over all aspects of running a business in a fantasy world. The process includes not only preparing dishes according to a variety of recipes, but also submitting orders on time, as well as maintaining order on the tables. The development of the establishment occurs gradually, opening up access to new drawings to expand the tavern and improve its functionality.

item.title: Tiny Auto Knights
item.description: Game Description Tiny Auto Knights is a deep tactical challenge where the main goal is to survive for as many rounds as possible. The key to success is the ability to assemble a combat-ready team, wisely combining the unique effects of more than 50 available characters. The key mechanic is the merging of identical fighters, which allows you to raise them to level 3 and mark them with a gold star.

item.title: Bloodgrounds
item.description: Game Description Bloodgrounds is a tactical roguelike where every battle in the arena could be the gladiator’s last. Turn-based battles take place on a grid map, requiring the commander to wisely spend action points on movement and attacks. Using class abilities, setting traps, and using consumable items such as potions or scrolls becomes the key to survival. After defeating an enemy fighter, you have to make a choice: show mercy by adding a new warrior to your squad, or execute him for the amusement of a bloodthirsty public, receiving more generous rewards in return.

item.title: Click to Civ
item.description: Game Description Click to Civ is an incremental strategy game where the main goal is to help crashed aliens. The plot revolves around the emergency landing of their ship on prehistoric Earth, where the survivors find themselves surrounded by primitive tribes. The only way to return home is to accelerate the evolution of humanity, taking it from stone tools to interstellar technology. The basis of progress are special signs of civilization, obtained from the destruction of ancient monoliths.

item.title: Dark Quest 4
item.description: Game Description Dark Quest 4 plunges you into a dark fantasy world where monstrous legions under the command of the puppet of the evil sorcerer Gulak kidnap civilians, spreading fear and despair. Only a squad of brave champions is able to put an end to this terror, challenging the forces of darkness. Battles take place in a turn-based tactical mode, requiring gamers to carefully plan every action on a grid map.

item.title: DOG WITCH
item.description: Game Description DOG WITCH is a tactical roguelike that immerses you in an absurd world filled with bizarre opponents. On the way, you’ll encounter heavily armed nesting dolls, vengeful Koto-Ladies, and even dubious milk vending machines. Each encounter with these enemies is a puzzle that requires careful planning and adaptation to constantly changing battle conditions. The hero will have to overcome the consequences of a curse imposed by carelessly drinking a potion from a mysterious wizard.

item.title: There Are No Orcs
item.description: Game Description There Are No Orcs plunges you into a world of total war and continuous battles, where huge armies clash on the battlefields. Battles take place in four different biomes, from scorched lands to frozen tundra, requiring the commander to adapt tactics to the conditions of the terrain. In this chaos of large-scale clashes, the commander will have to lead his legions to victory. At the same time, one detail unites all warriors, regardless of their origin - a strange green shade of skin, the reasons for which are not usually discussed in this world.

item.title: Whiskerwood
item.description: Game Description Whiskerwood is a city-building simulator where industrious mice have to found a colony under the yoke of feline overlords. Space on the islands is limited, so the development of the settlement is directed not only in breadth, but also deep into the rocks and up to the skies. Verticality becomes a key element, forcing the construction of complex networks of conveyors, elevators and pipelines to transport resources and provide residents with everything they need.

item.title: Dice Dice Baby
item.description: Game Description Dice Dice Baby is a gambling roguelike where the main goal is to deceive the casino using special dice. To beat the establishment, you have to not just rely on luck, but actively change the rules in your favor. Dozens of types of special dice with unique properties and more than 100 amulets that provide access to dishonest strategies and the creation of powerful builds help with this.

item.title: Generation Exile
item.description: Game Description Generation Exile offers an atypical take on the city-building simulation genre. Instead of developing new territories and endless mining, we have to find a balance in a closed system. Progress is to create closed cycles where biological waste is transformed into nutrients or raw materials for bioplastics using anaerobic reactors. Each step in this step-by-step project requires careful planning of resources, since they cannot be replenished from the outside, and the goal is sustainability, not endless growth.

item.title: The Fable: Manga Build Roguelike
item.description: Game Description The Fable: Manga Build Roguelike is a tactical project that allows you to control three unique characters with dissimilar fighting styles. The legendary killer Akira masterfully wields both firearms and melee weapons in close combat. His partner Yoko prefers surprise attacks from the shadows and high mobility to deceive opponents. A cold-blooded killer named Suzuki relies on cunning traps and weakening techniques to offer a completely different approach to combat.

item.title: SPARTA 2035
item.description: Game Description SPARTA 2035 plunges you into a brutal conflict in East Africa, where a squad of mercenaries, consisting of ordinary people with their own weaknesses and dreams, will have to defend the civilian population. They will be opposed by the extremist group Damat, which has established a brutal order. The basis of tactical confrontation is a system with two action points, allowing fighters to move and attack within the same turn.

item.title: Tavern Keeper
item.description: Game Description Tavern Keeper is a management simulator that dives into the intricacies of running a fantasy tavern. Here every little thing matters, from simulating the temperature and spoilage of food in the cellar to the likelihood of a fire from a spark from the fireplace. The success of an establishment directly depends on the ability to cope with such situations, be it a sudden illness of a cleaner or furniture breakdown in the middle of the evening.

item.title: Vivid World
item.description: Game Description Vivid World is a role-playing adventure where the souls of heroes are trapped in gems for battle in the depths of the Underworld. This demonic kingdom is ruled by the protagonist Lemuria, who has mastered the new Gems Magic to conquer procedurally generated dungeons. The basis of the gameplay is the formation of a combat squad from these crystalline creatures. Characters can be bought and sold in the jewelry store, and collecting identical gems significantly enhances their characteristics, opening up powerful combinations for tactical automatic battles.

item.title: Car Factory Empire
item.description: Game Description Car Factory Empire - testing the effectiveness of self-designed cars takes place on race tracks, where artificial intelligence acts as an opponent. However, success in the races is only part of the global struggle for market dominance. Competitors are actively fighting for control of resource-rich territories and key cities. Providing production capacity with raw materials by capturing mines and factories on the world map becomes a primary task for any aspiring industrialist.

item.title: Slaves of Magic
item.description: Game Description Slaves of Magic is a tactical project where every decision on the battlefield has enormous weight. The appearance of enemy reinforcements is heralded by purple magical seals, and over time the enemy onslaught only intensifies, becoming more frequent and powerful. The combat system, based on sequential activation of units depending on their initiative, forces you to carefully plan every step. Soldiers have action points to spend on movement and attacks, and it is critical to choose not only the correct position, but also the direction of the soldier’s gaze before completing a move.

item.title: Cats and Cups
item.description: Game Description Cats and Cups is a simulator for managing your own establishment, where the path from a simple barista to a real business tycoon requires attention to every detail. The success of the establishment directly depends on the timely modernization of equipment, which allows for significantly faster service to visitors. Good business management includes not only working behind the counter, but also constantly monitoring the stock of ingredients. Thoughtful improvements to all aspects of the cafe open up access to new, more complex recipes and allow you to turn a modest coffee shop into the most popular place in town, attracting more and more furry customers.

item.title: The Boss Gangsters: Nightlife
item.description: Game Description The Boss Gangsters Nightlife is a simulator where the path to power lies through managing shady deals and ruthlessly fighting for territory. Interaction with corrupt police officers and influential officials becomes a tool for achieving goals, and the elimination of competitors becomes a severe necessity. Every decision made shapes a reputation in the criminal world, opening up access to new opportunities or provoking brutal raids on a business. Risky black market activities, such as arms trafficking, promise quick profits, but can lead to the loss of everything.

item.title: Ramona
item.description: Game Description Ramona takes a young journalist named Samuel on a frightening journey where reality and hallucination merge. The events take place in the 1970s inside an old house, the walls of which are saturated with old secrets and deep remorse. The hero will have to plunge into the claustrophobic atmosphere of psychological horror, making the transition between light and darkness in search of truth. Each room of this ominous place becomes an arena for exploration, forcing the protagonist to confront someone else’s disturbing memories that should have been buried long ago.

item.title: Super Movie Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Super Movie Tycoon gives you the opportunity to create a unique cinematic world where every aspect of filmmaking is under your control. Creating a highly efficient film production pipeline begins with careful planning of professional departments and the development of new land. As director, screenwriter and producer, you personally create all the details of the future masterpiece, using your boundless imagination to conquer Hollywood heights. The entire process, from the initial idea to the end credits, becomes the embodiment of your creative vision.

item.title: Slot and Dungeons
item.description: Game Description Slot and Dungeons is an unusual roguelike, where each expedition into the depths of mysterious ruins begins by chance. The location of all opponents and valuable finds on the floor is determined by the mechanics of the slot machine, which is activated upon entry. This turns each playthrough into a unique challenge, forcing you to constantly adapt your tactics to the given level configuration. Survival depends on the ability to wisely manage resources that appear on the map in a random order.

item.title: Dark Moon
item.description: Game Description Dark Moon is about a near and bleak future. This time, things have become very bad for humanity, not thanks to aliens or nuclear war, but because of the Sun. A storm is raging on the star, which has disabled all equipment on Earth and provoked unrest there. On the Moon, things are even worse: the sun’s rays destroy any objects on the earth’s satellite that they manage to reach.

item.title: Earth vs Mars
item.description: Game Description Earth vs Mars is a turn-based tactical struggle for the survival of the planet, where bizarre genetic engineering becomes humanity’s main trump card. To repel the alien threat, earthly commanders use not only standard army units, but also unique hybrid super-soldiers. The creation of these creatures occurs using a special Splice-O-Tron device, which allows volunteers to be crossed with representatives of the fauna. As a result of such experiments, swift cheetah flies appear on the battlefield, capable of spraying acid on the enemy from the air, or crushing human-rhino hybrids that break through enemy defenses.

item.title: Ire: A Prologue
item.description: Game Description Ire A Prologue is a story in which a young girl named Emily confronts the relentless pursuit of a creepy creature. The events take place in 1986 on board a ship lost in the Bermuda Triangle, where every rustle could be the last. The main threat is a monster called Drugen, whose behavior does not obey predetermined scenarios, which makes every meeting with him unpredictable. To survive, the heroine must hide in the shadows, use ventilation shafts and lockers, relying on stealth and wits rather than strength.

item.title: Master of Command
item.description: Game Description Master of Command is a project in which command of the armies of the Seven Years' War is presented as a harsh struggle for survival. Resource management is becoming as important as tactical superiority on the battlefield. A commander on a procedurally generated map hidden in the fog of war is constantly faced with a dilemma: make a rapid forced march, risking running out of supplies, or make a stop to replenish supplies, giving the enemy precious time to regroup.

item.title: Decktamer
item.description: Game Description Decktamer is an adventure where every card in the deck represents a living creature, caught in combat and ready to fight by your side. The path to power lies through the creation of unique hybrids, achieved through the fusion and mutation of allies. This process allows abilities to be transferred between different creatures, opening up space for devastating combinations and unconventional tactical decisions. Each battle becomes a test not only of strategic thinking, but also of moral principles, because to gain strength you have to experiment with living beings.

item.title: Zombie God
item.description: Game Description An unusual hybrid of real-time strategy and god simulator with roguelike elements, Zombie God offers you to take control of legions of the undead. The main task is to control hordes of zombies who will have to break through the desperate defenses of the survivors. Players take on the role of an ominous deity, directing unstoppable streams of the walking dead to destroy the remnants of civilization. Each mission turns into an ironic test, where the divine will is manifested through the hungry roar of reanimated corpses, ready to crush everything in their path.

item.title: Slots and Daggers
item.description: Game Description Slots and Daggers is a retro fantasy adventure wrapped in slot machine mechanics, where each spin determines the fate of the hero in dangerous lands. The gameplay is based on the rotation of reels, the symbols on which correspond to actions in battle: attacks, the use of potions or spells. Defeating eccentric opponents that include Kul Knights and Hammer-wielding Goblins will require not only quick reflexes and luck, but also strategic thinking.

item.title: Super Fantasy Kingdom
item.description: Game Description Super Fantasy Kingdom is an exciting and addictive game where gamers will experience an exciting adventure filled with strategic gameplay and endless possibilities. With a randomly generated map and a hero at your disposal, you embark on each journey with the goal of protecting your kingdom from the relentless hordes of monsters. This survival roguelike offers a huge amount of options, allowing you to recruit over 100 different units, each with unique abilities and synergies.

item.title: Tattoo Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Tattoo Tycoon is a management simulator in which you will revive the tattoo culture in the city of Tattooga Bay, which was once its center. The protagonist, whose appearance and backstory can be created independently, gets the last remaining salon. The main task is to turn a modest studio into a thriving chain of establishments, returning the city to its former glory. This will require not only skillfully applying designs to the skin, but also building relationships with a variety of residents, among whom there are eccentric clients and problematic artists, as well as an influential businessman known as the Tycoon.

item.title: UltraGirl Alters
item.description: Game Description UltraGirl Alters is a tactical project in which the gamer controls a group of virtual idols, Alters, fighting the creations of corporate algorithms. Five girls, dressed in tokusatsu-style battle suits, confront monsters on live-streamed battlefields. The outcome of each clash is determined not only by the competent use of the heroines’ unique abilities, but also by the reaction of the audience to the actions of the commander. Accumulating SP points gives you access to ultimate attacks that can destroy entire squads of enemies or deal devastating damage to bosses.

item.title: Unbound Eternity
item.description: Game Description Unbound Eternity is a turn-based card roguelike in which players take on the role of a powerful monster. The protagonist will have to invade the mysterious lands controlled by the mysterious cult of the Eye and challenge its orders. The basis of the combat system is runes, which allow you to play cards and create powerful combinations. With their help, you can multiply damage, poison opponents, or sacrifice your own health for the sake of devastating attacks.

item.title: Battle On! Hero Academy
item.description: Game Description Battle On! Hero Academy is a strategic simulator with elements of idle mechanics, the main goal of which is to create a self-sufficient educational institution for heroes. The fundamental concept of the project is built on the principle of iteration and legacy, where the release of characters at the maximum level is not a loss, but a strategic investment in the future. Each graduate leaves behind valuable relics that are used to unlock permanent global improvements in the academy’s technology tree.

item.title: Crown and Adventure
item.description: Game Description Crown and Adventure is a project in which managing cities, appointing ministers, and issuing edicts form the basis for building a powerful dynasty. The path to dominance lies through the competent management of taxes, the development of technology and the strengthening of one’s faction, which allows one to turn captured territories into prosperous centers of power. Large-scale battles unfolding from a top-down side view make it possible to control armies numbering up to 1000 units on the screen at the same time.

item.title: Elemental: Reforged
item.description: Game Description Elemental Reforged is a reimagining of the epic fantasy saga, combining the best elements from War of Magic, Fallen Enchantress and Sorcerer King into a single project. This title offers you to lead a civilization in a world where each playthrough is unique thanks to procedurally generated maps filled with tasks and dynamically changing environments. Gamers will create their own character to lead an entire faction to dominance, using magic to terraform the land and capture mystical Shards of Power.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies: Replanted
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies Replanted is a tactical survival test where every defeat forces you to start all over again. In a special mode called Rest in Peace, players will have to face the consequences of their mistakes without the right to correct them, because the mechanics of permanent death return you to the very beginning of the journey. The conditions for completing each race are determined by the eccentric character Crazy Dave, who provides a limited and sometimes completely random set of plants for defense.

item.title: Roulette Hero
item.description: Game Description Roulette Hero is a project in which a squad of adorable animals confronts ruthless mechanical monsters, and the outcome of the battles is decided by the rotation of the roulette. Gamers will have to form a team of various animals, each of which has unique abilities. Some companions are distinguished by their attack speed, while others create impenetrable defense. The thoughtful placement of fighters on the cells of the roulette wheel and its subsequent launch activate their skills, creating powerful combinations and synergies that can turn the tide of even the most difficult fight.

item.title: The Jackbox Party Pack 11
item.description: Game Description The Jackbox Party Pack 11 is a collection of five unique party experiences that offer a fresh take on familiar formats. For the first time in the history of the series, the collection consists entirely of original concepts, abandoning the continuations of popular hits like Quiplash or Fibbage. Players will be immersed in a variety of activities, from creating absurd sound effects in Hear Say to collaborating on slaying monsters using erudition in Legends of Trivia.

item.title: This Isn't Just Tower Defense
item.description: Game Description This Isn’t Just Tower Defense is a complex system where the strategic placement of defensive structures is combined with the need to create automated production lines. To repel attacks, not only military power is required, but also a well-functioning economy. The basis of everything is the energy generated by solar fields and delivered to the towers using drones. Resources obtained from defeated enemies are processed at various factories, which is the key to constantly strengthening the defensive perimeter.

item.title: Becastled
item.description: Game Description Becastled is an indie real-time strategy game that was created over a long period of time due to many changes that the developers made. The game uses an isometric camera standard for the genre, which allows you to see all controlled territories and instantly react to events both in peacetime and during military operations. The project has only a single-player mode with a built-in list of achievements, in which rewards are given to the gamer for certain successes during the passage.

item.title: Dispatch
item.description: Game Description Dispatch takes the superhero genre and turns it on its head, placing it in the mundane yet unpredictable world of office life. Instead of fighting evil aliens or saving cities, the title follows Robert Robertson, a former superhero called Mecha Man, who is now forced to find his place in a superhero control center after his trusty mech suit is destroyed in a fight with his nemesis. So what?

item.title: Goblin Lands
item.description: Game Description Goblin Lands invites you to become the ruler of the seas in a world created using colorful 2D graphics. The journey spans 80 unique levels, distributed across 4 expansive maps, where you will encounter 24 types of islands. The seas are not empty: they are patrolled by wandering transports, and along the way there are various obstacles that require adapting tactics. For the most persistent explorers, hidden locations are provided, and the epic orchestral accompaniment emphasizes the scale of the events taking place and gives each battle a special atmosphere.

item.title: GOD FORSAKEN
item.description: Game Description GOD FORSAKEN is a dark adventure in which a handful of survivors must defy fate in a land abandoned by the gods. Having chosen his path as a mighty warrior, a mysterious warlock, an undead necromancer lord or an agile hunter, the protagonist gains a unique talent tree. Each battle against hordes of twisted monsters and powerful bosses is a test of not only reflexes, but also strategic thinking.

item.title: Spooky Express
item.description: Game Description Spooky Express is a logistics puzzle set within a spooky theme park where the main challenge is the safe transportation of some very unusual passengers. Human visitors must reach the exit while a variety of monsters pursue their goals: vampires aim for coffins and zombies for burial pits. The main difficulty is planning routes in such a way that people do not end up next to creepy travel companions.

item.title: HyperBlade 2050 - Dystopian Sports Manager
item.description: Game Description HyperBlade 2050 - Dystopian Sports Manager is a text-based sports management simulator that immerses you in the gloomy atmosphere of a dystopian Future Earth. Here, against the background of the decline of civilization, brutal sports competitions became the main entertainment for the masses, requiring incredible endurance from the participants. The gameplay is based on the fictional discipline Hyperblade, which is a hybrid of hockey, handball and roller derby. The concept for this brutal competition draws heavily from the classic 1975 film Rollerball, offering an elaborate story about life in an alternate 2050s.

item.title: Lessaria: Fantasy Kingdom Sim
item.description: Game Description Lessaria Fantasy Kingdom Sim - offers you to lead a fantasy kingdom, where wayward heroes live their own lives, often ignoring the direct instructions of the ruler. Instead of direct command of troops, all the power of the monarch is reduced to indirect influence on the actions of adventurers. Adventurers decide for themselves whether to explore ancient ruins, fight goblins, or simply hang out in a tavern. Their behavior, based on their unique character traits, makes government a challenging task that requires strategic thinking and the ability to adapt to the ever-changing circumstances in the lands of Lessaria.

item.title: Cal and Bomba
item.description: Game Description Cal and Bomba is an adventure game where you solve puzzles by programming a sequence of actions to destroy your enemies. Players will have to use logic and mathematics to defeat their opponents on the battlefield. Each mission offers a set of special tiles with actions that must be placed in a specific sequence to achieve the goal. A key mechanic is the use of percentage calculations to fine-tune the gun’s firing range, turning abstract mathematical concepts into a visual and interactive process.

item.title: Lords of Ravage
item.description: Game Description The action-adventure of the Lord of Ruin takes the player into a fictional world where he must fight powerful monsters and overcome dangerous territories. The user will take control of a powerful final boss to fight the heroes and wear them down with traps before a personal meeting. You can control a variety of wards and followers in order to preemptively tense up your opponents or kill them.

item.title: Treasure 'n Trio
item.description: Game Description Treasure ‘n Trio offers challenges that only a team of three adventurers can overcome. A warrior relies on brute force, while a nimble thief passes many dangers unharmed. The wizard in the squad has teleportation magic, which opens up new paths and allows you to change position. The gamer will have to alternately control three heroes, because none of them alone will be able to solve the riddles. Their coordinated actions are needed to interact with the environment and collect unusual treasures.

item.title: Beacon of Neyda
item.description: Game Description In Beacon of Neyda, a failed robot uprising has left the world in ruins. The last handful of humanity are trying to leave lifeless lands patrolled by hostile automata. Players will have to guide survivors through abandoned areas, building temporary fortifications to protect against mechanical threats. The main task is to organize an exodus from the dead wastelands. Each location offers a new challenge in the ongoing struggle for the future of the remaining people, forced to survive in a world under the rule of their former servants.

item.title: Dicealot
item.description: Game Description Dicealot follows Queen Guinevere as she strives to save the cursed King Arthur by leading knights through chaos-ridden Camelot. Gamers will face more than 30 types of opponents, from commoners to mythical creatures, in this unpredictable medieval world. Each run is a solo journey with permanent death, forcing you to start a new adventure from scratch. The decisions made directly affect the outcome of the mission to remove the spell that threatens the domain.

item.title: Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch
item.description: Game Description Lost Eidolons: Veil of the Witch invites gamers into a realm full of challenges and mysteries. The action takes place on a secluded island, where the main character, struggling with fragmentary memories, goes in search of clarity. This journey cannot be called simple: users are faced with a number of battles that test their strategic thinking and decision-making skills. Each encounter offers a new opportunity to interact with the game’s mechanics, allowing gamers to remain engaged in the experience.

item.title: Rise Eterna 2
item.description: Game Description Rise Eterna 2 offers you to take control of Yacht, a soldier of the Atrakian Empire, whose goal is to return the former power to his state. The story continues the narrative of the original several years later, plunging the gamer into the epicenter of a conflict for the throne between two influential houses. The situation is complicated by a mysterious third faction, hatching a plan for final retribution and weaving its own intrigues.

item.title: Runeborn
item.description: Game Description Runeborn offers turn-based combat, similar to a slot machine. Spells are activated by rotating runic columns to match symbols along five different lines. Successful combinations initiate attacks against demonic opponents. For increased control, gamers can lock up to 8 individual symbols in place while the rest of the reels spin, allowing them to build powerful streaks. This mechanic underlies all tactical encounters with Malakar’s forces. Strategy in Runeborn is based on direct customization of runic columns.

item.title: ACRES
item.description: Game Description ACRES, a strategic simulation game centered on crop production and market needs, offers a unique and engaging farming experience. Here you set out on a journey to build a successful farm, one acre at a time, by responding to market orders, upgrading equipment, and optimizing yields under time pressure. The project challenges you to thrive in an ever-evolving agricultural market. The key is to grow crops in a targeted manner.

item.title: My Card Is Better Than Your Card!
item.description: Game Description The main goal in My Card Is Better Than Your Card! — become the main duelist on the site, collecting unique decks. Gamers design cards using stickers from a catalog of over 200 options, each with its own effect. Combining multiple stickers unlocks multi-level tactics, but increases the cost of the card played. This collection of personal creations is used to challenge opponents in the neighborhood. Turn-based battles in My Card Is Better Than Your Card!

item.title: Erannorth Renaissance
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Renaissance is an RPG where every decision shapes the unfolding journey. Users move around a vast world, freely creating their own path, participating in turn-based battles and interacting with a number of unique heroes. The title combines tabletop mechanics and expansive storytelling, offering a variety of possibilities in a Renaissance-inspired setting. The characters evolve based on the choices made throughout their journey, affecting not only their personal growth, but also the world around them.

item.title: PANIK
item.description: Game Description PANIK is a puzzle game in which frightened creatures called panickers freeze in place in fear. The main task is to find an individual approach to each of them in order to calm them down and accompany them to a safe exit. Solving logical problems directly depends on the abilities of the players, among whom there are a robot, a ninja, and even a character wearing a crown. It is their unique talents that are the key to overcoming all obstacles along the way.

item.title: Deadswitch Combat
item.description: Game Description Deadswitch Combat is a fast-paced 2D side-scrolling shooter that immerses fighters in fast-paced tactical battles across a variety of maps. The project offers many competitive modes, including classic team clashes such as Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. In addition to them, more specific scenarios are also available, for example, Demolition with the installation of a bomb or Headquarters, where it is necessary to capture and hold strategic points.

item.title: Red Chaos - The Strict Order
item.description: Game Description In Red Chaos - The Strict Order, a conflict over the future of a post-apocalyptic world erupts. Power in the oasis known as the Unsullied Garden was seized by the militaristic Iron Hand group, which established totalitarian control over the survivors. They are opposed by the Resistance, which unites former military personnel and dissatisfied citizens. Their mission is to overthrow a dictatorship by relying on guerrilla tactics to counterbalance the technological might of the enemy.

item.title: STARIO: Haven Tower
item.description: Game Description STARIO: Haven Tower challenges survivors to escape a sand apocalypse by building a vertical kingdom. Led by prophecy, they strive to leave the wasteland and build a tower up to the clouds. Each new tier symbolizes progress away from the harsh Sand Zone. This structure is inhabited by settlers, whose fate directly depends on the successful expansion of the structure upward. Proper management of resources becomes the key to the survival of a community during an upswing.

item.title: Explosive Odds
item.description: Game Description Explosive Odds is a multiplayer competition where financial dominance is achieved through risky bets and the smart use of unique skills. The basis of the gameplay is the betting system, which allows you not only to increase bets in the general pot, but also to conclude side deals on the outcome of your opponents’ actions. To gain an advantage, there are tactical options such as canceling someone else’s skill, copying the last skill used, or completely upgrading your own set of abilities.

item.title: This Be Mutiny
item.description: Game Description This Be Mutiny is a tactical adventure centered around betrayal and infighting among the team. At the center of the story is a squad of 11 colorful characters united by a common goal, but everyone’s personal ambitions lead to inevitable rebellion. The gameplay is built on complex decisions, forcing the user to constantly choose which of his teammates to keep on the team and which to mercilessly throw overboard.

item.title: TORSO TENNIS
item.description: Game Description TORSO TENNIS is about creating absurd but effective combinations of body parts and tattoos for total domination on the court. Players, controlling only one torso, will have to piece together a powerful tennis mechanism capable of independently generating chain reactions. The basis of everything is a synergy system inspired by auto-battlers, where some items act as triggers to activate the effects of others. This allows you to unleash spectacular combinations, turning each match into a unique event.

item.title: Banker Simulator
item.description: Game Description Banker Simulator tasks the player with reviving a bankrupt bank. The main goal is to return profitability to the financial structure through competent management and strategic investments, overcoming economic difficulties to restore market positions. The process requires a balance between active actions and passive income, forcing you to take into account both customer needs and long-term risks. Success depends on the ability to lift an organization from the abyss and secure its place in the industry.

item.title: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith
item.description: Game Description Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith puts you in the role of a skilled blacksmith in a medieval fantasy world. It revolves around crafting weapons and armor, but there’s more to it than just forging tools. The user will have to dive into mining, explore the mines to find ore and gems, and then create items from these resources. As a blacksmith, you are constantly faced with an influx of orders from various villagers who require different equipment for their needs.

item.title: Witchy Business
item.description: Game Description Witchy Business offers you to run your own witchcraft shop. The main task is to prepare potions for a continuous flow of customers. Daily activities include fulfilling special orders, crafting magical items, and growing your enterprise. You also need to deal with troubles, for example, casting spells on thieves trying to steal coins. The ultimate goal is to successfully manage the establishment and achieve its prosperity through high-quality service and streamlined production.

item.title: Moros Protocol
item.description: Game Description Shootouts in Moros Protocol take place in a sci-fi setting where users have to face a variety of mutated monsters. The game is stylized as old-school designs drawn in pixel graphics. The gameplay is an action first-person shooter with roguelike elements. The main character is forced to confront the monsters and bandits that appeared in the universe due to the activities of two megacorporations involved in neurobiology. In the Darkverse universe, users have the opportunity to explore dark laboratory dungeons that will be formed randomly.

item.title: Antivirus PROTOCOL
item.description: Game Description Antivirus PROTOCOL opens up a digital world captured by the ubiquitous Virus, and the gamer is given the role of counter-program. The main task is the methodical extermination of hostile elements that have filled the system. The first steps involve eliminating small pests to obtain their internal components, represented by code fragments and raw data. This process of gathering resources becomes the basis for achieving the main goal - complete cleanup of the infected network.

item.title: Cubic Cosmos
item.description: Game Description Cubic Cosmos throws fighters into a deadly competition orchestrated by the goddess. The main goal is to break the endless cycle of testing. The gameplay combines roguelike deckbuilding with turn-based tactics containing tower defense elements. Gamers form an army of pawns and place them on the battlefield to confront enemy forces. Survival depends on the placement of units and the proper use of a unique card deck, and failure turns the character into a sport for the deity.

item.title: Town to City
item.description: Game Description Town to City challenges the player to transform a 19th-century Mediterranean settlement into a thriving metropolis.
