Construction without reference to a grid allows you to freely place all structures and natural elements. This way you can create both orderly areas with straight avenues and organically growing towns connected by winding paths. The placement of residential buildings, shops and infrastructure shapes the layout and functionality of a growing city.

item.title: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
item.description: Game Description eXoSpace Combat Engineer is a journey into the depths of a procedurally generated galaxy, where survival depends solely on engineering savvy and piloting skill. In the role of a bounty hunter, you will have to chart a course through unexplored sectors of space, each hyperjump in which promises unpredictable events. Fate can lead you to a research station in distress, throw you into the thick of a battle with pirates, or force you to face a moral choice - to provide assistance or engage in robbery.

item.title: Mars Attracts
item.description: Game Description Mars Attracts is about managing a theme park in which gamers take on the role of Martians from the Mars Attacks universe. The goal is to create a successful amusement park on Mars, attracting Martian visitors with thrilling rides, human exhibits, and other unique attractions. To make it more interesting, people are abducted from different periods of history to serve as central exhibits, while managing the park’s finances and maintaining order.

item.title: Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream
item.description: Game Description In Troublemaker 2: Beyond Dream, the story takes place in South Jakarta two years after the ending of the original game. The plot follows the intertwined destinies of the Parakacuk gang and the music group Beyond Dream as they pursue their own ambitions. The central conflict revolves around uncovering secrets surrounding drugs and conspiracies affecting the city’s youth. This game’s narrative combines action with elements of comedy, emotional drama and investigation.

item.title: M.A.S.S. Builder
item.description: Game Description M.A.S.S. Builder is a dynamic slasher game that allows you to completely customize your combat robot. The game allows you to create a unique Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit (in the original - Mechanical Assault Skeleton Suit, abbreviated as MASS). You have to lead an army to protect humanity from an alien invasion. Don’t let the human race be destroyed and take the lives of your people into your own hands!

item.title: Dimwood
item.description: Game Description Dimwood is a card roguelike that takes you on a journey through the dark forest of the same name, where the main goal is to defeat the powerful Beast that lives in the thicket. The visual execution of the project is made in minimalistic 1-bit pixel graphics, creating a special atmosphere. Each enemy encounter is a tactical puzzle, the outcome of which depends on the careful use of cards with modal effects that change depending on the level of light.

item.title: Death end re;Quest: Code Z
item.description: Game Description Death end re;Quest: Code Z sends Sayaka Hiwatari into the Voltage Area, a parallel universe made up of deadly dungeons. These locations contain randomly generated monsters and traps that react to her actions. For every movement of the player character, hostile creatures respond with their own move to move or attack. The gameplay involves navigating the dungeon floors to find items and try to go deeper. In this reality, people who were once allies may now turn out to be enemies.

item.title: Parisian Brasserie Simulator
item.description: Game Description Parisian Brasserie Simulator begins gameplay on a Parisian avenue: setting up tables, ordering ingredients, and creating a menu for the grand opening. The owner needs to set up the space in preparation for the first day, including developing seasonal menus based on French cuisine. Once preparations are complete, the doors open to welcome the first customers. The main task is to turn a small establishment into a recognized city institution.

item.title: Ways of Alchemy
item.description: Game Description In Ways of Alchemy, the player begins his journey in a secluded hut, where he uses card mechanics to create powerful elixirs from many ingredients. The final goal is to build an entire alchemical empire on the basis of a modest shack, using intelligence and tactical thinking. To do this, you will have to look for ancient recipes and recruit adventurers, constantly avoiding the close attention of the Inquisition.

item.title: Jupiter Hell Classic
item.description: Game Description Jupiter Hell Classic follows the tradition of classic roguelikes with grid-based movement, turn-based combat and procedural generation. Users navigate a sci-fi environment filled with demons and use an arsenal of weapons to survive. Every action counts, as permadete ensures that mistakes are costly, forcing you to adapt to ever-changing conditions. Strategy plays a central role, and movement and positioning affect the chances of survival. Jupiter Hell Classic builds on its predecessor while integrating elements from its modern counterpart, allowing it to update the mechanics while maintaining the essence of the original.

item.title: Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew
item.description: Game Description Journey of Realm: Dawn Dew gives control of a character named Dew on a journey of redemption. The adventure takes place in a kingdom consumed by a wave of black beasts and monstrous malice. As he progresses, Dew uncovers the history of the region, searching for the origins of a brutal threat. The plot explores a world where greed has destroyed innocence, prompting the heroine to arrive as a force to counteract the ongoing destruction.

item.title: Shields of Loyalty
item.description: Game Description Shields of Loyalty - Turn-based strategy in which you need to take command of an army consisting of several units and classes. Set out to explore a mysterious island, moving across the battlefield using hexagonal hexes. Develop a strategy and increase the efficiency of your army. Fight powerful warriors who are followers of darkness. Shields of Loyalty takes place in the dark fantasy world of Mantaria. There are several small armies under your command.

item.title: The Scouring
item.description: Game Description The Scouring is a real-time strategy game about the conflict between the human and orc factions. Players can choose a mode that includes building fortifications, collecting materials, and commanding military units. This gameplay requires strategic leadership of forces using both magic and guns to wage war. All factions must also defend their positions from waves of attacking undead that appear at night, which adds a survival element to base management.

item.title: Yield! Fall of Rome
item.description: Game Description Yield! Fall of Rome is a turn-based 4X strategy game that places gamers at the crossroads of history, specifically during the decline of the Roman Empire. Here you have to lead one of eight unique factions, each of which has its own advantages and weaknesses. These factions vary in style, requiring users to adapt to different tactical and strategic approaches. As a result, no two sessions are the same.

item.title: Parking World: Build and Manage
item.description: Game Description Parking World: Build and Manage takes gamers into the realm of parking management, offering a combination of strategy and creativity. In this simulation game, users take on the role of parking lot managers who are responsible for constructing, managing, and expanding their own parking lots. The core gameplay revolves around creating efficient parking solutions while solving various logistics problems. Thanks to the many modes, users can freely play the game on their own terms.

item.title: Warnament
item.description: Game Description Warnament is a turn-based global strategy game that puts the player in charge of the fate of an entire nation. Progress is achieved through the conquest of new territories and steady development in the military, technological, cultural or political spheres. You have the opportunity to take part in historical scenarios or create completely original worlds using the built-in editor. This approach opens the way to campaigns based on real events, or to alternative universes of your own design, where each province is governed separately.

item.title: Gold Gold Adventure Gold
item.description: Game Description Gold Gold Adventure Gold will put the player in charge of a developing settlement, where currency is the main instrument of power. It is necessary to build a city and establish an economy to attract individuals hungry for profit. These adventurers take on assignments for reward, completing tasks that lead to the accumulation of funds to achieve your goals. In parallel with the management of the settlement, the giant creature needs care, feeding and training, gradually developing into a powerful force.

item.title: Orbi Universo 2
item.description: Game Description Orbi Universo 2 puts the player at the helm of a civilization’s journey through history. It is necessary to lead society from its Neolithic origins to the development of atomic energy. The project operates on a system of nodes that links each component of the nation together. The actions taken produce cascading effects, changing the structure and future of the entire society. This network includes food production, trade, belief systems and conflict.

item.title: Tower Networking Inc.
item.description: Game Description Tower Networking Inc. puts the player at the head of an Internet provider operating in a single, constantly growing structure. The main task is to design and build network infrastructure for new clients as the tower randomly generates additional floors. Players physically connect equipment, connecting cables between switches, routers, and data risers to establish communications. Each new level introduces unique residential or office spaces, introducing varied service requirements that require constant adaptation to the tower’s growth.

item.title: Day of the Shell
item.description: Game Description Day of the Shell is a tactical roguelike where strategic decisions and their results are executed with one click per turn. In this world, the deities unleashed their power, leaving behind only a network of remote islands surrounded by water. The main character is a lone monster hunter, armed with a revolver and pursuing a clear goal. Traveling through a shattered world, she intends to challenge the entities that caused the cataclysm.

item.title: Ascent of Ashes
item.description: Game Description Ascent of Ashes is an immersion in a post-apocalyptic colony where your task is to build and defend a base, survive and explore a world teeming with dangers. Here you will find real-time battles with raiders, aliens and other factions, where you need to use stealth tactics and outwit the enemy. But the base itself also requires attention: grow crops, tame alien creatures, introduce technologies and strengthen walls against enemies.

item.title: Pip My Dice
item.description: Game Description Pip My Dice features a roguelike structure based on the Yahtzee mechanic. The main objective requires the player to accumulate a target score to progress through a series of levels. The currency earned in rounds is used to purchase new items in the store, including various dice, relics with special effects, and modifiers that change the properties of dice. Gameplay focuses on turn-based strategy and scoring principles, where decisions affect the final outcome of the session.

item.title: Swords and Souls Legacy Collection
item.description: Game Description Swords and Souls Legacy Collection brings together 5 individual games from the Flash era into one compilation. This collection offers a wide range of experiences, allowing you to fight for recognition in a special arena, become a wanted person on the run, or solve puzzles through special actions. You have to create heroes, systematically improve their parameters and interact with mechanics based on the principles of role-playing projects and racing action games.

item.title: Gold Miner: Classic Edition
item.description: Game Description Gold Miner: Classic Edition puts the player in control of a miner operating an underground winch with a 2D side-scroller perspective. The main task is to launch the swinging gripper in a timely manner to intercept and retrieve gold nuggets, precious stones and other valuables from the ground. Each level offers a new arrangement of resources under a strict time limit, requiring efficient mining of items to complete a financial goal.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Studio
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor Studio is a series of physics-based construction puzzles. The player’s task is to design structures in animated 3D mini-dioramas. The goal is to apply engineering principles to construct functional span crossings. Once the work is completed, a simulation is run to test the structural integrity of the creation under the influence of physical forces. This process determines the stability and success of the building under the load of passing traffic, summing up the test of the architect’s intent.

item.title: Worship
item.description: Game Description Worship is a dark combat quest that depicts all the horrors that often occur in cults of worship of dark deities. The leader and his followers, as a rule, have a long trail of blood behind them, since they do not allow anyone to challenge their ideology. And if someone tries to stop them or involve the church in solving the problem, he will pay dearly for it, becoming food for the monster.

item.title: Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream
item.description: Game Description Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream is a story-driven game that begins with the disappearance of Hanna’s brother, Herman. When law enforcement authorities initiate the pursuit of Herman, the heroine’s personal search sets off a chain of events that will affect her family and the fate of the entire city. The setting is a Scandinavian metropolis, inspired by the urban centers of Northern Europe in the early 1900s. Each street and alley provides an opportunity for cover, but also contains new obstacles and pursuers.

item.title: Kaizen: A Factory Story
item.description: Game Description Kaizen: A Factory Story introduces David Sugimoto, a South Bend, Indiana native who moves to Japan in 1986 to pursue a career at Matsuzawa Manufacturing. He arrives with an eye on an executive position in international sales, an opportunity available during the country’s economic expansion. Those hopes are dashed when he is sent not to the corporate office, but to one of the company’s old factories on the outskirts of Tokyo.

item.title: Ground of Aces
item.description: Game Description Ground of Aces puts you in charge of a remote airbase during World War II. The main task of the player is to build and organize the operation of a functional military facility, having complete freedom in planning each building, from individual walls to large-scale hangars. This airfield serves as a home for aircraft and personnel. You are responsible for developing infrastructure to support the war effort, directly impacting the operational capabilities of the complex.

item.title: ISLANDERS: New Shores
item.description: Game Description ISLANDERS: New Shores is a game that revolves around building settlements on a series of randomly generated islands. This project develops the city-building framework, focusing on simplicity, but adding more mechanics and content. Players will have to choose between two formats: High Score, which rewards strategic efficiency, and Sandbox, which removes score limits for free creativity. The main activity is the correct placement of buildings to accumulate points, which opens up access to more advanced structures from the inventory.

item.title: Plastic Battlegrounds
item.description: Game Description Plastic Battlegrounds is a virtual reality combat simulator based on toy soldier warfare. Players construct the battlefield, deploying units, vehicles, and stationary fortifications from a growing list to create a unique tactical environment. The project offers a dual perspective, allowing the user to either directly participate in the battle as a soldier, or observe a miniature conflict in the form of a life-size figure. Tools for creating the perfect battle in Plastic Battlegrounds:

item.title: CRUFT
item.description: Game Description CRUFT is a pixel simulator, the main concept of which is based on the process of creation and the accompanying accumulation of waste. Any activity to create objects inevitably leads to the appearance of waste that requires disposal or proper storage. The gamer is faced with a choice: maintain perfect cleanliness in his area or completely plunge into chaos, turning the territory into a real landfill. The economic component allows you to interact with merchants through a mobile phone to buy and sell various things, as well as go to the city to sell what you have accumulated.

item.title: Broken Arrow
item.description: Game Description Broken Arrow is a large-scale military strategy in which the player will have to take into account many details, including logistics, the presence or absence of intelligence, terrain features, etc. The game offers an environment as close to reality as possible, forcing the user to constantly adapt to the unexpected and form new squads to get a chance to win. Artificial intelligence is thoughtful and can also formulate its own plans and tactics, disrupting the original course of events.

item.title: After Inc: Revival
item.description: Game Description After Inc: Revival puts players in charge of humanity’s survivors decades after the Necroa virus event. People find themselves in a world that has been taken over by nature, and must establish a settlement to begin the revival. The main process consists of building housing, farms and sawmills, as well as extracting resources from the ruins of the past world. The main task is to lead this nascent community through a period of recovery in post-apocalyptic Britain.

item.title: NITRO GEN OMEGA
item.description: Game Description NITRO GEN OMEGA imagines a world where machines dominate the landscape after humanity’s lost war. The surviving people huddle in cities built on giant pillars, so teams of mercenaries are forced to travel through dangerous wastelands. The player takes control of one of these squads, based on a flying ship to carry out tasks for the supply of resources and technologies. The task is to explore this world, lead a squad and control a combat mech.

item.title: The Alters
item.description: Game Description The Alters is a science fiction adventure that immerses in the world of choice and consequences. Imagine yourself stuck on an unfriendly planet, where there is no one to rely on, except for your own ingenuity. This is the intriguing plan of this innovative game, which immerses in the world of parallel lives and alternative realities. Going on this journey, you take on the role of Jan Dolsky, a worker who made an emergency landing on a foreign world and is now facing the problem of survival and salvation.

item.title: Train Valley Origins
item.description: Game Description Train Valley Origins challenges players to manage train systems in numerous scenarios. The project requires switching switches and diverting trains along different tracks to ensure continuity of traffic flow. Gamers will have to control the delivery of goods through different historical eras, observing the development from steam engines to modern rail technology. The result depends on the well-coordinated operation of the network, the delivery of goods on time to the required stations and the avoidance of collisions between locomotives.

item.title: Bank Simulator
item.description: Game Description Bank Simulator is a simulator dedicated to creating from scratch and then managing a banking organization. The player takes on the primary role in managing all operational aspects, starting with the initial construction of the facility. Key responsibilities include selecting and supervising personnel to perform required functions. This management extends to maintaining customer accounts and making strategic decisions that influence the bank’s development trajectory. The goal is to guide the company through the various stages of its growth.

item.title: Unlighted
item.description: Game Description Unlighted is a journey into a dystopian world teetering on the edge between oblivion and memory, where a great secret hidden from humanity awaits to be revealed. At the heart of this world is the phenomenon of Umbralite - rare stones with previously unseen properties. These mysterious materials are invisible to the naked eye and only take on physical form when bathed in a stream of light. It was the study of the origin of these anomalies that became the main task of the Umbral Alchemy Corporation.

item.title: Successor
item.description: Game Description Successor is an exciting rogue-lite strategy adventure that combines the intensity of real-time combat with the tactical elements of turn-based games. You will have to travel through exotic regions, collect, equip and improve a brave team of heroes who can challenge the ruler of the kingdom. Everything happens at a fast pace, combining fast phase combat and tactical depth. To get to the king’s castle, you will have to go through many of its areas, defeating enemies on small diorama boards along with the heroes you acquire as the game progresses.

item.title: Kabuto Park
item.description: Game Description Kabuto Park immerses players in the summer atmosphere of collecting collectibles and competitions. The heroine, Hana, spends her holidays aiming for the Bug Fighting Championship. This task requires locating various insects, increasing their individual powers, and forming teams for structured meetings. This project allows us to observe a diverse population of these creatures in a specific natural environment. Kabuto Park includes a collection system for over 40 different species of fauna such as beetles, butterflies, bees and dragonflies.

item.title: TDS - Tower Defense Strategy
item.description: Game Description TDS - Tower Defense Strategy appears as a unique hybrid. This adventure game defies easy classification, combining elements of tower defense and real-time strategy. Let’s understand the basic mechanics of this intriguing game. It is based on the concept of vessels. These multi-faceted creatures serve as both units and towers. As a gamer, you control them by obtaining resources, participating in battles and building defensive structures. The world in TDS - Tower Defense Strategy is teeming with danger, and your Pool - the last bastion - must withstand the relentless Tides.

item.title: Auto Rogue
item.description: Game Description Auto Rogue immerses the gamer in a process where all decisions are made before the fight begins. The outcome is determined by how skills, relics, and activation conditions are configured in advance. No manual control is required - after preparation, the battle scene unfolds completely automatically. Characters act in accordance with a predetermined logic, built on clear connections of conditions and effects. Each playthrough of Auto Rogue is different due to new combinations of skills, non-standard enemies and randomly dropped items.

item.title: Monster Train 2
item.description: Game Description Monster Train 2 offers a dynamic and strategic approach to roguelike deckbuilding. Users control powerful clans aboard the train, making their way through a chaotic setting filled with demons, angels and Titan threats. As the story progresses, the gamer will have to go through several levels of the composition, each of which provides unique challenges and opportunities to improve their selection. Gameplay emphasizes the importance of tactical choices, requiring careful planning and quick thinking to defeat increasingly difficult enemies.

item.title: Wool at the Gates
item.description: Game Description Wool at the Gates presents a tactical defense experience. This project combines base defense mechanics, auto-battler-style synergy elements, and hero character control. User takes on the role of commander, leading the allied forces and building defenses for the city. This structure creates a cycle involving strategic preparation and subsequent combat engagements against advancing swarms of sheep. The gameplay unfolds in stages, the complexity of which increases. Each stage in Wool at the Gates consists of a construction phase and a subsequent battle against enemy formations.

item.title: Hotel Architect
item.description: Game Description Hotel Architect is an exciting management simulation game where you take control of various hotels and serve a diverse clientele around the world. Building and designing the hotel of your dreams from scratch is the essence of the project. It is possible to choose which events will take place in different areas of your hotel. Decorate everything with amenities, decor and decorate the interior with wallpaper and flooring. Make it unique and attractive to your guests.

item.title: Grandfather's Bakery
item.description: Game Description Grandfather’s Bakery is a management simulator in which a difficult mission falls on the shoulders of the protagonist. Having inherited an old stone bakery in a small town from his grandfather, he is faced with the need to restore the establishment to its former glory. This task is complicated by accumulated debts that require immediate repayment. Reviving the family business will require strategic thinking and hard work, as every decision will determine whether the bakery will once again become the pride of the local community.

item.title: MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR
item.description: Game Description MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR gives gamers the opportunity to manage the creation and development of a shopping complex. This project offers tools for the construction and expansion of commercial properties. Every operational decision made impacts revenue generation, site footfall and customer satisfaction. Inside the MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR, players manage individual retail premises, oversee advertising campaigns, improve the presentation of the property and maintain cleanliness to stand out from competitors. This supervision involves determining the cost of goods, observing how customers respond to those prices, and making necessary adjustments.

item.title: Of Life and Land
item.description: Game Description Of Life and Land provides users with the opportunity to try themselves in the colonization of lands, creating small settlements. Gamers will be engaged in expanding their own regions and trading with neighboring factions. A full-fledged simulation is taking place in the world, where it is necessary to erect buildings and provide the villagers with work, gradually putting the town in order. It is necessary to extract valuable resources in order to erect the desired buildings and improve the quality of life for the subordinate people.

item.title: Rift Riff
item.description: Game Description Rift Riff throws gamers into the cracks between worlds to battle monsters and collect valuables. Gameplay is built around tower defense, requiring careful placement and control of structures. Before the start of the mission, you will have to determine a set of defense structures and then build them on the map at the designated points. A key aspect of Rift Riff is selecting defensive structures to counter enemy types and their attacks.

item.title: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch
item.description: Game Description Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch weaves together multiple genres to create a tapestry of strategy and decision-making that keeps players on their toes. It is based on the role of the monarch - a figure chosen by higher powers to protect the dungeon from invasion. The Dungeon is not just a place, it is a realm of wealth and power, coveted by those who think they can lay claim to its treasures.

item.title: Deck of Haunts
item.description: Game Description Deck of Haunts puts the player in control of a sentient structure that functions as a haunted abode. The main challenge is to attract curious people to its pre-planned premises. Once these individuals are inside, the player influences the environment and initiates certain incidents in order to systematically undermine the peace of mind of the visitors. This allows the essence of the house to absorb the energy they release to increase their size and spread influence in the surrounding area.

item.title: The Monster Breeder
item.description: Game Description The Monster Breeder puts under player control an establishment that specializes in breeding combat creatures. This strategic simulation involves overseeing the production of hybrids for gladiator matches. Income and fame are achieved by training creatures that can operate effectively in the arena. The game instructs the gamer to lead a creature breeding house under the auspices of the Empire. This position opens up access to tools for shaping the properties of creatures before sending them into battle.

item.title: Approaching Infinity
item.description: Game Description Approaching Infinity offers a fast-paced, never-ending adventure through space. The title is built on the basis of a huge procedurally generated universe, which gives users the freedom to create their own path. Gamers can do a variety of things: conduct tactical battles, mine asteroids, trade goods, create items and explore mysterious alien worlds. At its core, Approaching Infinity allows for endless development, each time offering a new challenge.

item.title: KreatureKind
item.description: Game Description KreatureKind sets players a fateful task - to save magic from complete and irrevocable extinction. To do this, you don’t have to fight, but conduct heated debates with various monsters, using cards from the assembled deck as arguments. Successful completion of a verbal battle convinces your opponent to join your cause, while failure brings the world closer to disaster. Despite their apparent simplicity, the mechanics have depth, offering a serious challenge for fans of tactical planning.

item.title: Kingdom's Deck
item.description: Game Description Kingdom’s Deck presents a card-based experience that combines city building with nightly repelling attacks. Gamers will become rulers of the lands, faced with the task of expanding their personal possessions and at the same time ensuring the safety of the inhabitants from enemy attacks. Gameplay focuses on deck building and the strategic placement of these assets to control and develop a power. The main actions alternate between the construction of structures during daylight hours and the organization of the defense of fortifications at nightfall.

item.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero introduces Marona, a young girl with the ability to communicate with the spirits of the departed. She travels through the oceanic game world of Ivoire with the ghost Ash, assisting residents along the way. Their travels are interrupted by an attack by a fleet of ghost ships, leading to Marona’s separation from Ash. This event kicks off her campaign against the sea aggressors.

item.title: Tempest Rising
item.description: Game Description Tempest Rising is designed for fans of real-time strategy games. This title emulates the classic representatives of the RTS genre from the late 90s and early 2000s. The video game uses an isometric view, but has fully 3D graphics. There are 3 factions to choose from. The gameplay for each of them is noticeably different. The project is made in a science fiction setting. The events shown in it take place in an alternative world.

item.title: Havendock
item.description: Game Description Havendock offers an exciting adventure of survival and resource management. In this cozy colony simulator, you’ll find yourself in the middle of the ocean, where you’ll have to build a thriving city to stay afloat. But don’t worry, you won’t be alone in this challenge. You will bring your comrades aboard the ship and manage their needs while trying to satisfy your own. Create your character and live your best life on the ocean.

item.title: Neongarten
item.description: Game Description Neongarten features a single-player experience that combines strategy, simulation and city building within a roglite mechanics. Gamers engage in turn-based action, placing elements in a cyberpunk environment to expand their influence. The main activity involves constructing buildings and managing the placement of units on the generated terrain. This process requires forethought, since each placement affects the overall development of the gamer’s digital area. Obtaining resources directly depends on these building decisions.

item.title: Outworld Station
item.description: Game Description Outworld Station invites players to take on the role of a station commander tasked with developing resources in the alien TAU star system. The central task is to build a large-scale space industrial complex covering entire planets. Materials must be collected and production lines established to build starships and expand station operations in this unexplored region of space. Successful advancement depends on the development of increasingly sophisticated production capabilities to control the environment.

item.title: Wizdom Academy
item.description: Game Description Wizdom Academy puts the player in the shoes of the director, responsible for the construction and operation of a school for wizards. The process begins with the construction of the institution’s buildings, creating the foundation for learning. The key task is to attract people as students, as well as recruit staff to become teachers in the academy, shaping the composition of the school from the very beginning. The initial stage of construction prepares the ground for subsequent expansion and choice of specialization.

item.title: Chains of Freedom
item.description: Game Description Chains of Freedom puts the gamer under control of an elite military unit in a fictional dystopian Eastern European country. This title falls into the turn-based tactics genre, focusing on strategic combat scenarios from an isometric perspective. Users complete tasks aimed at uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the state. Achieving goals depends on the correct use of team members and adaptation of formations during clashes. The core gameplay in Chains of Freedom involves turn-based combat, where players plan every move for their squad members.

item.title: D.O.T. Defense
item.description: Game Description D.O.T. Defense involves building towers, gathering forces and seizing control of the map for the sake of victory - you need to save your headquarters last. Gamers fight in local sessions that support one-on-one, two-on-two, or all-versus-all formats against live or AI opponents. The player’s task is to systematically destroy enemy headquarters while simultaneously protecting his own base. This real-time strategy title combines tower defense mechanics and automated squad battles.

item.title: Monaco 2
item.description: Game Description Monaco 2 invites the player to assemble a specialized squad to carry out cunning heist operations. The main setting is the city of Monaco, presented as a location with many valuable targets due to the wealth concentrated there. Gamers embody members of an international group of criminal specialists seeking to exploit these conditions for material gain. Success requires careful movement through locations, bypassing security and retrieving intended valuables in a tense environment.

item.title: Asgard's Fall - Viking Survivors
item.description: Game Description Asgard’s Fall - Viking Survivors offers a Scandinavian roguelike that focuses on fighting against multiple opponents. The characters will have to make their way through crowds of creatures in the Nine Realms, seeking to challenge the gods of Asgard. The choice of protagonists, such as Warrior or Huntress, offers different starting options, each with unique skill trees to level up; these decisions influence the gamer’s approach to upcoming battles.

item.title: Sandwalkers
item.description: Game Description Sandwalkers is a roguelike focused on step-by-step exploration of dangerous lands. The Mka tribe periodically sends troops into Fiti, a weather anomaly that divides the Uwando tribes and makes it difficult to survive outside of safe zones. The goals of such expeditions are to establish diplomatic contacts, explore and mark territories captured by monsters and pirates, and grow a new tree city as a refuge. Successful completion of the task requires the caravans to send the collected information back through the crystospheres carried by the beetles.

item.title: Lyca
item.description: Game Description Lyca is an incremental game where the goal is to restore a barren area and turn it into a grassland. Players control the wolf character Lika, moving him across the landscape and taking actions to transform the world around him. Key gameplay involves exploring the area, using the wolf’s abilities, and collecting materials that appear from the ground. This cycle of actions allows you to turn a desert area into a field suitable for free movement of the character.

item.title: Maestro's Cold War 2
item.description: Game Description Maestro’s Cold War 2 puts players at the center of a global rivalry defined by opposing political systems. There are two main forces operating on the world stage, the USA and the USSR, drawn into an ideological confrontation backed by significant nuclear arsenals. A direct military confrontation between these parties has the potential to cause widespread destruction, changing the course of civilization. Participants choose one of two superpowers to govern while navigating this tense international environment.

item.title: Sultan's Game
item.description: Game Description Sultan’s Game allows you to play the role of a minister managing the treacherous court of a ruthless ruler. Each week, the Sultan requires participation in a ritual during which a card is played, each representing a different challenge. Quests can range from indulging in excess and satisfying dangerous desires to conquest and bloodshed. If you fail to complete the task within seven days, you will be executed.

item.title: Grit and Valor - 1949
item.description: Game Description In Grit and Valor - 1949, gamers will take control of an elite squad of mechs during an alternate history of World War II. It is 1949 and Europe is deeply scarred by the ongoing war. The Axis forces, using terrifying ‘Mechs, virtually crushed the resistance. Users lead their squad into this dangerous world to turn the tide by deploying destructive EMP weapons deep in enemy territory. Every mission in Grit and Valor - 1949 forces gamers to think on their feet as they control their swords in dynamic, real-time combat.

item.title: Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Legend of Heroes: Three Kingdoms places the player in a historical period as the only participant with multiple paths available. The gamer can choose the role of a ruler, a subordinate commander, or an independent mercenary operating in the world. The project features 3 different types of conflicts: large-scale legion battles take place in real time, while individual combat duels and verbal debates use a turn-based card system.

item.title: Nordhold
item.description: Game Description Nordhold is a strategic tower defense project that invites gamers to immerse themselves in a medieval Scandinavian village, balancing resource management and defense tactics. In a setting where enemies are constantly approaching, the main mechanics of the title boil down to constructing and upgrading various buildings to ensure the city’s survival. As waves of enemies approach, gamers must optimize city construction to maintain strong defenses without damaging the economy.

item.title: Tuggowar
item.description: Game Description Tuggowar involves constructing a deck from a randomized set of cards, making each match unpredictable. Every time you play, you get the opportunity to experiment with new strategies, finding unexpected combinations that can lead to victory. Gamers often have to adapt on the fly, reacting to ever-changing dynamics. The variety in each match keeps the experience fresh even after long hours. What sets Tuggowar apart from many card games is the emphasis on creativity rather than following pre-made decks.

item.title: Rogue Conflict
item.description: Game Description Rogue Conflict is a tactical project where a freshly formed army is placed under the control of a commander to repel an enemy invasion. In a world gripped by endless wars between monarchs for territories under a new feudalism, the gamer will have to become a general and lead his troops to glory. To achieve victory, you must carefully plan every step, using a variety of types of troops.

item.title: Deadly Heart Gambit
item.description: Game Description Deadly Heart Gambit is an intense card competition, where each card drawn can either extend the allotted time or bring the fatal ending closer. Participants in this fight will have to rely on memory and strategic thinking to avoid a fatal meeting with the Joker, which means an instant loss in the round. Defeat is awarded to the one who draws this single card. To win, you must carefully monitor the cards already played and wisely use the opportunity to skip your turn.

item.title: Knights in Tight Spaces
item.description: Game Description Knights in Tight Spaces takes place in a medieval fantasy setting. Your main task is to control the environment and assemble a squad to face various bandits and supernatural threats. The mechanic is based on deck building, where strategic choice and card synergy play a crucial role in defeating your enemies. You will need to carefully plan each move, taking into account the environment, team composition and available resources.

item.title: Microtopia
item.description: Game Description In Microtopia, you control a colony of robotic ants, directing them to perform various tasks and managing a complex network of resources and environments. First, you send a queen to the colony, and then the ants must work together to gather materials, produce goods, and feed the queen to ensure the colony thrives. As you progress, you will have to build transport routes and use pheromones to direct the ants in the right direction.

item.title: Astral Throne
item.description: Game Description Astral Throne is a journey through a land cursed by a falling star, whose fog destroys memory and blurs the boundaries between the real and the forgotten. This strategy RPG combines the best elements of turn-based strategy and adventure, offering a new take on a familiar genre. As you navigate a volatile world, you’ll create and customize your team of multiple characters, each with their own skills and history.

item.title: Rift Wizard 2
item.description: Game Description Rift Wizard 2 is a roguelike wizard simulator that puts players in the shoes of an immortal amnesiac wizard. Main goal? Travel through space and fight an old enemy. Each playthrough of the game is a new adventure in which no two tasks are the same. Procedural generation ensures that users will always encounter different obstacles, monsters and environments, which makes the game fresh and unpredictable. The challenge lies in how gamers adapt their strategies as they progress through different levels, where every decision matters and every spell cast can be the difference between life and death.

item.title: Whispers of the Eyeless
item.description: Game Description Whispers of the Eyeless is set in a dark fantasy world where every decision has weight. Users take on the role of the First Prophet, tasked with rebuilding the destroyed city and managing a growing cult. As you navigate the regions of Aranthor, you must balance ambition, survival, and the looming influence of the Dead Gods. The title revolves around tactical turn-based combat, where planning and foresight are the key to victory.

item.title: The Stone of Madness
item.description: Game Description The Stone of Madness is a real-time tactical stealth game that immerses gamers in the claustrophobic halls of an 18th century Spanish monastery. In the bleak setting of a Jesuit stronghold deep in the Pyrenees, five prisoners must combine their skills to overcome a web of fear, paranoia and supernatural threats. With their lives on the line, they must confront their own traumas and the madness that threatens to consume them.

item.title: Exogate Initiative
item.description: Game Description The Exogate Initiative presents the possibility of creating and managing a base for exploring other worlds discovered by humanity in an alternative future. It is necessary to develop the possibilities of technological progress, allowing one to move to any desired point in the universe using portals. The states are joining forces and want to form a special research center where scientists will be able to observe unique regions and conduct reconnaissance activities in the field.

item.title: Airborne Empire
item.description: Game Description Airborne Empire. Want a city-building adventure with a twist? This game throws you straight into the clouds, tasking you with building and managing a city that floats among them. Think SimCity and sky pirates and exploration. The basis is strategic planning and resource management. You will have to keep your city afloat, in the literal sense of the word. Every decision you make affects how well your air metropolis functions.

item.title: Tactics of World War I
item.description: Game Description Tactics of World War I, as the name suggests, uses the setting of the First World War. The game covers the entire period of the large-scale conflict (from 1914 to 1918). It is a real-time tactical strategy game. The video game is dedicated to the Western Front. It has 2 campaigns. They allow you to fight on the side of Great Britain and Germany, respectively. This video game features historical battles that actually took place.

item.title: Glorious Companions
item.description: Game Description Glorious Companions immerses gamers in the vast and ever-changing world of Navaroth. The title is characterized by procedural generation, thanks to which there is something different to be found in each journey, be it collecting vault crystals or navigating complex political landscapes. You lead a team of experienced mercenaries and the stakes are high. The goal is to defeat the Wrath of Xandar by collecting Vault Crystals scattered throughout the world while engaging in combat, strategic planning, and resource management.

item.title: Endless Dark
item.description: Game Description In Endless Dark you will have to serve a sleeping colony ship alone. As the Guardian, a sentient machine, your job is to keep the ship’s systems running, but you also face an eerie sense of isolation. There is no combat here, but instead you are faced with system failures, unpredictable events and the gradual destruction of your sanity. This combination of mechanical problems and mental stress creates a unique sensation.

item.title: Myths and Legends
item.description: Game Description Myths and Legends takes gamers into a world created 2,500 years ago where they can take part in various strategic activities. The title combines exploration, combat, trade and diplomacy, offering a new take on real-time strategy. Its design focuses on creating and managing city-states on procedurally generated islands, where no two playthroughs are the same. With a focus on resource management and tactical decision-making, users have a lot to think about as they try to build and maintain their power.

item.title: SGS Battle of the Bulge
item.description: Game Description SGS Battle of the Bulge simulates WW2 fighting in the Ardennes that began on December 16, 1944. The project depicts the Nazi offensive known as Watch on the Rhine, later renamed Autumn Mist, which targeted Allied supply routes through Antwerp. These events led to the conflict known as the Battle of the Bulge, which lasted until January 1945, including retaliatory operations by the anti-Hitler coalition. The simulation covers the period of both the German attack and the subsequent enemy reaction.

item.title: Airport X-Ray Simulator
item.description: Game Description Airport X-Ray Simulator is an adventure game in which gamers find themselves in the shoes of an airport security officer. Main task? Do not allow prohibited or dangerous items to be brought on board the aircraft. From the very beginning of the game, users find themselves in a busy airport environment, where the focus is on carefully scanning luggage. X-ray machines are their main tool, and users must be on alert for anything that doesn’t belong to them.

item.title: Puropu Defense Squad
item.description: Game Description Puropu Defense Squad is a strategy action game where animate inanimate objects are forced to defend their existence from ruthless invaders from Earth. The central task for the fighters of the elite squad is the defense of the Extractor, which is the source of life for the entire Puropu civilization. Confronting aggressors requires not only direct participation in battles, but also the construction of complex defensive structures. Defenders have at their disposal an extensive arsenal of hundreds of defense mechanisms, including 15 types of traps and turrets.

item.title: Urban Strife
item.description: Game Description Urban Strife takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, and the gameplay is presented in the style of old school TBS. The main character lives in a dangerous environment, where every resident does everything for his own benefit. Resources are running out, there are no jobs, and most kill and rob to survive. The player can enter into alliances by choosing 1 of several factions, automatically becoming an enemy of the remaining factions.

item.title: Chrysalis
item.description: Game Description Chrysalis is a roguelike strategy game whose gameplay is divided into two contrasting phases. Initially, the protagonist, in the guise of a disembodied spirit, explores procedurally generated locations, inhabiting friendly creatures and collecting resources. After the timer expires, the calm garden atmosphere is replaced by an ominous one, and waves of aggressive monsters appear on the map. From this moment, the defense stage begins, requiring the use of all accumulated forces and tactical skills to repel attacks.

item.title: Yet Another Climbing Game
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Climbing Game is a tough climb, the main goal of which is to reach a mysterious peak, accessible only to the most persistent and courageous. Every wrong move threatens to fall and completely lose all the progress made, which turns the journey into a real test for the nervous system. The reward for those who dare to challenge the heights will be a secret hidden from the majority.

item.title: Lost But Found
item.description: Game Description InLost But Found, gamers will take on the role of an airport employee dealing with lost and found items. The idea is simple: sort, organize and return lost items to their rightful owners. The setting is an airport, where the task of returning passengers to their belongings takes place on a cluttered table with an overhead view. The title revolves around decisions, management and moral issues. This mixture of job simulator and hidden object mechanics defines the gameplay.

item.title: Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th
item.description: Game Description Sin Slayers: Reign of The 8th immerses users in a dark, unforgiving world, where every corner is fraught with new dangers and moral dilemmas. In this turn-based strategy game, players take on the role of a group of adventurers, each representing one of the Seven Deadly Sins. Their mission? Confront monstrous enemies, travel through dark and twisted places, and ultimately confront the formidable Eighth Sin - Fate. This latest installment in the Sin Slayers series expands on the formula of its predecessor, introducing new regions, improved mechanics, and an even deeper story that will force players to question not only the fate of their characters, but the very nature of sin.

item.title: Dokimon: Quest
item.description: Game Description Dokimon: Quest offers an intriguing journey through the Xelos region, where gamers will have to unravel the mystery of their missing childhood friend. In a world full of monsters, players must not only uncover hidden secrets, but also capture creatures that will help them in battle. The adventure is both exciting and challenging as users explore different parts of the world, leveling up to face stronger enemies. As the story progresses, the environment becomes increasingly dangerous, requiring users to grow in strength and strategy to continue exploring.

item.title: Dungeon Clawler
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Clawler is a deep dive into the dark and unpredictable world of dungeons, where every step could be the beginning of a new legend. The interweaving of mysterious corridors leading to halls shrouded in twilight creates a feeling of continuous discovery of secrets. There are no easy solutions here—treacherous traps, ancient puzzles, and creatures whose origins are shrouded in speculation and fear await the player. Each encounter is a test of character: you can rush into a frontal attack, try to hide in the shadows, or try to find a workaround so as not to get involved in an unnecessary conflict.

item.title: Node Farm
item.description: Game Description Node Farm is an adventure game, the essence of which is to create an automated farm using nodes. The concept is simple: connect nodes to grow crops, harvest them and sell them for profit. Gamers can then reinvest this money to expand their farms and discover new islands. Over time, the farm becomes more efficient as users develop strategies to automate every step of the farming process. This constant development is at the heart of the game, offering a satisfying combination of resource management and strategic planning.

item.title: Forgotten but Unbroken
item.description: Game Description Forgotten but Unbroken is an exciting tactical turn-based strategy game that takes inspiration from XCOM but offers its own unique and unforgettable twist. You will have the opportunity to fight with or against real heroes of World War II, unjustly forgotten by history. It’s time to take your place as the leader of a small but powerful resistance group and fight the might of the Axis forces to help liberate Europe!

item.title: Rogue Command
item.description: Game Description Rogue Command is a strategy with elements of a bagel and a card game. You need to collect resources, form a unique deck of cards and fight against robots. When gathering an army, you need to study the enemy’s tactics in order to deal a crushing blow to him. While exploring locations, you need to obtain resources to build buildings and hire units. There are factories, auxiliary buildings, turrets and special weapons of mass destruction.

item.title: My Hotel
item.description: Game Description Users inMy Hotel have to try their hand at being a novice businessman who is going to set up a small hotel and gradually develop it. You will have to buy a dirty and in terrible condition of a house in which you can arrange rooms for living and set up a reception. It is necessary to wash all the floors, clean the furniture from dust and do everything possible to make an attractive and prestigious appearance for the building.

item.title: Catizens
item.description: Game Description Users in Catizens have to develop the city of cats. Players will be able to watch the activities of cute and fluffy animals, helping the kittens build a big and beautiful city. During the passage, users will have to create working groups of different characters that can argue or come into conflict with each other. Misunderstandings will have to be cleared up to increase productivity and improve the quality of life for the entire settlement.

item.title: Dungeon Inn
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Inn is a turn-based strategy puzzle game set in a world where adventurers, guilds, and dungeons collide in a unique, sometimes confusing world. In the title, you will find yourself in the shoes of Sarah, the owner of an inn strategically located next to the dungeon. Your job is simple: keep the inn running smoothly, manage resources, and manage the uneasy relationship between the two rival guilds that send their members to the inn.

item.title: Talisman: Digital 5th Edition
item.description: Game Description Talisman: Digital 5th Edition is an online adaptation of the classic board adventure game, bringing the strategic gameplay and fantasy setting into the digital world. Users take on the role of adventurers, each with unique abilities and skills, and set off on a journey through dangerous lands with the ultimate goal of obtaining the Crown of Command. Along the way, they will have to go through many challenges - from fighting dragons to obtaining magical items - while navigating a map divided into three regions: Outer, Middle and Inner.

item.title: Songs of Silence
item.description: Game Description Songs of Silence immerses players in a fantasy world under the threat of an impending Silence. This strategy game combines kingdom management, hero development and auto-combat elements, culminating in exciting real-time battles. Immerse yourself in a rich narrative as you lead your kingdom against the encroaching darkness. Manage resources, explore vast maps, and outsmart your opponents to achieve victory. Experience varied gameplay with turn-based strategic maneuvering and fast-paced, action-packed combat.

item.title: Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age
item.description: Game Description Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is a naval combat game in which you control two warring factions: NATO forces and representatives of the Warsaw Pact. Take part in the naval conflicts of the 80s. Control a huge number of different ships, use all modern types of weapons and technologies. Your main task in Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is to defeat the enemy army.

item.title: Elements and Build
item.description: Game Description Elements and Build is an adventure game that combines strategy and creativity, asking gamers to design their own paths to victory. The idea is simple: survive waves of monsters by building a labyrinth that will keep them at bay. However, the mechanics and challenges that adventure games offer make the process of building and surviving something that requires skill and insight. Each level is randomly generated, meaning players are faced with new obstacles and opportunities each time they play through.

item.title: HeistGeist
item.description: Game Description HeistGeist immerses gamers in the cyberpunk universe, putting them in the shoes of Alexandra, a cunning thief who overcomes the consequences of a failed mission. The title revolves around the challenge of assembling a diverse team of specialists to carry out complex heists. Each heist presents tactical obstacles and opportunities, turning each mission into a unique puzzle. Users take part in battles based on a card-based battle system that brings an innovative twist to the traditional strategy genre.

item.title: Bunker Invaders
item.description: Game Description Bunker Invaders throws you into the middle of a post-apocalyptic scenario. The surface world has been destroyed, and your only hope is a rickety bunker. This is not a luxurious fallout shelter, but a situation where leaving the lights on is already a victory. Welcome to the new life of a bunker manager, where creepy creatures from the outside world are constantly trying to destroy your shelter. Here you have to solve two problems: patch up the crumbling infrastructure and at the same time repel the attacks of the inexorable invaders.

item.title: Terror of the Seven Seas
item.description: Game Description Terror of the Seven Seas is a game that immerses gamers in the complex maritime life of an era of exploration and piracy. The game takes place in a vast open world and offers a wide range of entertainment - from participating in large-scale naval battles to treasure hunting. Users take on the roles of various characters, each with their own unique responsibilities and abilities. Whether it’s a captain leading a ship through stormy seas, an officer commanding a crew, a merchant transporting goods across vast oceans, or an explorer reaching into the unknown, there is something for every type of adventurer.

item.title: Metal Slug Tactics
item.description: Game Description TheMetal Slug Tactics player chooses his warriors to create a suitable powerful team capable of stopping the hostilities. Run n' Gun has roguelike elements as well as intense combat. The continuation of the series of the same name allows you to look at the war from a new angle with a greater share of adrenaline, gaining experience after each fight, which helps to unlock additional skills or weapons. The game was the first tactical RPG, unlike its predecessors, and features replayability, pixel graphics and complex replay mechanics.

item.title: Warlords Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Warlords Battle Simulator is a game that places gamers in the role of generals who must lead armies in strategic and often unpredictable battles. In this tactical roguelike auto-action game, success largely depends on how well users manage resources, select units and place them on the battlefield. Each faction - be it the Kingdom, Greenskins, Undead or Barbarians - offers a unique set of units and commanders, each with special abilities that can change the tide of battle.

item.title: Touch Type Tale - Strategic Typing
item.description: Game Description Touch Type Tale - Strategic Typing immerses users in battles between armies that take place during the Dark Middle Ages. The game is made in the genre of real-time strategy, where you have to deal with printing and solving multi-task missions. The protagonist is a guy named Paul who wants to prevail over the evil forces. Gameplay mechanics allow you to test the typing speed of users, where the ability to type the necessary keys blindly is useful in order to keep control over the events that are happening.

item.title: Quadrober Simulator
item.description: Game Description Quadrober Simulator invites users to test themselves as a four-legged creature in a diverse environment. There is a lot of choice in this game. Users can choose from a variety of animals, each with specific traits and skills. These choices set the stage for a unique journey through different ecosystems. As gamers navigate these landscapes, they are faced with opportunities to explore, survive, and interact with the environment. Gameplay revolves around several key activities, including hunting, foraging, and building shelters.

item.title: Quarterstaff
item.description: Game Description Quarterstaff is a turn-based action strategy game that invites gamers into a fantasy realm full of intrigue and conflict. Set against the backdrop of a land under siege by a ruthless sorcerous conqueror, the adventure revolves around the character of Kalresh, a wizard skilled in the arts of magic and acrobatics. Having taken control of Kalresh, users are tasked with liberating the kingdom through a series of strategic battles.

item.title: Roots of Harmony
item.description: Game Description Roots of Harmony is a text-based 4X strategy game in which users guide a newly founded colony through various stages of survival and development. Set on a procedurally generated island, the project introduces gamers to a variety of unique environments, including tundra, forests, deserts and swamps, each offering their own challenges and content. The focus is on exploration, resource management, and making important ideological decisions that determine the direction of the base’s development.

item.title: Clank!
item.description: Game Description Clank! throws players headlong into an exciting world of dungeons and daring theft. This board game marks their physical debut, offering a unique blend of deck building and push-your-luck mechanics. Main task? Infiltrate the legendary Dragon Vault, steal the most coveted artifacts, and escape with the loot before the dragon turns you into a crunchy beast. Sounds simple enough, right? But no. Every false step, every clink of metal on stone echoes through the caves, serving as an uninvited call to the slumbering dragon.

item.title: Geo-Political Simulator 5
item.description: Game Description Geo-Political Simulator 5 immerses gamers in the world of international politics, economic strategy and global decision-making. In it, users are not just passive observers of events in the world, but active participants capable of influencing entire states and transnational corporations. The title is a complex and highly detailed simulation of the modern geopolitical landscape, where every choice, from political decisions to economic strategies, has far-reaching consequences. Whether it’s the president of a country, the head of a corporation, or the leader of the political opposition, the title invites gamers to navigate the intricacies of global power.

item.title: BURGGEIST
item.description: Game Description BURGGEIST invites you into a world where real-time tactical action and strategy collide. The action takes place in the vast lands of Aliscans, and the control of a walking fortress. The challenge is to build and defend a towering structure while fending off enemies. The battlefield is more than just a flat area: elevation changes and terrain features play an important role in shaping your approach to combat. Here you will have to think, quickly adapt and choose the most effective strategy to outwit your opponents.

item.title: Up to Par
item.description: Game Description Up to Par is more than just minigolf! Take on procedurally generated levels with up to 16 friends or alone, but remember that every hit counts. Stay below par to avoid being eliminated from the game! You will have to show your skills and planning to progress as far as possible and unlock the next course. Can you beat your record? Will you be able to defeat your friends?

item.title: Tech Store Simulator
item.description: Game Description Tech Store Simulator immerses gamers in the fast-paced world of tech retail, giving them hands-on experience in running their own electronics store. The title’s focus is on strategic decision-making, requiring users to balance inventory management with customer satisfaction. Gamers will have to navigate the ins and outs of running a successful tech business, from stocking shelves with the latest gadgets to setting competitive prices. Hiring and managing staff is another key aspect of the game to keep the store running smoothly and efficiently.

item.title: Thronefall
item.description: Game Description Thronefall is a game that truly captures the essence of strategy and action. Here, players are tasked with balancing resources, armies, and defenses while constantly facing waves of relentless enemies that relentlessly attack their base every night. The project offers users the freedom to choose their style, allowing them to either hold positions behind fortified walls and rely on archers and catapults to repel invaders, or take charge and lead their knights into exciting combat.

item.title: Necro Story
item.description: Game Description Necro Story provides users with a unique opportunity to step into the shoes of a slightly evil necromancer. The title combines elements of humor and the conventions of traditional role-playing games, inviting gamers into a world where the undead and dark magic are part of everyday life. The narrative unfolds with the help of a ghostly white magician who brings playfulness to the often dark theme of necromancy. Together they embark on a journey through the underworld to save humanity from an impending threat.

item.title: Diplomacy is Not an Option
item.description: Game Description InDiplomacy is Not an Option the player becomes a feudal lord in the Middle Ages. The main character is going through a midlife crisis. Every day the protagonist comes up with hundreds of ways to improve his own economy, how to properly lead his subjects and competently develop the city. He lived like this for a long time. He was tired of monotonous and meaningless intellectual stress. New adventures in the life of the central character begin when hordes of monsters began to attack settlements, and the townspeople rebelled together.

item.title: exclusive memory
item.description: Game Description Exclusive Memory draws gamers into a narrative where every choice and interaction can change the storyline. The protagonist finds himself in a maze of memories, each of which serves as a puzzle box that needs to be opened. As users delve deeper, they uncover layers of the character’s past, encountering various figures that are pieces of a larger puzzle. These interactions not only move the narrative forward, but also provide insight into the protagonist’s psyche, shaping his journey.

item.title: Axon TD: Uprising - Tower Defense
item.description: Game Description Axon TD: Uprising - Tower Defense is a fast-paced and fun tower defense game that gives users the freedom to create their own mazes and paths using a tile-based system. With the ability to connect to different islands and control your destination, players can strategize and customize their defenses to fend off the relentless waves of enemies. The main difference between Axon TD: Uprising - Tower Defense is its authentic modes.

item.title: Breachway
item.description: Game Description Breachway is a unique space-themed adventure game. You’ll assemble a crew, load up your spaceship, and set out to explore the galaxy in this deck-building space roguelike. Your deck is determined by what you load onto your ship - a variety of equipment that can be combined to create unique synergy cards. This game has a comprehensive ship upgrade system, you can buy, find or steal powerful equipment, and further improve its performance with the help of many subsystems that you will find on your journey.

item.title: Mechabellum
item.description: Game Description Mechabellum is an epic auto battler set in a sci-fi setting that puts you in the shoes of a commander leading an army of mechs on the newly colonized planet Far-Away. Your opponents will tremble in fear as you customize and level up your units, strategically place them on the battlefield and watch them ruthlessly destroy your enemies. You’ll have an arsenal of unique ‘Mechs at your disposal, from the nimble light craft of Wasps to the massive Vulcans.

item.title: The Nameless: Slay Dragon
item.description: Game Description The Nameless: Slay Dragon is a turn-based role-playing adventure game that immerses gamers in a world of strategic combat and deep storytelling. In the center is a young protagonist who must take revenge on a powerful dragon. Users will have to go through a series of battles and clashes, each of which requires careful planning and tactical execution. The title emphasizes the importance of choice; every decision can change the course of the plot.

item.title: Ara: History Untold
item.description: Game Description Ara: History Untold is a turn-based grand strategy game that puts players in the shoes of the leader of a nation and guides its destiny on an exciting journey through alternate history. Users embark on a journey of exploration, development and diplomacy, defining the unique path of their civilization. From the very beginning, gamers are immersed in a procedurally generated world rife with opportunities and challenges. The game encourages exploration, rewarding those who venture into the unknown with the discovery of new lands and resources.

item.title: Frostpunk 2
item.description: Game Description Frostpunk 2 is a continuation of the survival game, which is based on management and construction. The events of the game take place 30 years after the catastrophe that covered the Earth. Now the planet has experienced severe cooling and people are suffering from constant frosts. In the urban planning simulator, you are asked to try on the role of a hero who, in the process, must lead an entire metropolis and take care of the well-being of local residents.

item.title: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell
item.description: Game Description Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell is a first-person psychological horror game that explores themes of grief, guilt, and the paranormal. Players take on the role of Mark, a man coping with the recent loss of his wife Jane. The game begins with Mark returning to his and Jane’s old country house to prepare for her funeral. However, what is meant to be a grim homecoming quickly turns into a terrifying ordeal.

item.title: Toy Tactics
item.description: Game Description Toy Tactics is a colorful action strategy game that will take you into the world of exciting strategies and physics experiments. Here you will become the main general, tasked with controlling little toy soldiers and defeating the enemy. You will have to place units on the battlefield and create various formations to guide your toy army towards victory. But don’t forget that physics plays an important role here! When the toy soldiers collide with each other, their helmets will fly in all directions, just like in a cartoon.

item.title: UFO 50
item.description: Game Description The UFO 50 project is a collection of single and multiplayer games made in different genres, such as platformers, shooters, puzzles, roguelike or role-playing adventures. The style is made in old school retro graphics, which creates an 8-bit aesthetic in the design of locations. Each of the fifty video games gives you the opportunity to try out full-fledged gameplay with different levels, where there is a beginning and an end to the single-player campaign.

item.title: Pyrene
item.description: Game Description Pyrene is a fast-paced roguelike dungeon-crawler in which gamers must plunge into the depths of hell and rebuild their home. With a variety of heroes and spells, users can experiment with different strategies and find their own unique approach to the game. As they progress, they will collect powerful relics to upgrade their deck, increasing their abilities and chances of survival. The narrative unfolds as users uncover the secrets behind the destruction of their village, adding depth to the gameplay.

item.title: Archons: Arena
item.description: Game Description Archons: Arena combines deckbuilding and RPG elements, throwing gamers into a harsh world where skill, equipment and tactics are crucial. There are several character classes, each with their own special abilities, allowing users to customize their style to suit their preferences. Whether you’re a secretive rogue, a stalwart knight, or a powerful sorcerer, there’s a class for you. The main mechanic is deckbuilding, in which gamers create their decks without any random elements.

item.title: Surreal Farm
item.description: Game Description Surreal Farm is an adventure game that invites gamers into a vibrant world where imagination and strategy intertwine. Starting with a modest plot of land, gamers grow crops, care for unique animals and turn their farm into a thriving enterprise. As they progress, they discover many fantastical elements, from magical tools to surreal cultures and mythical creatures. The charm lies in the combination of casual gameplay and strategic depth.

item.title: Drill Core
item.description: Game Description Drill Core throws you headlong into the unforgiving depths of alien planets. You are in charge, tasked with managing a motley crew of miners and security guards. Their task? Extract valuable minerals and maintain the drill in working condition. Every swing of the pickaxe, every mounted turret - everything depends on your decisions. One wrong move can spell disaster for your team and the entire mission. But hold on, sunshine and cosmic rainbows don’t last forever here.

item.title: EVOTINCTION
item.description: Game Description EVOTINCTION is a futuristic hacking and stealth game that puts gamers in the role of Dr. Liu, a scientist running a research facility that has been taken over by rogue AIs. The core gameplay centers on using hacking skills to overcome robotic threats and uncover secrets vital to humanity’s survival. The facility is teeming with enemies, ranging from ordinary service robots to deadly, specially created killer bots. These robots follow specific patrol routes and work together under the guidance of a sophisticated artificial intelligence system.

item.title: Fealty
item.description: Game Description Fealty is a tactical turn-based strategy game that has gamers chasing the throne. The action takes place on a procedurally generated island, where a new location appears with each playthrough. At first glance, the goal is simple - to build your lands, expand power and force your rivals to bend the knee, but the adventure game does not let you off the hook so easily. From the very beginning, users have to think ahead.

item.title: Wild Bastards
item.description: Game Description InWild Bastards you’ll find yourself in the captain’s chair of a ragtag spaceship filled with the galaxy’s most notorious criminals. Think space pirates with a penchant for trouble. This isn’t your grandpa’s space opera, but a roguelike shooter where every decision can mean the difference between exploding into stardom or becoming cosmic dust. The missions are spread across a series of tactical campaigns, each of which is an adventure.

item.title: Demolish and Build 3
item.description: Game Description Demolish and Build 3 is a first-person simulator that puts you in the driver’s seat of a demolition company. You will complete orders and lead your team to victory using a variety of tools and heavy equipment. This game will test your skills as you manage your business and complete every project with precision and efficiency. A completely new realistic model of destruction will make you marvel at what you see more than once, since each fragment is physically simulated.

item.title: Satisfactory
item.description: Game Description Satisfactory is an open-world first-person adventure where you build industrial buildings, explore, and fight. Explore a new planet alone or with other users. Build huge structures and do whatever you want in assembly line paradise. You are an employee of FICSIT Corporation. Players can build wherever they want. Expand production in all directions, install factories in the mountains, forests or plains. Mine natural resources found all around you. Build complex networks and transport routes, automate all mechanics, without forgetting about safety.

item.title: Terrorformer TD
item.description: Game Description Terrorformer TD is a tower defense adventure game based on the concept of shaping the battlefield to gain an advantage.
