Here, users not only place towers and upgrade them, but also change the terrain to control the movement of waves of enemies. The idea of ​​being able to raise or lower tiles adds an extra layer to traditional tower defense gameplay. You can change paths, create barriers and generally confuse enemy routes.

item.title: Zero Hour
item.description: Game Description Zero Hour is a multiplayer tactical first-person shooter with realistic game mechanics that replicate the behavior of real special forces units in anti-terrorist operations. The setting for the action is criminal Bangladesh, where banditry is at a high level and is not going to give up ground to law enforcement officers. The locations where clashes between groups of terrorists and special forces occur are made using real scale, which greatly helps the atmosphere and involves gamers in the gameplay.

item.title: Roots of Yggdrasil
item.description: Game Description Roots of Yggdrasil is a roguelike city-building adventure set in a post-Ragnarok world. Players take on the role of Sunna, a Viking leader, and her tribe who must rebuild their society amidst the shattered World Tree. In the title you need to build settlements, explore the Nine Kingdoms and collect artifacts. Each run is a race against time to escape Ginnungagap, the void that threatens to swallow everything.

item.title: The Corpsmen
item.description: Game Description The Corpsmen is a title that offers users a unique task: create and lead teams of creatures in battles with a variety of monsters. From the very beginning, gamers collect monster parts to build creatures of their own design. Each assembled part - be it a leg, tail or head - provides certain skills, leaving room for experimentation. The title relies heavily on strategic planning and creativity. You don’t just throw parts together and hope for the best.

item.title: Castle of Lord Velimir
item.description: Game Description Castle of Lord Velimir takes users on a dangerous journey with the titular hero, a warrior seeking atonement for the sins of humanity. As Velimir journeys through the dungeons, wastelands, and mysterious underworld of Agartha, he will face countless challenges and uncover the secrets of his world. The gameplay is a mixture of strategic combat and exploration. Users must master a variety of fighting techniques to defeat a variety of enemies, each requiring a different approach.

item.title: Age of Mythology: Retold
item.description: Game Description Age of Mythology: Retold is not your average strategy game. It brings mythology into play, allowing you to wage war with a twist. The title features Greek, Norwegian, Egyptian and even Atlantean troops, each with their own special abilities provided by the big men above. Do you think divine intervention will change the course of the battle? Yes, this happens. The campaign is a 50-mission odyssey through a world filled with legendary stories.

item.title: Fantasy Map Simulator
item.description: Game Description Fantasy Map Simulator will be an exciting experience, because this simulator invites history and fantasy lovers to create and watch the development of fictional worlds. Imagine a canvas stretched across centuries, where empires rise and fall, nations emerge, and destinies intertwine. The title allows users to create complex maps, each of which is a testament to their creativity. These cards, like living organisms, develop autonomously, guided by logic.

item.title: Puffin Planes
item.description: Game Description Puffin Planes, a casual adventure game about airline management. In this strategic sandbox, gamers build their aviation empire from the ground up, navigating the skies with a fleet of varied aircraft. From Tokyo to Los Angeles and even to the terraformed surface of Mars, Puffin Planes offers an exciting journey for aviation enthusiasts. As your airline grows, you will need to continually expand your fleet. New aircraft are constantly appearing on the horizon, each with their own unique combination of speed, range, fuel efficiency and capacity.

item.title: We Heist Too
item.description: Game Description We Heist Too takes place in Rivadorium, a city where nothing ever stays the same. Users get used to the role of a thief, move silently through the streets, plan and carry out high-stakes robberies. This world doesn’t require much care, and from the very beginning you will notice that every corner of the city is fraught with opportunity. But the tricky part is knowing which opportunities are worth pursuing.

item.title: Sumerian Six
item.description: Game Description Sumerian Six is not your typical war story. Sure, it throws you right into the middle of World War II, but it’s an alternate history where whispers of folklore and conspiracy theories are as real as the Nazi threat. You take command of Enigma Squad, a strange team of scientist-soldiers. These are brainy people who can outwit and outwit their enemies. Their mission? Prevent the Third Reich from getting its hands on occult weapons.

item.title: Angola '86
item.description: Game Description Angola ‘86 is a strategy game that immerses gamers in a tense and multifaceted border war in South Africa. Users take on the role of a South African Defense Force (SADF) commander who is faced with the challenging task of conducting counter-insurgency operations in a hostile environment. The story, an unstable border region between South Africa and Angola, provides a unique and historically accurate backdrop for strategic decision-making.

item.title: Dale and Dawson Stationery Supplies
item.description: Game Description Dale and Dawson Stationery Supplies, inspired by an early 2000s office drama, immerses gamers in the mundane yet intriguing world of a seemingly typical stationery company. The title randomly assigns you one of three roles: Manager, Specialist or Slacker. Your fate is sealed and your mission begins. Targeted Gameplay: Specialists diligently complete tasks to move the company forward, and slackers imitate specialists so as not to arouse suspicion.

item.title: Megaloot
item.description: Game Description Megaloot occupies a unique niche in the world of role-playing games, requiring gamers to pay meticulous attention to inventory management. Unraveling a mysterious world in which a colossal structure has the ability to replicate objects from countless realities, the title sets the stage for an odyssey filled with strategic choices and tactical delights. Users will find more than 100 different items, each of which boasts its own characteristics. Combine them cleverly to create a dominant build - the possibilities are mind-boggling.

item.title: MEMORIAPOLIS
item.description: Game Description MEMORIAPOLIS is an urban construction set unlike any other. This is a time machine, a sandbox for history buffs. Studio 5PM created this brainchild, offering users a playground for 2500 years. From the dawn of civilization to the Age of Enlightenment, gamers create a city. It’s not just bricks and mortar, it’s a living, breathing organism that reacts to your every move. Time is the currency here. Users go through Antiquity, the Middle Ages, the Renaissance and the Enlightenment.

item.title: Star Command Galaxies
item.description: Game Description Star Command Galaxies is a space simulator in which you play as a ship captain. You need to build your own shuttle, recruit staff and go explore the randomly generated expanses of outer space. Manage your staff, collect resources, fight the alien threat and upgrade your ship. Clear the galaxy from enemies and various parasites. Fight pirates, zombies and many other opponents. You need to monitor the status of your team.

item.title: Peglin
item.description: Game Description Peglin is a side-scrolling RPG adventure with a 2D world. The player will play the role of a fictional peglin creature trying to fight dragons that steal and eat representatives of his race. The main character is a small green creature with big ears. He decided to go to the forest, where the faction’s longtime enemies live. There he will meet his enemies and take back what was stolen by the dragons.

item.title: 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far
item.description: Game Description 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far is a real-time strategy game developed by Petroglyph Games, a continuation of the 8-Bit Armies series. Gamers lead modern military forces across various battlefields, participating in land, sea and air battles. The project offers more than two dozen missions, online skirmishes and cooperative play. A base construction system has been implemented in which players build structures, unlock units and launch attacks. The game is designed for both new and experienced RTS players with an easy to learn interface but a challenging skill ceiling.

item.title: Scourge Of War - Gettysburg
item.description: Game Description Scourge of War - Gettysburg is a real-time strategy game that immerses users in the historical Battle of Gettysburg. The project offers detailed battle simulation, allowing gamers to command units and make strategic decisions that can change the course of history. Gamers can lead Union or Confederate troops, each with their own unique missions and goals. Gameplay in Scourge of War - Gettysburg focuses on tactical command and control.

item.title: Tactical Breach Wizards
item.description: Game Description Tactical Breach Wizards is a tactical role-playing adventure with an isometric camera that allows you to better assess the situation in the location to make the most successful decisions. The user will be transported to an alternative universe, where a distant futuristic future has arrived. The gamer takes control of a group of soldiers who have magical abilities that allow them to be combined with shots from firearms.

item.title: SGS Battle For: Shanghai
item.description: Game Description SGS Battle For Shanghai is a recreation of the battles of the Second Sino-Japanese War, called Stalingrad on the Yangtze. The conflict is taking place in urban areas and on the outskirts of China’s largest port city. Each cell on the map becomes an arena for fierce clashes, where units of different sizes are under command, from regiments to individual battalions. The fighting covers the period from August to November 1937, with each move in the project corresponding to two days of real time.

item.title: shapez 2
item.description: Game Description Shapez 2 is a simulator about the construction of factories with a top view, in which you need to automate the process of processing geometric shapes. Players must build and optimize massive production facilities to solve increasingly complex logistics problems. Gameplay involves cutting, rotating, stacking, painting and delivering shapes to unlock advanced technologies and expand enterprise capabilities. What’s unique is that each object is a separate set of building blocks that can be disassembled, folded, painted and put back together in special ways.

item.title: Frontline Crisis
item.description: Game Description Frontline Crisis combines top-down shooter and tower defense, placing players in the role of defenders in a war against insects. In pixel art adventure games, a lot of attention is paid to strategy and resource management. The main threat is posed by twisted insectoids, which are divided into flying, terrestrial and burrowing. Bosses add a layer of difficulty, requiring quick reflexes and tactical thinking. Unlike traditional Roguelikes, Frontline Crisis focuses on a campaign where gamers unlock new buildings by experimenting with different combinations.

item.title: Exploding Kittens 2
item.description: Game Description Exploding Kittens 2 is the digital version of the beloved card game. A combination of strategy, luck and catty mayhem, this is a game that can be played while waiting in line or killing time. Marmalade Game Studio collaborated with Asmodee and Exploding Kittens Studio to bring this digital version to life. The focus is on maps, strategies, and twists that keep gamers engaged. Play cards, avoid explosions and customize your avatar.

item.title: UBOAT
item.description: Game Description UBOAT is a unique simulator of submarine control during the Second World War. Observe and take direct part in the life of German submariners in the midst of war, when at any moment their refuge could turn into the place of their death. Survive in the open world and control all processes occurring on the submarine. Your players must be well-fed and energized so that your gameplay is not doomed to failure.

item.title: 7 Days to Die
item.description: Game Description In7 Days to Die you will need the ability to loot, kill other players, take loot, build buildings, craft items, shoot accurately and keep track of time, because in the open world there is a night in which zombies and other undead sharpen their attention . A horror first-person shooter that combines city building, multiplayer, survival, tower defense and character leveling in an RPG style. Despite the fact that a severe epidemic has struck the world, you will be able to kill animals to take their meat and skin.

item.title: Artisan TD
item.description: Game Description Artisan TD throws you into the strategy ring, but with a twist. This is, of course, tower defense, but forget about the fact that towers need to be placed anywhere. Here you are an architect who must create the perfect labyrinth to outwit and outwit the enemy hordes. This mechanic adds a layer of complexity that makes the title stand out from the crowd. It’s not just about choosing the most powerful towers, but also about cleverly creating a path that will lead enemies to your defenses, maximizing their impact on your strategically placed towers.

item.title: LOCKDOWN Protocol
item.description: Game Description LOCKDOWN Protocol throws players into a high-stakes world of deception and cooperation. The title combines real-time action and communication, creating a dynamic experience for groups of three to eight people. The idea is simple: players cooperate to complete tasks within a strict time limit. Beneath the surface of unity, however, lies a sinister undercurrent. Trust is a fragile commodity in this environment. Every interaction offers a chance to gather information or sow discord.

item.title: City Bus Manager
item.description: Game Description In City Bus Manager, users will create and maintain their own bus fleet. You have to send vehicles on routes, earning money for transporting passengers. Players will start with a small company that strives to become the most extensive and influential transport organization in a small town. It will be possible to expand, change locations, purchase equipment or sell old ones, as well as upgrade and upgrade your bus fleet in every possible way.

item.title: Emberward
item.description: Game Description Emberward occupies a unique niche in an ever-growing world. Adventure throws players into role-playing tower defense. Intricate labyrinths built from Tetris-like blocks become a battlefield. But it’s not just about stacking blocks: strategically using your arsenal of towers is the key to success. Main task? Defend the flickering flames from the relentless waves of monsters. As the keeper of this precious fire, you will navigate treacherous paths while constantly strategizing to keep the flame alive.

item.title: Knight Fall
item.description: Game Description Knight Fall is an asymmetrical confrontation where each gamer chooses a side in an eternal battle. Controlling unique heroes endowed with special powers becomes the key to victory. The Fire Knight is able to surround enemies with flames, while the Bonecrusher summons skeleton minions to help. All actions are performed by playing cards from the hand, with each card offering several options for use. The battlefield, which is a monastery, is assembled from special location tiles, providing a unique layout for each session.

item.title: ASKA
item.description: Game Description ASKA is a 3rd person action role-playing game in which you can build an unforgettable Viking settlement and survive together with your inhabitants. Your ships land in an unfamiliar world that is constantly changing and full of secrets. You will have to fight, build, repair, fight, grow crops and swim the waves in order to survive the fight against an ancient enemy in the cold winter… You will have to create a self-sufficient tribe, work, create, fight, hunt and lead the people to prosperity.

item.title: Workers and Resources: Soviet Republic
item.description: Game Description InWorkers and Resources: Soviet Republic you have to lead a fallen country and turn it into the strongest republic, making it a superpower with the happiest inhabitants who have built world progress. The urban planning strategy will show you a country that is very similar to the Soviet Union. You accept it broken, plundered, ruined. There is absolutely no money in the treasury, and people have no opportunity to raise territories, plant crops, go to work, simply because there is no money even for food, but you understand that all this can be corrected.

item.title: Go-Go Town!
item.description: Game Description In Go-Go Town! you’ll find yourself in the hot seat—literally, if the sun beating down on your precocious metropolis is anything to go by. You are the mayor, given the reins (and budget, we hope) of a city that is going through hard times. Your task is to breathe new life into it, turning it from the city center into a tourist destination. Think Sim City meets Animal Crossing, with a whimsical twist thrown in for good measure.

item.title: Legend of Mortal
item.description: Game Description InLegend of Mortal you have to become a nobody in the Tang Man sector. Not a prophetic hero, not a legendary warrior - you’re just trying to survive in a world on the edge of the abyss. But even lowlifes have it tough, right? This is what Legend of Mortal is all about: your decisions determine the fate of you and those around you. Think of it this way: every meeting, every battle, every seemingly insignificant conversation is a twist in the kaleidoscope.

item.title: TFC: The Fertile Crescent
item.description: Game Description TFC: The Fertile Crescent shows gamers the period of the birth of civilizations, where they will have to take control of a small settlement of people. The game is a city-planning simulator with strategy elements, where the main emphasis is on historical events of the past. Users will be able to build cities and villages, cultivate the land to produce crops, distribute resources and provisions, and develop the civil and military power of the nascent state.

item.title: Bodycam
item.description: Game Description Bodycam throws you headlong into a hyper-realistic multiplayer battlefield. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this all-new shooter promises a next-gen experience that will redefine your expectations. Teamwork is key here. Every bullet counts, and the victory or defeat of your squad depends on your every decision. Forget playing Rambo. Bodycam requires strategic thinking and coordinated attacks. Team up with your teammates, map out a plan of action, and use your arsenal to outmaneuver your opponents.

item.title: Empires of the Undergrowth
item.description: Game Description Empires of the Undergrowth is a simulation and real-time strategy game with unique mechanics. In the game you will have to manage a colony of ants. Starting to play as one ant, you will hunt, manage builders, and create a unique hive. The design of your hive will determine whether your colony can survive in this harsh world. Why harsh? Throughout the game you will face various obstacles. First of all, these are your enemies!

item.title: Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing
item.description: Game Description Bloody Knuckles Street Boxing challenges those looking for shallow arcade-style fights, focusing solely on skill. The project deliberately creates a deep gap in the level of training of fighters, abandoning any auxiliary systems. There is no room for easy victories here, because every aspect of the battle is under complete control. Thanks to pressure-sensitive controls, the fighter becomes an accurate reflection of the gamer’s actions, requiring tactical understanding and lightning-fast reactions.

item.title: Vendir: Plague of Lies
item.description: Game Description Vendir: Plague of Lies immerses players in a world filled with the atmosphere of a classic CRPG. The Land of Vendir is a vast interactive world that invites players to explore bustling cities, eerie dungeons, and hidden secrets. Strategic turn-based combat is at the heart of the gameplay. Players can choose between brutal melee attacks, mystical spells, or a combination of both to exploit enemy weaknesses and achieve victory.

item.title: WARNO
item.description: Game Description Tactical battles inWARNO take place in real time, where users will be able to take control of modern combat vehicles and go to the front, plunging into the Third World War. The game is made in the genre of strategy and army command simulator, where you need to think through the movement of units and observe the events taking place. The storyline is about a coup that occurs after Gorbachev leaves, creating a tense conflict between states in 1989.

item.title: Songs of Conquest
item.description: Game Description The hero of Songs of Conquest is developing his own kingdom and mercilessly destroys any enemies that stand in his way. A mix of turn-based strategy and RPG, you can become the head of a huge army that uses not only weapons, but also magic in battle to conquer distant territories in order to assert their own power. The game features a level editor, 4 factions to choose from, and the ability to go on a solo adventure or challenge a friend to battle locally or online.

item.title: Homeworld 3
item.description: Game Description Homeworld 3 is a new part of the famous space battle franchise, which is a sequel and continues the storyline. Nevertheless, the game is also suitable for those who are not familiar with the universe, if you only dive into the mode of multiplayer confrontations on ships. Now abandoned galactic stations are scattered across the universe, which have turned into arenas where you can feel the battle with a random user.

item.title: Chrono Ark
item.description: Game Description Chrono Ark is a classic Japanese-style RPG adventure that supports high-resolution textures, but uses similar camera views and turn-based dialogue and battle system rendering. The story campaign is available for completion only in single-player mode; multiplayer is not provided in this project. The gameplay is based on gathering a team, which includes 4 characters, for further leveling up and creating an invincible squad, ready to fight on equal terms with all opponents presented in the locations of the bizarre Distorted World.

item.title: Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition
item.description: Game Description Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition puts you back in the shoes of a freshman at Particus Academy. This is not an easy school - you must assemble a team of students, carefully train them and choose the perfect class, skills and items to give them an advantage in the ferocious dungeons. Enemy hordes can be waiting for you around every corner, so strategic planning is vital. A good hero knows when to fight and when to cut his losses and run!

item.title: Manor Lords
item.description: Game Description Manor Lords is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. The game mechanics center on the realistic process of constructing buildings and intense fights with the enemy army. The building element is based on historical data about cities and villages. All buildings presented in Manor Lords are as authentic as possible. Landscapes and types of terrain influence the process of settlement formation. Create trade routes, establish market relations with neighboring cities and promote the economic prosperity of the settlement.

item.title: Rusty's Retirement
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Retirement allows players to experience farming on the go. Designed as a project for idlers, it allows you to manage a virtual farm while doing other things. Gamers take on the role of Rusty, a retired robot who tends to his crops. The game develops automatically: Rusty plants, waters and harvests crops without constant player interaction. As you progress, you can discover new cultures, adding variety to your virtual fields.

item.title: Bellwright
item.description: Game Description Bellwright throws you into a world of rebellion and intrigue. Finding yourself in prison for a heinous crime, you must not only clear your name, but also organize a revolution against a tyrannical ruler. Build and manage settlements, collect resources and recruit villagers into your ranks. Each new adept brings valuable skills, strengthening your rebellion and unlocking new technologies for your cities. Combat is based on skill and focus.

item.title: Next Jianghu 2
item.description: Game Description Next Jianghu 2 offers a single-player adventure in an open martial arts world. The title emphasizes freedom of action through character development in a sandbox format, offering a plot of over 1 million words with dozens of possible endings. Gamers begin their journey by choosing one of a variety of unique backgrounds: scion of a general exploring the world, diligent scholar, wandering fighter, or young lady escaping an arranged marriage, with each line providing a significant, independent story.

item.title: Lifecraft
item.description: Game Description Lifecraft is a management and construction simulator. The video game can also be classified as a sandbox and strategy game. It has elements of survival. The indie project has two-dimensional pixel graphics. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. This title differs from other similar games in its concept. Instead of managing a factory, you need to control the life support of the cell. The player is asked to organize the work of all its vital functions.

item.title: Our Adventurer Guild
item.description: Game Description Guild in Our Adventurer Guild puts you in the shoes of a new guild master. Inherit a struggling fortress and change it for the better. Complete quests to increase your reputation and send heroes to explore and fight. Manage your team carefully and monitor their morale and relationships. The game features turn-based tactical combat on a grid. Fight a variety of enemies with unique abilities. The Bravery system allows you to push your protagonists to potential excellence, but at the risk of them cracking under the pressure.

item.title: Infection Free Zone
item.description: Game Description Infection Free Zone is a strategic survival game where the player will be responsible for the last remnants of humanity and try to return them to power, at least over the city. All resources are very limited and population expansion is both good and catastrophic, since the consumption of all food increases significantly, which means it is necessary to expand territories and increase production. All the rooms around can be used for your own purposes, restored for comfort, or inventing new uses for them.

item.title: The Lost Village
item.description: Game Description InThe Lost Village you have to restore a once great sect. You take on the role of the heir to a leader who has returned to an abandoned mountain and is tasked with restoring it to its former glory. The game combines a management simulator with roguelike elements. Gamers will guide students by collecting resources, building structures and cultivating the land. Students have unique personalities and talents, allowing assignments to be specialized.

item.title: Buckshot Roulette
item.description: Game Description Two enter, one leaves. That’s the motto ofBuckshot Roulette, a horror game that takes the classic game of Russian Roulette and turns it into a high-stakes shotgun game. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of an underground nightclub, where metal railings beat to the beat of forgotten drum kits and the stakes couldn’t be higher. This is not Russian roulette. This is where you swap the revolver for a 12 gauge shotgun, because shotguns are just better, right?

item.title: Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures
item.description: Game Description Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures is a fast-paced arcade adventure full of danger and ancient secrets, set in an impenetrable jungle. On the way to his cherished goal, the main character is confronted not only by ingenious traps, but also by a whole string of colorful opponents. The path is blocked by evil gorillas, ferocious crocodiles, mysterious shamans and even forest spirits, along with aliens stuck in the thicket.

item.title: Knowledge, or know Lady
item.description: Game Description Knowledge, or know Lady throws you into the heart of a unique dating simulator. As the only guy at an all-girl university, you’ll find yourself caught up in a whirlwind of romance and college life. Will you succumb to the charms of the beauties around you or forge your own path to become a campus legend? Ladies School Prince unfolds through your eyes, offering a first-person perspective. Your

item.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege
item.description: Game Description Outpost: Infinity Siege is a fun sci-fi first-person shooter with elements of base building and tower defense. You command the Mobile Outpost and go with the Protoslug Cannon to deeply explore the forbidden zone of Cygnet, where many dangers await you. Collect unique weapon units and strengthen the firepower of the outpost that is fighting with you. This game combines elements of TD, FPS and RTS at the same time, making the gameplay incredibly exciting.

item.title: Bingle Bingle
item.description: Game Description Bingle Bingle is a unique roulette maker that allows you to create your own roulette to achieve incredible results. The passage begins with a basic wheel and a simple ball, but each successful round opens up new opportunities for modifications. By earning points for successful spins, gamers gain access to upgrades for their inventory. This process requires careful planning after each step. The main goal is to build an effective strategy that allows you to create powerful synergies.

item.title: Dune: Imperium
item.description: Game Description Combining deckbuilding and worker management, Dune: Imperium takes you into the intricacies of Frank Herbert’s famous universe. In this tabletop strategy game, players take on the role of leaders of various factions vying for power over the desert planet Arrakis. The latter is the only repository of the coveted spice melange, a substance that gives psychic abilities and longevity, plays a key role in interstellar travel and the stability of the galactic empire.

item.title: Mythical Mayhem
item.description: Game Description Mythical Mayhem is an exciting game where heroes from neighboring kingdoms battle formidable enemies and villains. With a wide variety of scenarios to choose from, as well as the ability to create your own game using unlocked decks, the possibilities are endless. The focus here isn’t just on building a powerful deck. It also involves skillful management of the strengths and weaknesses of each kingdom. Balancing states becomes a crucial factor in the progression process, given their interaction with each other.

item.title: Backpack Battles
item.description: Game Description Backpack Battles is a unique PvP game where everything depends on the contents of your backpack. Forget about deft kicking or pressing buttons - here, winning is achieved by assembling the perfect bag arsenal. The core gameplay revolves around purchasing and arranging items in your inventory. These items come in different shapes, sizes and rarities, presenting a strategic puzzle as you put them together for maximum effectiveness. Don’t limit yourself to simply stockpiling - by combining these items, you can unlock even more powerful equipment, such as brewing a potion or forging a legendary weapon.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description: Game Description In Between the Stars, a space simulator, the gamer discovers new territories, fights with numerous opponents and upgrades his own ship. The hero’s goal is to save the Interstellar Republic. The game has procedural generation of the environment, enemies and stations. The protagonist’s universe is suffering from attacks from the Children of the Sun clan. Enemy representatives have appeared from other worlds and are trying to capture these spaces.

item.title: Dawnsbury Days
item.description: Game Description Dawnsbury Days provides a turn-based tactical RPG experience based on the PF2E ruleset, a system derived from tabletop entertainment under the Open Game License. Gamers take control of four childhood friends as they embark on their first meaningful adventures in this strategic environment. The main goal requires protecting the characters' hometown from many dangers that threaten its stability. Gameplay mechanics emphasize grid positioning and calculated combat, stemming directly from the established rules system.

item.title: Quilts and Cats of Calico
item.description: Game Description Quilts & Cats of Calico is a unique, warm and cozy puzzle game. Here you will have the opportunity to work as a tailor and create a unique quilt from scraps. Combine colors and patterns on your scraps to not only score points, but also attract cute cats who will decide where to snooze on your creation. If you’re a board game fan, you’ll be happy to know that this is a digital version of the already beloved board game.

item.title: ChronoDojo
item.description: Game Description ChronoDojo is a co-op adventure in which a group of humble heroes embark on a journey through time to save the world. Under the guidance of their mentor Sensei, the characters will have to master the martial art of Chrono-Fu. Their headquarters is ChronoDojo itself, a martial arts school that can travel between eras and doubles as a tea house. You will have to confront waves of bizarre enemies in three different historical periods, using unique abilities and well-coordinated teamwork.

item.title: KeeperRL
item.description: Game Description KeeperRL is a simulator with roguelike elements in which you have to build an underground base and develop a society. You play as a powerful wizard learning black magic. Train minions in military affairs, forcing them to attack civilians in settlements, taking their belongings and burning houses to the ground. Build dungeons, set traps and build up your military power to attack the pitiful people. Be prepared for human heroes to decide to attack back.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal ofMyth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Rail Route
item.description: Game Description Rail Route is an economic simulator in which the user will encounter railway dispatching. Training will help you understand difficult mechanics and terms. The passage begins with a small railway system with limited terrain. The player will have to expand the paths, increase profits by creating new roads, shortening them and using different chips. To improve business, you can accept new train contracts, modernize trains and modify the railway network.

item.title: Balatro
item.description: Game Description Balatro - the word “poker” crackles with energy, whispering promises of high stakes and cunning deals. This poker roguelike beckons players into a deck-building odyssey where bluffing becomes the spell and chips become your lifeblood. Forget about limping into pots with low pairs. Here you create powerful synergies by weaving intricate combinations that unleash explosive power. Valid poker hands dance with unique wild cards, their abilities changing the course of the game like a magician.

item.title: Nexus Defenders
item.description: Game Description Nexus Defenders involves deploying a varied arsenal of towers to stop invading enemy forces. The player augments these stationary fortifications with special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. Real-time tactical action combined with a visual novel structure. By making decisions in branching dialogues, you can directly influence the development of the plot and its central conflicts, thereby shaping the further course of the narrative. The story of Nexus Defenders follows a newly minted captain tasked with protecting the planet after the Spinal Nexus is suddenly compromised.

item.title: News Tower
item.description: Game Description News Tower transports gamers to the bustling streets of 1930s New York, where the world of newspaper publishing becomes the stage for a complex game of strategy and decision-making. The action takes place at a time when the country was experiencing major social and political changes, and users are asked to take on the role of a newspaper publisher. The challenge is to manage a successful operation while balancing the rapidly changing demands of the media industry and navigating the complexities of the era.

item.title: WitchHand
item.description: Game Description In WitchHand, you take on the role of a powerful witch leading her coven to gain a foothold in the pristine Ninth Kingdom. Use cards to build your empire, strategically manage resources to ensure growth, and choose your path - forge alliances, defeat rivals, or delve into the secrets of the Ninth Realm. Each witch boasts unique spells, buildings, and units to suit different playstyles. The Celestial Sorceress boosts village production, the Chaos Witch crushes enemies with brute force, and the Witch Chef prepares delicious dishes that boost your coven’s stats.

item.title: Legendary Hoplite
item.description: Game Description Legendary Hoplite uses a setting inspired by Greek mythology. The project has its own history, lore and secrets that are revealed as you earn achievements. In the story, Odysseus, who returned from Troy, did not rule Ithaca for long, because he was killed by his own illegitimate son. After this, the city-state was besieged by legions of the dead. Dio volunteered to defend the policy. The young commander can build objects, summon units, use ordinary equipment and use artifacts blessed by the ancient gods themselves.

item.title: GU LONG FENGYUN LU
item.description: Game Description GU LONG FENGYUN LU is a massive martial arts RPG based on the classic works of Gu Long, the famous Chinese writer. The plot tells about the turbulent times of the end of the Ming Dynasty, when various heroes and factions fought for power and glory. The main character is Feng Yun, a young martial artist traveling across the country, encountering friends, enemies, love, hate, loyalty and betrayal.

item.title: Rogue Fable IV
item.description: Game Description Rogue Fable IV is the latest installment in the long-running rogue series. This iteration manages to strike a balance between complexity and brevity, offering gamers a focused yet deep experience. The goal is simple: navigate the Dungeons of Fate, a dangerous labyrinth full of traps, enemies and secrets, in pursuit of the legendary Cup of Yendor. This cup, a coveted artifact, is believed to grant immortality or drive madness to those who seek it.

item.title: Stargate: Timekeepers
item.description: Game Description The events of the Stargate: Timekeepers project take place within a separate universe called SG-1. It all begins with the Battle of Antarctica, where Commander Eve McKine leads the battle against Anubis' fleet. After this, the user will be able to take control of a squad subordinate to this very Eve in order to penetrate behind enemy lines and complete a number of dangerous tasks. The outcome of the war depends on this, so no one has the right to make a mistake.

item.title: The Universim
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city construction, the development of an entire planet and a ward civilization -The Universim is a short sand strategy in which you have to try on the role of God. The game begins with the fact that you settle several people on one of the planets, give them food, indicate what needs to be done - set priorities. And then watch how people develop on their own, without your help.

item.title: UltraNothing
item.description: Game Description UltraNothing is about a philosophical journey to a state of absolute peace called divine nothingness, and getting rid of the metaphorical noise. The project challenges conventional ideas about the genre, organically combining elements of platforming and deep strategic planning. It’s all about solving puzzles, where the end goal is often to get a specific item to a terminal. Gradually, the mechanics of turn-based command of units, construction of structures, and even survival in an abstract environment are integrated into the gameplay.

item.title: All Quiet in the Trenches
item.description: Game Description In All Quiet in the Trenches, gamers find themselves in the complex environment of the First World War. The title revolves around managing a group of soldiers during a war, balancing the harsh realities of the battlefield with the personal needs of the men under your command. Users take on the role of a German non-commissioned officer, a non-commissioned officer, and control a unit in the trenches. Combining tactical decisions and human interaction, the title unfolds through a series of decisions that affect the fate of soldiers.

item.title: New Cycle
item.description: Game Description New Cycle is a dark city building sim and colony management simulator. This project is made in a post-apocalyptic setting. It takes place in the near future, where people are divided into tribes. In the story, after a powerful solar flare, the planet plunged into chaos. The player is offered to create a new civilization on the ruins of the old one and restore the unity of humanity. The user leads a group of survivors.

item.title: SeaOrama: World of Shipping
item.description: Game Description SeaOrama: World of Shipping is a game that puts you in the captain’s chair of your own growing maritime empire. Forget romantic notions of rolling waves and salty sunsets; it’s a game of hard hats and spreadsheets where strategic instinct reigns supreme. Start with the only reliable tug - your gateway to a global network of 90 ports, each a microcosm of supply and demand. Analyze the ebb and flow of trade winds, not only marine, but also economic and political.

item.title: Against the Storm
item.description: Game Description Against the Storm combines two genres. This is a city planning simulator and part-time roguelike. In this game, the gamer becomes a scout and mayor of different cities. The player is transported to a fantasy world where the rain never stops. The settlements are inhabited by people and humanoid intelligent animals: beavers and lizards. In Against the Storm, the user, being the queen’s deputy and pioneer, builds and develops colonies in various biomes, and also satisfies the needs of the population.

item.title: Revive and Prosper
item.description: Game Description Revive and Prosper combines the challenge of building a factory with the tension of surviving in a post-apocalyptic world. Users find themselves at the head of a mission to restore civilization after a catastrophe that changed the world. With limited resources and a barren landscape, the game requires careful planning, strategy, and a fair amount of resilience. As gamers progress, they must build automated factories to manage major production lines, keeping their new world functioning in the face of natural disasters and ever-changing environmental conditions.

item.title: Soulash 2
item.description: Game Description Soulash 2 is an intriguing RPG in which you step into the shoes of an exiled god seeking revenge. The expansive procedurally generated world is a playground replete with simulated history, a dynamic economy, and a huge number of races, factions, and creatures just waiting to be interacted with. The power to conquer and rebuild this world lies in the hands of the player, who wields divine powers and abilities.

item.title: Arma Reforger
item.description: Game Description Arma Reforger is an action game that places great emphasis on the realism of what is happening and allows you to fight on a huge territory of 51 square kilometers. The action takes place during the Cold War. Players can create their own unique scenarios in Game Master mode. The shooter allows you to return to Everon - a microstate with Cold War Assault. Essentially, Arma Reforger acts as a modifiable platform, inviting participants to create their own stories and combat scenarios.

item.title: Of Blades and Tails
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric adventures in Of Blades and Tails take gamers into a fantasy world where the main character is a sly fox. The game is made in the genre of role-playing adventure, which is drawn in old-school pixel graphics. A cunning and savvy fox named Riff sets off on a long journey due to the events that have occurred that affected his native clan and other inhabitants of the kingdom living in the territory of a large state.

item.title: Polylithic
item.description: Game Description Polylithic takes players into the heart of the Paleolithic/Neolithic era, where survival depends on cunning, resourcefulness and ingenuity. As the newly minted leader of your tribe, you’ll face the daunting task of leading your people through a vibrant, low-poly wilderness teeming with both opportunity and danger. You will spend the first days in a frantic struggle for survival. Hunger gnaws at your belly, the elements threaten your fragile existence, and every rustle in the underbrush can attract a predator.

item.title: Stronghold: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Stronghold: Definitive Edition brings medieval England to life in a strategic and addictive game. In this classic real-time strategy, gamers will have to restore a destroyed kingdom, unite disparate forces and fight the insidious villains - the Rat, the Pig, the Snake and the Wolf. The story takes place on a war-torn frontier where the king has been betrayed and the kingdom is on the brink of collapse. The user will have to go through a series of missions - from lifting sieges and capturing enemy castles to building grandiose fortresses and defending against continuous assaults.

item.title: Buildement
item.description: Game Description Builderment is a fun factory-building game that puts you in a world on the verge of running out of resources. In this virtual world, your mission is clear: go to a distant planet, collect vital materials and build a modern factory capable of teleporting these resources to Earth, thereby saving our precious planet. Automation and craftsmanship are at the heart of the project. You start by extracting valuable resources and gradually move on to creating complex items.

item.title: Cavalry Girls
item.description: Game Description Cavalry Girls is an exciting top-down shooter that immerses you in a futuristic world where brave and fearless girl soldiers fight unforgiving enemies. This addicting game seamlessly combines action, strategy and customization to deliver an immersive gaming experience. In a world where the versatile mineral “jade” fuels a bionic revolution and sparks conflict, players take on the role of commander of a team that directs mechanized armor-piercing girls to defend a besieged city from enemy forces.

item.title: Endless Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Endless Dungeon belongs to the Roguelite and Action genre. The title is directly related to the Endless franchise. It includes several global turn-based strategies, as well as one hybrid of Roguelike and Tower Defense. So this is the second roguelike in the series. The name of the project is similar to Dungeon of the Endless, a previous game from the same developers. And for good reason, because both projects have a lot in common.

item.title: Hexarchy
item.description: Game Description Hexarchy is a turn-based strategy game that combines elements of battle royale and TCG. You are given only an hour of real time to build a new civilization and lead it to greatness. The gameplay is based on classic 4X mechanics. Train your army to destroy your enemies. Engage in trade and build wonders of the world. Both single-player and multiplayer modes are available. In online battles, it can host up to 10 people at the same time.

item.title: Executive Assault 2
item.description: Game Description Executive Assault 2 is an ambitious blend of first-person shooter and real-time strategy genres, where you build and maintain a vast base on the planet you are trying to conquer. Design and deploy your robotic troops wisely and manage available resources wisely to achieve victory. Visually the game looks much better; with shiny surfaces and a sleek new UI design, it’s certainly not cutting-edge graphics, but at least the series doesn’t look noticeably dated now.

item.title: Sumerians
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of Sumerians is based on the story of 3000 BC in Mesopotamia, a time of rapid settlement growth and the development of Sumerian cities. The player will play the role of a ruler and will build his own city, manage resources, plan future infrastructure and try to cope with the economy. In the process you only have to improve the city, build and manage the economy, there are no wars or attacks, but there will be numerous obstacles created by the population or nature.

item.title: Quasimorph
item.description: Game Description Quasimorph, an immersive, dark turn-based RPG with loot elements, puts you in the shoes of a seasoned PMC fighter embarking on an arduous journey. In this project, your main goal is to unravel the sinister mystery that threatens all life, and you will do this by accumulating the corpses of your clones. Set in a future where space has been privatized and corporations seek control of the solar system and beyond, the game delves into a world of corporate warfare and dark secrets.

item.title: Black Forest
item.description: Game Description Plunging players into a world of danger, death and despair, Black Forest offers a unique twist on the city-building genre. As the headman of an ill-fated village, your only goal is to survive. The journey begins with gathering resources and fortifying the village to prepare for the terrible night ahead. Will you emerge victorious, enduring all horrors until salvation comes, or will you give in in the face of insurmountable challenges?

item.title: InfraSpace
item.description: Game Description InfraSpace gives users the opportunity to become mayors of the cities of the future. This city-planning simulator uses a sci-fi setting. Users manage Martian colonies. Gradually, these settlements grow into megacities. The indie title offers relaxing gameplay. In InfraSpace, gamers mine resources, build buildings, and satisfy the needs of the population. There is training and sandbox mode. You can place residential buildings, set up concrete steel mills and other factories, and build roads.

item.title: Evolutions
item.description: Game Description Evolings, a turn-based role-playing game, takes you on an exciting journey through a setting teeming with fearsome monsters and cute creatures. Your main task is to assemble a formidable team of Evolings, each with their own abilities and personalities, to face the dangers that lurk on each level. What distinguishes the project from standard RPGs is the ability to gain new, unique impressions from each level completed. New tasks, objects and plots are constantly appearing in the title.

item.title: Moonstone Island
item.description: Game Description Moonstone Island is a life-sim with collecting creatures, immersing you in a huge open world full of adventures. The game has 100 islands to explore, promising an exciting journey like no other. As someone who has visited this enchanting world, I can say that Moonstone Island offers a truly unique and exciting experience. You step into the shoes of a novice alchemist, following village traditions. Your task is to undergo alchemy training on a floating island in the sky.

item.title: Galaxy Pass Station
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Pass Station, a comical space station colony simulation, takes players on a whimsical journey into the bustling world of intergalactic hospitality. We will take on the role of the first stationmaster, who will provide excellent service and build the most wonderful center in the galaxy for a variety of alien guests. Here are 13 alien races, each of which has its own quirks and characteristics: the mysterious Tintukians, funny Zubenoids, curious Martians, mischievous Slu, incomprehensible Grays and many others.

item.title: ABRISS - build to destroy
item.description: Game Description ABRISS - build to destroy is a simulator based on physical laws. The gameplay is focused on building an atmospheric layer that destroys physics. The user has access to many designs that can crash into specified targets and destroy them. The story campaign gradually opens up access to new details, which will allow you to destroy large creations and observe entropy in digital and futuristic landscapes. Opportunities in construction and destruction:

item.title: The Matchless KungFu
item.description: Game Description The Matchless KungFu immerses users in a world where martial arts are at the forefront. The gamer can choose the path of any warrior he likes and go on a journey through these lands. Be a loner or join a group of like-minded people - you can choose any convenient way. Only the decisions made will shape the character’s story, throwing him into different circumstances, giving him complete freedom of action in certain aspects.

item.title: Looper Tactics
item.description: Game Description Looper Tactics is a card role-playing strategy, the gameplay of which is built around exploring the world and revealing the secrets of an ancient civilization. With the advent of the human faction, gamers have new tactical options at their disposal based on 5 unique combat mechanics. These skills allow you to temporarily unite creatures, sacrifice some fighters to strengthen others, and activate special skills when calling allies. This race is led by a hero named Jester, and some units even receive the status of immortals, which radically changes the approach to battles.

item.title: Hadean Tactics
item.description: Game Description A strategy with elements of the card game Hadean Tactics invites you to choose one of the Heroes and go fight the creatures of darkness, descending into mystical dungeons. Dungeons in Hadean Tactics are randomly generated. The combat system is represented by turn-based elements, where the assembled deck plays the main role in building tactics. Not a single fight will be similar to the previous one. Enemies are represented by a huge variety of monsters, ranging from weak units to demon lords.

item.title: BOOK OF HOURS
item.description: Game Description BOOK OF HOURS is a role-playing game with point-n-click elements, the events of which take place in an occult library. The ancient building is located right on the seashore. Sitting within its walls you can hear the sound of the surf and the rain hitting the roof. For five centuries, the Hush House Library has been a center of knowledge. But one day there was a terrible fire. Many books burned, and the librarian himself died under a huge rubble of shelves with books.

item.title: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew
item.description: Game Description Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew is a unique stealth strategy game about cursed pirates in the Dark Caribbean! In this alternate version of the Golden Age of Piracy, the curse of lost souls hangs over a chain of islands ruled by evil inquisitors who try to burn all unusual pirates. You must assemble a crew of 8 cursed pirates, each with their own personality and supernatural powers, to recover Captain Mordecai’s mysterious treasure and defeat the army of the Inquisition.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3
item.description: Game Description Baldur’s Gate 3 is a continuation of the cult turn-based RPG in which you take control of a small squad consisting of unique characters. Each party member is of great importance to tactics and represents an individual with his own character, history and abilities. Baldur’s Gate 3 invites you to explore the large open world of the Forgotten Realm. The plot does not act as a direct continuation of the previous part, however, illithids appear in the narrative - they are also mind flayers.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3
item.description: Game Description Baldur’s Gate 3 is a continuation of the cult turn-based RPG, in which you will take control of a small squad consisting of unique characters. Each party member is of great importance to tactics and represents an individual with his own character, history and abilities. Baldur’s Gate 3 invites you to explore the large open world of the Forgotten Realm. The plot does not act as a direct continuation of the previous part, however, illithids appear in the narrative - they are also mind flayers.

item.title: Supreme Ruler 2030
item.description: Game Description Supreme Ruler 2030 is a political simulator in which you take on the role of the ruler of any modern country and manage its diplomacy, espionage, economy and military forces. Optimize your military and generate additional income by researching, producing, buying and selling military equipment. Assemble combined battle groups to counter enemy tactics and deploy your naval battle groups as fleets to defend your sea borders from enemy invasion.

item.title: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward
item.description: Game Description Punch Club 2: Fast Forward is a 2D action fighting game for real fighters who are not afraid of difficulties and are ready to fight their way through life’s challenges. You, as the main character, have spent 20 long years patiently waiting for your moment in your mother’s cramped garage, dreaming of a better life and searching for your missing father. But life doesn’t give you anything for nothing, and there will be many obstacles and troubles on your way.

item.title: Techtonica
item.description: Game Description Techtonica is a factory construction and management simulator. Compared to many other similar games, this title stands out in that all actions here must be carried out from a first-person view. The second feature is that the plant itself is underground. Unlike most sandboxes, there is an end goal. There is also end-game content. Here you need to extract resources, build and move objects, stretch conveyor belts, automate production, craft improved tools to be able to go even deeper.

item.title: Xenonauts 2
item.description: Game Description Xenonauts 2 is a continuation of the game of the same name, developed based on X-COM: UFO Defense. Events take place in an alternate universe during the Cold War. Xenonauts 2 is not a direct sequel and tells its own story. Stylistically, the game is made in the genres of turn-based strategy and tactical RPG. The player will take control of a multinational team of soldiers opposing the invasion of an alien race.

item.title: Shadows of Forbidden Gods
item.description: Game Description Shadows of Forbidden Gods invites the player to become a Dark Elder God and lead skilled agents. The task of the subjects is to cause an apocalypse in a fantasy world. You have to lead your own minions and help them with your own powerful abilities. Working in the shadows will require you to avoid heroes trying to stop the oncoming threat. The gameplay is presented in the form of a strategy, and the user receives the only task - to arrange an apocalypse on a mysterious planet.

item.title: Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity
item.description: Game Description Tyrannis: Co-Prosperity continues the story of its predecessor, placing gamers in the thick of a battle with the Kirihara Group, a dominant megacorporation. The title introduces new challenges as freelancers take on the Kirihara Group’s security division, using guerrilla tactics to fight back in a dystopian East Asia. With the addition of 40 new maps and a revamped campaign, the stakes become higher as players navigate a landscape filled with tension and conflict.

item.title: The Pegasus Expedition
item.description: Game Description The Pegasus Expedition is a 4X strategy game in a sci-fi setting in which humanity is faced with the threat of extermination. The action takes place in the world of an alternative future, in which people unintentionally started an intergalactic war and they are unlikely to emerge victorious from it. Civilization must leave its home and go to the constellation Pegasus, where they will not be reached by numerous opponents from among intelligent alien races.

item.title: Space Reign
item.description: Game Description Space Reign is an exciting project that combines several colorful formats. In addition to the main storyline, there is a sandbox mode in which you can freely explore the universe and engage in open-ended gameplay. Here you need to try different strategies, experiment with the configuration of ships, discover hidden secrets and rare resources. One of the product’s strengths is its attention to detail and immersion. The universe feels alive - bustling space stations, bustling trade routes, clashes with friendly and hostile factions.

item.title: Age of Fear: Total
item.description: Game Description Age of Fear: Total is a comprehensive package that combines the titles in the series into a single whole. It brings together past releases, future updates and downloadable content - all designed to provide a rich experience. Whether you’re a longtime fan or a newcomer, the set offers a unique opportunity to delve into the series' expansive universe. Over 100 hours of gameplay promise a world filled with different characters, factions and challenges.

item.title: Dead Monarchy
item.description: Game Description Dead Monarchy is an addictive gameplay that puts you in the role of captain of a mercenary company, taking command and navigating a dangerous open world sandbox. This game offers a huge number of opportunities and dangers lurking around every corner. From fields to camps, caves to ruins, cemeteries to fortresses, the varied locations provide exciting environments for you to explore. The combat system in Dead Monarchy is where the game really shines.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2
item.description: Game Description Fuga: Melodies of Steel 2 takes you to a war-torn world where they take on the role of a group of children going through dangerous adventures. Their vehicle? A colossal tank named Tarasque. This turn-based RPG features revamped combat, an innovative event system, and a gripping storyline that will tug at your heartstrings and test your moral compass. The story takes place a year after the events of its predecessor, in which the children successfully stopped the war and saved their families, but peace proves to be a fleeting concept.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon 2
item.description: Game Description Darkest Dungeon II, an exciting and intense roguelike game, immerses players in a nightmarish world on the brink of the apocalypse. In the game you have to become a brave leader, assemble a squad, equip your trusty stagecoach and go on a difficult journey through a crumbling landscape. As you plunge into the depths, you’ll soon discover that the biggest threat may come from your squad. The combat system, renowned for its innovation in the original Darkest Dungeon, makes a triumphant return in the sequel.

item.title: Age of Wonders 4
item.description: Game Description Age of Wonders 4 is a turn-based strategy with tactical battles that takes the player to a magical kingdom where they have to lead their empire to greatness. You will need to collect magic books to unlock new abilities and possibilities. Together with your army, you must enter into the final battle for the existence of the world. You need to create your own unique society, defining the appearance of its inhabitants, choosing their culture and magical abilities.

item.title: Staffer Case: A Supernatural Mystery Adventure
item.description: Game Description Staffer Case: A Supernatural Mystery Adventure is a supernatural mystery adventure set in a fictional London in the 1960s, where people with unique skills, known as staffers, find themselves at the center of increasingly strange incidents. The user will have to take the place of Notrik, a detective from the Mana affairs department, who is tasked with unraveling a series of crimes. Unlike ordinary criminal investigations, this title requires a different approach.

item.title: Ash of Gods: The Way
item.description: Game Description Ash of Gods: The Way is a tactical role-playing game that challenges enemies in intense turn-based combat. You need to collect two decks, line up units in three lines and join one of six factions. The gameplay is presented with limitless possibilities in making decisions and choosing tactics. Events begin 20 years after the end of the Last War. Frieza and Berkana make a shaky but peace. Unfortunately, grievances and disagreements do not go away, but they fade into the background for a while.

item.title: Dungeon Drafters
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Drafters is a top-down, turn-based roguelike with an emphasis on tactical combat. The project uses anime style and card game mechanics. An adventurer with red hair is given control. It moves through cells. The indie product has mini-games. For example: fishing. In the title you can unlock new characters. When confronted with opponents, the combat phase begins, and immediately, without switching to another screen, as in a JRPG.

item.title: TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator
item.description: Game Description TasteMaker: Restaurant Simulator is a management simulator for a small restaurant that is constantly growing under the strict guidance of the player. The user will have to correctly distribute the available money in the account in order not to turn the food establishment into an unprofitable business that will be forced to close. The game from an indie developer, for whom this brainchild is a debut in the video game industry, gives the gamer full and extensive rights to manage this place, which obliges him to organize all the processes required for normal functioning independently.

item.title: Volcano Princess
item.description: Game Description Volcano Princess is a charming RPG that puts you in the role of a single parent raising a daughter in a kingdom blessed by a powerful goddess. But your daughter’s fate is in your hands, and you must make the right choices to prepare her for her future role as the country’s next monarch. After your wife left, you became the sole guardian of your child. Now you need to provide her with everything she needs to be happy and successful in school and everyday life.

item.title: Shardpunk
item.description: Game Description Shardpunk is an isometric game whose gameplay is a mixture of XCOM and Darkest Dungeon. The setting is made in steampunk style. In the Capitol of the Empire, where the action takes place, a plague epidemic began and the streets were filled with rats. You take control of a survivor trying to escape the city. On your way you will meet survivors whom you can save. It is necessary not only to go through the entire Capitol, but also to defeat a huge number of mutated creatures, explore locations, collect useful resources and try to survive in this nightmare.

item.title: Wartales
item.description: Game Description Wartales is an open-world role-playing adventure that lets you lead your team of mercenaries on a treasure hunt. Events take place in a medieval fantasy world. You need to travel across continents, recruit party members, explore ancient tombs and collect rewards. The plot begins with the fall of the great Edoran Empire. The kingdom is engulfed in a plague, killing every living thing in its path. In connection with this, banditry, theft, murder and looting increased.

item.title: Wildfrost
item.description: Game Description Wildfrost is an exciting tactical RPG deck builder where gamers can take on the elements and banish the eternal winter! In a world conquered by the Fierce Cold, you are the only reliable stronghold of humanity capable of withstanding the eternal blizzard. You must travel across the frozen tundra, collect powerful companion cards and elemental items, and finally reach the Sun Temple to put an end to the frost.

item.title: Meet Your Maker
item.description: Game Description Meet Your Maker invites you to plunge into a post-apocalyptic world, where each level is created by gamers themselves. You have to fight both alone and in pairs with a friend, building cunning labyrinths of terrible traps and guards at your bases in order to protect the most valuable thing - genetic material. As Guardian of the Chimera, a living experiment created to save life on Earth, you must capture other players' bases and extract even more material from them.

item.title: Phantom Brigade
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brigade is a turn-based science fiction strategy game. The action takes place in a country that has become the victim of a large-scale invasion by a foreign power. Enemy forces defeated the army and began the occupation. You will have to act as a resistance commander trying to reclaim his homeland from the invaders. The player spends most of his time commanding units of small mechs and completing dangerous missions in a turn-based system.

item.title: The Pale Beyond
item.description: Game Description The Pale Beyond is a survival visual novel where every choice has a solution. The Arctic is harsh and cruel to anyone who decides to enter its territory, and explorers must always be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. But even they can be broken by some kind of misfortune and being on the verge of death from lack of food and terrible cold. Several years ago, the ship Viscount set out in search of the absolute South, but failed and never returned.

item.title: Company of Heroes 3
item.description: Game Description Company of Heroes 3 continues the turn-based strategy series, which unfolds in real time. The theater of military operations is the Mediterranean, where it is also important to make strategically correct decisions, planning every step. It features thoughtful gameplay, a new battle front, many units and factions, and the opportunity to take part in cinematically evolving battles. In TBS, the user fights with different factions using battle groups and units, controlling air, sea and ground types of troops, operating in a realistically destructible environment, taking part in a military conflict during the Second World War.

item.title: Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator
item.description: Game Description Ages of Conflict: World War Simulator is a unique map simulation game where gamers will witness epic battles between self-created or random AI-controlled nations. Here you can control the chosen powers, adjust world events to your preferences and follow their struggle for dominance in an infinite number of worlds. Get the unique experience of watching your own or random nations fight for control of the world. Players will face massive battles, uprisings and political upheavals, and only they will be able to determine who will be the great winner.

item.title: The Last Starship
item.description: Game Description The Last Starship is a simulator for controlling a spaceship and its crew with strategy elements. Set in a sci-fi setting, the indie project uses a top-down view and 2D graphics in the style of pixel art. Here the player is offered to build his own huge aircraft and go on a journey through the galaxy. It is also possible to take one of several ready-made options, previously invented by the developers.

item.title: Spectator
item.description: Game Description Spectator can please fans of Internet folklore. This game is inspired by popular urban legends. Here you can go Backstage, visit Slenderman’s habitat and visit other locations. It’s full of all kinds of references. The video game is a representative of the point-and-click survival horror genre. The indie title uses a first-person perspective. Before you start, you can choose one of 3 difficulty types: normal, hard and nightmare. There are 6 levels (days) in total.

item.title: Indies' Lies
item.description: Game Description The adventures in Indies' Lies immerse players in a dark fantasy world where they must fight against a variety of monsters. The game is made in the card battler genre, where you need to build a deck before battles. Players will go through missions that are randomly generated in roguelike style. Users will upgrade their squad of heroes by collecting Allies, customizing Runes and improving the Talents of the protagonists through a special Deck.

item.title: Blessed Work
item.description: Game Description Blessed Work is an old-school casual strategy game in which you have to ensure the safety of your builders while completing the construction of a facility. Gamers must place objects, activate buttons, and move items to prevent their workers from dying due to a lack of safety measures at the construction site. There are 50 stages, each with over 10 mechanics, making it a challenging challenge that will keep players engaged for hours.

item.title: Warsim: The Realm of Aslona
item.description: Game Description Warsim: The Realm of Aslona is a kingdom management simulator. The indie game combines elements of roguelike, adventure and strategy. The project uses a fantasy setting and ASCII graphics. A world consisting of 100 locations are created randomly. As well as the races inhabiting it and the events taking place in it. Procedural generation is capable of producing 94887852 variations of creatures. Among them are fire orcs, eyeless elves, trench dwarves and others.

item.title: Master of Magic
item.description: Game Description Master of Magic (2022) is a remake of the once classic project, which at one time attracted the attention of a large number of people. Users, as before, will have to go a long way through the territory of two neighboring worlds - Arcanus and Mirror - in order to face the strongest sorcerers for the title of the strongest. In total, there are 14 different wizards to choose from with their own unique abilities, who, among other things, are representatives of different schools.

item.title: Voor De Kroon
item.description: Game Description Historical battles in Voor De Kroon take place during the Dark Middle Ages, where knights with bladed weapons ruled. The game is a tactical slasher game where users will be able to engage in large-scale battles and at the same time control the coordination and movement of troops by giving orders. The main task is to seize the throne in order to conquer the Dutch kingdom in the 13th century.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress
item.description: Game Description Dwarf Fortress is a strategy game with a complex open world simulation. You control a race of dwarves whose goal is to build their own fortress. To collect resources, you need to go explore the huge open world. Territories are generated randomly and contain many dangers. Don’t let your civilization fall into decay! Mechanics are represented by combat skills, physical properties of materials, pain, nausea, various poisoning effects, etc.

item.title: Spire of Glory
item.description: Game Description Spire of Glory is a pixelated action roguelike that will take you on a climb to the top of this majestic mountain to prove your worth. Start your journey from scratch and make the right choices to become strong enough to overcome all the challenges of the Spire. To survive, you will have to fight enemies and collect crystals to purchase and upgrade items, as well as expand your team.

item.title: In Nightmare
item.description: Game Description In Nightmare allows gamers to plunge into a dark atmosphere where they have to take control of a boy who has lost his beloved. The protagonist will make his way through dangerous locations where monsters live. The project is a horror adventure game with elements of an action platformer, where you need to overcome various obstacles on the hero’s path, solve puzzles, deal with monsters and look for the right path out of the frightening kingdom of darkness.

item.title: Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten
item.description: Game Description Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten is an opportunity to immerse yourself in rich fantasy adventures, where gamers get to enjoy the gameplay mechanics of classic JRPGs. Players will travel through the small province of Ennakamuy, which is located on the border with the Yamato Empire. The protagonist lives an ordinary life until he becomes forced to investigate a mysterious violation. The guy eventually meets the girl and learns more details about the events taking place in the world.

item.title: Floodland
item.description: Game Description Floodland is a city builder with survival, strategy and roguelike elements. With each new playthrough, the map is generated randomly. Events are also generated randomly. This increases replayability. The project uses a post-apocalyptic setting. The user can choose one of the clans. Each faction has its own unique perks. You can be friends or fight with other factions. The player is asked to build buildings, improve buildings, extract resources, find food, look for lost technologies, explore islands, take care of his charges and train them into specialists, help other survivors or deal with competitors.

item.title: Pixel Gangsters: Mafia Manager
item.description: Game Description Pixel Gangsters: Mafia Manager is a sandbox crime simulator created by an independent developer. Are you ready to become a cool mafioso and conquer the city? Build your mafia empire from scratch - attract loyal henchmen, strengthen them with guns and cars, plan robberies, organize contract killings and extort protection payments from businessmen. Here any means are acceptable to achieve the goal. But don’t forget that you are not alone - other bandits also dream of becoming the king of the underworld.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision.
