Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: We Who Are About To Die
item.description: Game Description We Who Are About To Die takes the gamer back to the times of Ancient Rome and allows you to enter the arena as a gladiator. These magnificent fighters were mostly slaves and were forced to fight for their master in the hope of gaining glory on the sand and hoping for a chance to eventually become free, but only a few achieved this goal. Offers multiplayer content, thanks to which the gamer will fight against other real users in difficult battles.

item.title: The Exorcist's Story
item.description: Game Description The Exorcist’s Story is an atmospheric 2D adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a young priest, Antonio, who had experience in performing exorcism rituals. But one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the ceremony. You escaped prison, but you promised yourself never to perform such rituals again. But a few years later, strange things begin to happen in your small town and Asmodeus, the demon you once encountered, challenges you again.

item.title: Silver Nornir
item.description: Game Description Silver Nornir invites gamers to plunge into an exciting world where the fate of the entire world is at stake. This is an exciting old school RPG in a fantasy setting. Survivors of two disasters are ready to fight to the end to stop the end of the world. But they need your help! Exciting adventures and exciting battles using magical gems and combo techniques with friends and allies await you.

item.title: Out of Ore
item.description: Game Description In Out of Ore, gamers have to take control of a variety of heavy equipment, with the help of which they can mine ore, move earth, dig holes, build or repair buildings, and much more. You have to try yourself as a driver of construction equipment, which is designed for a variety of purposes. The main character goes according to the plot to the very north of the country, where a small base from the Company Mining Corp.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Lost Eidolons
item.description: Game Description Lost Eidolons is a tactical role-playing game that allows you to plunge into the world of dark fantasy. The combat is made in a turn-based style. The action takes place in a world called Artemesia. Starring the adventurer Eden. He, along with a small detachment, is trying to fight for the free future of the empire. During the game, you can switch between turn-based combat and NPCs to strategize and try to find a way to outsmart your opponent.

item.title: Stardeus
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator Stardeus will plunge you into a cosmic world where there are no familiar objects, and, of course, there are robotic systems, spaceships, and advanced artificial intelligence that helps with everything. The main character, in the role of AI, is called upon to restore order on a large space cruiser, simultaneously building his own colony and introducing automation into the spheres of life of the newly built city.

item.title: Card Survival: Tropical Island
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Tropical Island – takes you into the atmosphere of tropical islands, on which the protagonist will have to survive and settle down. Players gain experience managing the time and resources available to build the structures and tools needed to live a solitary life in the wild. Being in an area filled with various materials and natural objects of the environment, you will have to search and collect useful elements that allow you to live in an area unfavorable for humans.

item.title: Railbound
item.description: Game Description Railbound is a fascinating puzzle game on a railway theme, the main characters of which are 2 cute dogs setting off on a trip around the world. In their adventure, they will have to visit bright locations - from green plains to steep mountain slopes, and everywhere they will need to lay ruts in order to continue moving further - to new interesting adventures. You can also pick up passengers along the way and receive additional rewards.

item.title: Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor
item.description: Game Description Queen’s Wish 2: The Tormentor may be of interest to fans of classic RPGs on PC. This indie project is made in the old school style. It was created by a studio that had previously made several series of budget RPGs. This title is set in a medieval fantasy setting. It has 2D graphics with a top view. To understand the plot and lore, it is not necessary to go through the first part first.

item.title: Spirit of the Island
item.description: Game Description Life simulator Spirit of the Island places the player on a tropical island, offering to grow crops, take care of pets, help the locals and much more. Spirit of the Island will require turning the deserted Archipelago into a populated tourist center. However, this requires a lot of effort and a thorny path from a small farm to a noisy city. The danger comes from pirates who are also hunting for treasure and exploring the tropical paradise.

item.title: Regiments
item.description: Game Description Regiments is a real-time strategy game where the Cold War escalated into World War III. Events will unfold in Germany in 1989, which became the main battlefield between NATO armies and the Warsaw Pact. Here the player will be able to become the commander-in-chief of the army: control platoons, call for artillery strikes or air support. Both regular infantry and tanks with fighters will be under control. Squads can be formed and changed directly during battle.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description InCult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Civitatem
item.description: Game Description Civitatem is a single-player city-planning simulator with a top-down view and a medieval setting, expressed in the architecture of the buildings available for construction, the clothing of the population and the technologies present. The gamer helps civilians find a place to live to replace the old one, which was destroyed during an attack by bandits. By correctly distributing human resources to all areas of activity under the player’s control, one can achieve immediate growth of the settlement and the discovery of technologies that make life much easier.

item.title: Monument Valley 2: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley 2 is an isometric adventure and puzzle game. What is posted here is not the original version, but a re-release called Panoramic Edition. It contains all previously released additional content. The project was initially released on mobile devices. When transferring the title to PC, the developers adapted the controls. They also added support for ultra-wide monitors and improved the visual component, which can now be admired in Full HD.

item.title: Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley can please connoisseurs of meditative projects. This is a calming puzzle game with hand-drawn graphics in a minimalist style. The title is made in isometry. Video games help develop spatial thinking. All the puzzles in it are based on optical illusions. The puzzles are of moderate difficulty. The cards are made in the style of imp art. In the game you can activate mechanisms and change camera angles.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPGAlaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Attack at Dawn: North Africa
item.description: Game Description Attack at Dawn North Africa is a military-strategic project that takes participants into the conditions of the North African campaign during the Second World War. Players will lead the Axis or Allied forces, taking command of battalions, divisions and air forces across the vast expanses of Libya and Egypt. Set across a vast map stretching from the Gulf of Sirte to the Suez Canal, the action spans the period 1940 to 1943.

item.title: Nemesis: Lockdown
item.description: Game Description Nemesis: Lockdown immerses users in dark adventures that are designed for multiplayer playthroughs with a team. Users will survive and fight off the monsters that are in the dark. You have to cooperate with your partners or go into solo mode. The project is a survival horror game where you need to perform step-by-step actions and think through your moves in advance. The game is based on a board game, which shows a sci-fi setting.

item.title: Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate
item.description: Game Description Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate is an alternate version of chess with elements of classic roguelikes. Users will have to go on action missions, controlling a selected figure with a royal shotgun. The main task for the protagonist will be the destruction of enemy objects on a field designed in the form of a standard chessboard. Players have to destroy the white pieces on behalf of the Black King, who has prepared firearms.

item.title: Dorfromantik
item.description: Game Description Dorfromantik - strategy in low-poly style. The game encourages you not to think about military strategies and operations. enjoy peaceful buildings and development of your lands. Game mechanics of Dorfromantic combine classic RTS and puzzle. Create a village, developing and expanding, building new buildings on hexagonal tiles. Explore a procedurally generated world filled with diverse and colorful biomes. Complete tasks to fill locations with new life and create truly unique worlds.

item.title: Kapital: Sparks of Revolution
item.description: Game Description Kapital: Sparks of Revolution is a city planning simulator that allows you to deal with all economic issues in managing the capital. Events start at a time when European countries find themselves in a deep systemic crisis. There is a class struggle and it becomes difficult to avoid a social explosion. The player finds himself in such conditions. What price must be paid to save Europe from anarchy?

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Game Description Teardown is a robbery simulator in a variety of conditions prepared by indie developers from Tuxedo Labs. Stylistically, the project was made using a voxel graphic component. This solution made it possible to implement complete destructibility of all available objects in the location. This freedom opens up the possibility of performing operations in a variety of ways, improvising on the fly. The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Dummynation
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Dummynation will have to try themselves as a world invader, expanding their influence on the planet. The game is a geopolitical simulator where you need to develop your own strategy to improve your political position on the planet. Users will select one of the states to begin gradually expanding their borders. It is necessary to carry out military occupations, declare annexation of selected territories, and much more.

item.title: Stacklands
item.description: Game Description InStacklands you have to build a village, completing various levels in the style of a deck-building battler. Users will collect food, build buildings and fight monsters on a special field using ability cards. It will be possible to use combinations of cards. For example, when you move a “village dweller” to a “berry bush”, “berries” will appear, which the city dweller will consume as food and get a chance to survive.

item.title: Crystal Project
item.description: Game Description Crystal Project is an atmospheric adventure where users will go to explore a fantasy world. The game is a non-linear role-playing adventure game where you will have to collect crystals scattered across the map, discover new abilities and specializations for the character, and also participate in dangerous battles with bosses, developing your own strategy. The hero will have to fulfill an ancient prophecy to restore balance in the territory of Sequoia.

item.title: Distant Worlds 2
item.description: Game Description Distant Worlds 2 continues the 4x strategy of the same name, but on a new 64-bit engine, with updated 3D graphics and a sophisticated interface. Here the user will have to start his own story in a vast world, acting in real time. The game focuses on multiplayer, where at the start you are asked to choose a side in the conflict, and then start customizing and setting up the Universe, thanks to the built-in editor.

item.title: HordeCore
item.description: Game Description HordeCore is a dynamic scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. You can play alone or join forces with other players to survive together in a city plagued by a zombie epidemic. Explore, fight, survive, craft, customize, etc. Become the leader of a group that is constantly growing with new people. Try to find as many supplies as possible, develop your team’s skills, and make traps and various devices.

item.title: Pets at Work
item.description: Game Description Pets at Work is a colorful arcade puzzle adventure game designed for local multiplayer that revolves around a group of funny animals who have lost their owners in an office building. To find people, pets must interact as a team using boxes, mats, buttons and climbing on shelves and tables. Dozens of levels have been implemented, each of which has more than six different mechanics, which provides players with exciting and dynamic gameplay.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 3
item.description: Game Description GameplayTotal War: WARHAMMER 3 is a mixture of turn-based strategy and RTS. It is necessary to gather an army and move it around the global map, capturing all areas. By extracting resources and recruiting units, you will need to create settlements. You can enter into diplomacy with different factions, enter into alliances with them, or declare war. The economic part of Total War: Warhammer 3 is presented by TBS mechanics, while battles take place in real time.

item.title: Black One Blood Brothers
item.description: Game Description Black One Blood Brothers is a full-fledged immersion in combat operations, where users will take control of a special forces squad. The game is made in the genre of tactical sandbox shooter, designed for one player. Gameplay mechanics are made in the style of the Rainbow six and Ghost Recon projects. Users will perform secret missions (JSO), where the protagonist has to move from a first-person perspective, taking on the role of a French naval officer serving in the Marine Corps.

item.title: Brutal Orchestra
item.description: Game Description Immersion in Brutal Orchestra allows users to venture into a brutal world filled with insidious demons and grotesque monsters. The game is designed as a turn-based strategy with roguelike elements and deck building. Players will be exploring levels, searching for ancient artifacts and fighting treacherous monsters. You have to make deals with the devil and try to find a way out to save your own soul. The protagonist in Hieronymus Bosch’s Brutal Orchestra dies and finds himself in purgatory, where he must wander through mysterious locations and cope with difficult challenges.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses you in adventures taking place in a fairy-tale kingdom. A group of gods oversee the plane of human material existence while mortals vie for control over territories and new lands. The main character is Contra, who is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other inhabitants of the planet. It will be possible to manage entire colonies of settlers in order to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: Perfect Heist 2
item.description: Game Description The dynamic adventures in Perfect Heist 2 allow you to feel the atmosphere of a team of robbers who are hoping to commit the last global robbery and go to the bottom. Players will take control of the protagonist, who will participate in a dangerous operation, where they need to thoughtfully and harmoniously carry out certain actions with a group of partners. You have to quietly make your way through traps and police barricades, hoping to wait for the perfect moment and knock out one of the bank employees so that you can use the clothes as a disguise.

item.title: SGS Operation Hawaii
item.description: Game Description SGS Operation Hawaii features a scenario covering the events following the attack on Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941. This game explores the possible consequences of the situation if a Japanese air raid were followed by a ground invasion of Oahu. The focus is on a theoretical operation involving specially trained Marines and Army units secretly brought in with the main strike force. The idea differs from the real story, where a similar landing, although discussed by the Imperial Japanese Navy, was rejected due to supply difficulties.

item.title: Age of Empires 4
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 4 is a computer game in the Real Time Strategy genre. This is the third sequel to the original game and the first to be developed by a new development studio that was not involved in the work on the trilogy. The announcement, which took place back in 2017, became an excellent gift for fans of the series on the anniversary of the franchise’s appearance in 1997.

item.title: Inscryption
item.description: Game Description Inscryption is a card adventure with roguelike elements that focuses on the fact that the darkness still hides many unknown secrets. The strategy is made in an escape the room format, has multiple puzzles and a terrifying atmosphere. The user is transported to the goblin’s hut, where he needs to embark on dangerous adventures to find out what secrets are hidden in this building. The events take place in a forest house, where the protagonist is trapped by some sinister creature who wants the guy to play board games with him.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: Junkyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Explore open environments in Junkyard Simulator in search of trash that can be used to upgrade and create cars. The main character’s business is searching for junk, purchasing parts and creating cars. The whole world is a dump, full of scrap metal and useful items. In the nooks and crannies of landfills, the character will find the best items. Found items are sold for good money, but they are also used in the workshop.

item.title: Vagrus - The Riven Realms
item.description: Game Description Vagrus - The Riven Realms is a role-playing game with strategy elements where you will need to take control of the leader of the caravan and survive in a dark surreal world. Lead a travel company, recruit powerful warriors into your ranks and travel across the mainland, fighting enemies and earning useful materials. Explore a vast continent filled with unique locations, strange factions, and numerous dangers. Many minor characters can be interacted with and communicated with.

item.title: Erannorth Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Chronicles combines an RPG and a card game. It’s also a sandbox. There is no complete single plot here. The indie title invites users to entertain themselves: explore the open world, fight monsters, upgrade their character, and participate in random events. You can also go treasure hunting or take tests. This CCG has a high barrier to entry due to the large number of deep mechanics that gamers have to figure out for themselves.

item.title: Cauldrons of War - Stalingrad
item.description: Game Description Cauldrons of War – Stalingrad is the second part of a small series of wargames. Like its predecessor, the title is set in the setting of World War II. This part is dedicated to the battles between Germany and the USSR. You can fight for both factions. Moreover, it is easier to play for the Germans than for the Soviet Union. The action takes place only on the Eastern Front.

item.title: Cookie Clicker
item.description: Game Description Cookie Clicker lives up to its name. This is a clicker about earning cookies. The title is considered one of the first such games. The project developed and popularized an entire genre. Initially it was a browser. Here is an improved version of Cookie Clicker. The re-release boasts an achievement system with 500 achievements, 600 improvements, the ability to exchange some goodies for others, and receiving constant upgrades. There are also mini-games here.

item.title: HUMANKIND
item.description: Game Description In the 4X strategy HUMANKIND, the player will have to lead his own civilization through all eras of human development. You have to develop cities, create an army and manage units, participating in battles on land and sea. The fictional planet is procedurally generated and includes multiple regions. At the start of the passage, they are not occupied by anyone, but gradually new rulers appear and territories are captured by other factions.

item.title: Carrier Command 2
item.description: Game Description Carrier Command 2 is a modern continuation of the strategy that came out back in the eighties. Compared to other titles, the sequel stands out due to its gameplay features. This is not only an RTS, but also a simulator of an aircraft carrier commander. The gamer’s task: to liberate the Telos colony located on the archipelago from the terrorists who captured it. In Carrier Command 2, the user controls a huge warship.

item.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel
item.description: Game Description Fuga: Melodies of Steel is a role-playing adventure centered around children with various unique abilities. Players need to choose their heroes to place them behind tanks, gun turrets, etc. Assembling your squad of brave heroes, Fuga: Melodies of Steel requires you to fight against numerous enemies. Children interact with each other and show emotions. As they get closer, new abilities and upgrade branches open up. A powerful, mysterious weapon called the Taranis is available in Fuga.

item.title: Rise Eterna
item.description: Game Description The story of Rise Eterna follows Lua as she attempts to uncover the secrets of her own origins. The gameplay combines tactical elements and RPG in a Japanese animated style. The user will assemble a squad of characters with special skills and characteristics. A squad can have up to 14 wards. The heroes will go through brutal battles, dungeons and boss encounters. As the player progresses, he discovers a dark and mature story centered around the relationship between two lost souls.

item.title: Vivid Knight
item.description: Game Description Vivid Knight is an anime roguelike where you have to save your friends from being turned into gems. Helping out your comrades, you need to combine their abilities to create your own invincible team of powerful fighters. While exploring the generated dungeons, you need to fight funny enemies, gain experience and upgrade the skills of your heroes. Due to randomness, the gameplay is never repeated twice, generating unique situations and scenes.

item.title: Imagine Earth
item.description: Game Description Imagine Earth is a sandbox strategy where the goal is to create your own race and further develop it. Humanity needs a lot of different resources for a normal life, but it will always want more. The map is three-dimensional, made in the form of a globe, rather than a flat surface, this allows you to observe your planet from any angle. A special feature will be the realistic modulation of all kinds of disasters, both those that occurred due to human influence and due to nature.

item.title: Demeo
item.description: Game Description Dark fantasy in Demeo plunges a party of adventurers into dangerous adventures where they have to fight against monsters. The game is made in the form of a role-playing turn-based adventure game, which you can play using virtual reality glasses. The project combines the dungeon crawler genre and tactical strategy, allowing you to take turns on the field and clear locations from opponents. Gamers will extract loot from enemies and strengthen their characters with found artifacts and things.

item.title: First Feudal
item.description: Game Description First Feudal takes the gamer to the classic Middle Ages and invites you to become a feudal lord (landowner and lord). The game does not have a plot - users face a classic sandbox with endless gameplay. Initially it will be difficult, because a small village is vulnerable and a small landowner is not able to protect it. But try to make good money and gather your own army so that no one tries to take the resources.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: Endzone - A World Apart
item.description: Game Description Endzone - A World Apart is a post-apocalyptic mayor simulator, where under your strict guidance there will be a small settlement in need of a competent leader capable of developing a small commune that has survived a nuclear war. The plot tells how in 2021 one terrorist group carried out a nuclear bombing of all known states, as a result of which the planet systematically plunged into global chaos.

item.title: Asdivine Cross
item.description: Game Description Asdivine Cross is a Japanese role-playing game with 2D anime-style pixel graphics. The project was ported to computers from smartphones. In the PC version, the developers adapted the controls for a keyboard and mouse and added an achievement system. The title emulates an old school JRPG. In keeping with the tradition of the genre, this video game features random encounters and turn-based combat. The order of moves of all participants in the battle is displayed on the screen, and you can influence it.

item.title: War on the Sea
item.description: Game Description War on the Sea is a single-player tactical simulator of combat operations that take place in the oceanic space. The gamer will have control of not only 50 types of warships for various purposes, including submarines, but also realistic copies of real aircraft. The setting of the project is the era of the Second World War; the year 1942 has recently arrived on the planet. The location of all available battles in the single-player campaign is the Pacific Ocean, and more specifically, locations near the Solomon Islands, which represent a strategically important point for both sides of the conflict.

item.title: Dyson Sphere Program
item.description: Game Description Dyson Sphere Program is a space simulator that allows you to develop your base and explore the galaxy. Go into the vastness of outer space to colonize distant planets. Build an intergalactic factory using the power of the stars. Design and plan production chains. Collect resources and develop your base. Start your journey as a small workshop and progress to the Dyson Sphere - a megastructure that orbits the stars.

item.title: Founders' Fortune
item.description: Game Description Founders' Fortune is a fantasy sim where, in addition to building and defending a base, you need to monitor the psychological state of the heroes. The colonists reach the island empty-handed to settle in a new place. By collecting resources, they build houses and various objects. Construction begins with walls and floors, after which furniture is placed and the façade is put in order. Colonists are the main element of Founders' Fortune.

item.title: Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead
item.description: Game Description Bridge Constructor: The Walking Dead is a collaboration between two famous franchises. “The Walking Dead” is a famous series based on a comic book, “Bridge Builder” is an arcade simulator of a construction worker using ragdoll animation and a realistic physical model that follows the laws of the real world. The gamer will have to join a group of survivors in a universe where an apocalypse has occurred due to the appearance of zombies due to an unknown disease.

item.title: Stirring Abyss
item.description: Game Description Stirring Abyss is a turn-based strategy with role-playing game elements. Uncover the ancient secrets of the undersea depths in a twisted and mystical story inspired by the works of famous writer Howard Phillips Lovecraft. The main character is the captain of the surviving underwater crew of the submarine Salem. The shipwreck occurred during the Cold War. The soldiers survived, but found themselves at the ruins of an extinct civilization.

item.title: Mesmer
item.description: Game Description Mesmer is a revolution simulator that is a vibrant adventure in which you need to unite people and take a fortress by storm. Take on the role of the leader of a revolutionary uprising, influencing the consciousness of people and factions operating within the city. The secret police are monitoring every action, so be vigilant! The task is simple: to lead Mesmer and his people to a better life.

item.title: Neighbors back from Hell
item.description: Game Description Neighbors back From Hell is a re-release of the famous adventure puzzle game with charismatic main characters. The player takes on the role of a young guy named Woody, who was unable to make friends with his grumpy neighbor in an apartment building. To teach the evil man a lesson, the protagonist organizes the filming of the TV show “Neighbors from Hell,” which was continued for a second season.

item.title: STAR WARS: Squadrons
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS: Squadrons takes place after the sixth episode of Return of the Jedi. Events unfold during the period when Imperial forces are defeated on Endor and lose the second Death Star. The game has two main characters. One serves on the Titan squadron of the Galactic Empire, and the second is at this time on the Defender and helps the rebels. Online modes in STAR WARS: Squadrons support up to 10 users.

item.title: Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa
item.description: Game Description Cauldrons of War - Barbarossa is a hardcore wargame set in the Second World War. Turn-based tactical strategy dedicated to the Second World War. There are 2 factions available in it: USSR and Nazi Germany. The period from the summer of 1941 to the winter of 1942 is covered. Gameplay for the Red Army and Wehrmacht troops differs. Both sides of the conflict are balanced with each other. The project emphasizes historical accuracy and realism.

item.title: Root
item.description: Game Description Root is a strategy with simulator elements, offering to experience an asymmetrical type of combat. The action will take place in the forest where anthropomorphic creatures live. Create your faction and lead it to victory in this bloody forest war! The gameplay of Root is designed for both one player and a company of up to 4 people. The story begins with the vile Marquis de Cote taking over the area, trying to get rich with the help of natural resources and treasures.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Songs of Syx
item.description: Game Description Songs of Syx is a top-down city builder with roguelike elements. The progression system allows you to turn a small colony into a full-fledged settlement, from a village into a large city, and from a metropolis into an entire empire. When creating a state, to maintain the capital, you will need to build other settlements, castles, and ports. The maximum number of inhabitants in the village is 30,000 people.

item.title: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
item.description: Game Description The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos is a humorous adventure set in the Naheulbeuk Universe. John Lang wrote a comedy series based on role-playing game parodies and heroic adventures. The developers decided to create a game based on the author’s universe. In a dungeon set in a fantasy setting, clumsy characters try to get their hands on treasure. The RPG has complex tactical elements, with a dose of humor, unexpected surprises and ridiculous encounters.

item.title: Crusader Kings 3
item.description: Game Description Crusader Kings 3 is a global strategy that significantly expands the capabilities of the previous part. Crusader Kings 3 covers the time period from 1066 to 1453. Unlike the second part, you won’t be able to start the game at any time. The new map stretches from Spain to Burma and Mongolia, and from Scandinavia to Central Africa. The scale of the game is quadrupled. The points on the map represent not only counties, but also baronial possessions.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: Lawless Lands
item.description: Game Description Lawless Lands is a role-playing game in a dark fantasy setting. You will challenge the Darkness itself and explore the territory of Crossia - a formerly great kingdom, which is now plunged into poverty and crime. Hunger and death reign all around. The army has lost its power and the country is in turmoil. You take on the role of a hero rising from the ashes. He challenges the entire empire and is the only one capable of restoring Crossia’s greatness.

item.title: The Battle of Polytopia
item.description: Game Description The Battle of Polytopia is a turn-based strategy game with city builder elements. The events of the game develop in the fictional world of Square. There are 12 factions to choose from, one of which you can start a campaign for. Lead your people to world domination by expanding your sphere of influence and exploring new technologies. You will explore the surrounding lands, develop various technologies and collect useful materials, on the basis of which your base will develop.

item.title: Spirit Island
item.description: Game Description Spirit Island is a strategy game made in the style of a board game, in which you need to become the spirits of the earth and protect the island from colonizers who are sowing plague and destruction. The spirit interacts with the native islanders, helping to increase your strength to fight the foreigners. There is a place of magic in the world of Spirit Island. The countries of Europe are trying to expand their influence to distant lands, but the ancient gods are ready to thwart the plans of strangers.

item.title: Rival Stars Horse Racing: Desktop Edition
item.description: Game Description With Rival Stars Horse Racing: Desktop Edition, the player will have at his disposal a stable of horses from which he must create winners in the race. Here you need to raise and choose a potential champion in order to lead him to victory in horse racing. The desktop version has updated graphics and different game styles. The user inherited a farm from his grandfather that had fallen into disrepair.

item.title: Persona 4 Golden
item.description: Game Description Persona 4 Golden is a role-playing game about a group of friends who are able to summon demons from the other world. To do this, it is enough to shoot yourself in the temple. The events take place in the small Japanese town of Inaba. The children in Persona 4 are teenagers going through puberty. The heroes are investigating a mysterious series of murders. The gameplay of Persona 4 Golden contains elements of a visual novel.

item.title: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
item.description: Game Description Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal - Pacific War Naval Warfare dives into the air conflicts that unfolded in the Pacific during World War II. This strategy game puts you in the middle of the historical battles between the US and Japan in 1942-1943. Using a system of hexes and counters, the title tasks you with outflanking your opponent while defending critical areas or attacking key enemy positions. It’s all about decision making: when to strike, when to retreat, how to preserve your carriers and prevent the enemy from gaining a foothold.

item.title: Cepheus Protocol
item.description: Game Description Cepheus Protocol is a real-time strategy game where you are given a large open world so that you have the opportunity to find patient zero. A terrible virus has taken over San Francisco, turning residents into bloodthirsty monsters. You will lead a squad of soldiers from the Center for Epidemic Research and Control (CERC) fighting on the streets of an infected city. The task is to find the zero infected person to defeat the epidemic.

item.title: TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children
item.description: Game Description In the exciting turn-based strategy TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children, the player will take control of a desperate character and begin to explore a huge and beautiful world where it is worth fighting opponents, finding new allies, and more. So, the hero will be a certain boy Albus, it was he who was lucky enough to return after some time to his native metropolis and become a “problem raker” - a kind of person on whom all people place great hopes and responsibilities.

item.title: Euphoria: Supreme Mechanics
item.description: Game Description Supreme Mechanics - Challenges out-of-the-box thinking and explores different genres and perspectives. It is a first-person puzzle game that combines elements of dystopian fantasy, crime-solving, and horror with deep philosophical questions. You’ll have to solve some dark and twisted cases as you explore the world around you, uncover your character’s hidden identity, overcome the boundaries of danger and logic, and create your own version of time and history.

item.title: Drug Dealer Simulator
item.description: Game Description Drug Dealer Simulator will allow you to create your own criminal empire without moral and legal consequences. The player starts in a shabby shelter and begins to develop his business. You can either become a dark genius or a cruel gangster. The player needs to purchase goods from the cartels, avoid the police and organize safe houses. You can sell goods both in small quantities and individually, and in large quantities to entire gangs.

item.title: Plutocracy
item.description: Game Description Plutocracy is a strategy in which you will be transported to the Golden Age, to the time when the first rich people of the United States of America just appeared. The gameplay will begin in 1870 and continue until the present day. During this gap, you will need to buy out many companies and put your name on the highest line of the board. You will start from scratch and will earn and work to become a shadow ruler.

item.title: The Political Process
item.description: Game Description The Political Process is a political simulation game in which you create your own character and run for office to create and pass laws, handle budget issues, and move up the political hierarchy. You can side with the Republicans or the Democrats. Customize the hero’s appearance, select his age and set a name. There are over 40 political positions available that your character can represent. Any position reflects aspects of social and financial ideology.

item.title: Railroad Corporation
item.description: Game Description Railroad Corporation is a railway construction simulator. You have to build your own empire from numerous freight and passenger routes. The game takes place in North America in the 19th century. The gamer will have to master the road to new lands. The player needs to establish friendly relations with various foreign enterprises. Build your own factories and populate residential buildings. From the very beginning you will only have a small amount of money.

item.title: Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game released in 1999 under the name “The Age of Kings”. The game is famous for the fact that the player develops his civilization from the Stone Age to the Modern Age. The gameplay is based on the fact that it is necessary to hire peasants, gather troops, erect buildings, study maps, develop the era and explore new capabilities, technologies and, most importantly, destroy the enemy.

item.title: Command: Modern Operations
item.description: Game Description Command: Modern Operations returns with an updated interface, new features and content that immerses users in the military operations that took place after World War II. The player has submarines, infantry, aircraft, warships and strategic weapons at his disposal. Power and technique are provided at the start of the match and must be managed wisely. The process takes place with a view of a global map with elaborate and detailed terrain layers.

item.title: Unity of Command 2
item.description: Game Description In Unity of Command 2 you have to control your teammates, design routes and develop your own battle tactics. Transform from a novice into a seasoned commander and manage anti-Hitler coalitions on the Western Front, Africa, or take command of Allied divisions. With a dynamic campaign, you can write your own history of World War II. Non-linear paths will lead you to completely different endings. In combat you will need to clear the fog of war, one of the innovations in the sequel to the cult classic Unity of Command II.

item.title: Little Big Workshop
item.description: Game Description Little Big Workshop is a meditation game with calm, measured gameplay. The passage begins very strangely, someone left a game with figures of little human workers on his desktop. And this someone begins to fantasize that these little men come to life, and work is in full swing in their toy workshop. It is the fantasies of the mysterious protagonist that gamers will have to watch. The strategy will not give the player time to rest, because orders will immediately begin to arrive, and the virtual phone will be ringing off the hook with constant calls to it.

item.title: Heroes of a Broken Land 2
item.description: Game Description Heroes of a Broken Land 2 is a procedurally generated strategy RPG that immerses gamers in a fractured fantasy realm where they take control of multiple parties and navigate countless worlds. User steps into the role of one of the few remaining wizards, crystallized but determined to undo the destruction caused by the corruption of the former Wizard Council. Heroes of a Broken Land 2 begins with gamers recruiting heroes, building cities from scratch, and delving into treacherous dungeons - all with the ultimate goal of restoring a ruined landscape to its former glory.

item.title: Flotsam
item.description: Game Description A construction simulator with survival elements, Flotsam allows you to become the owner of a floating city. Imagine that the land has simply disappeared and you can only survive on a raft, and at the same time you also need to extract resources. According to the plot, at a certain point, humanity damaged nature so much that a global catastrophe eventually occurred, which led to the flooding of all continents.

item.title: Queen's Wish: The Conqueror
item.description: Game Description Queen’s Wish: The Conqueror is a role-playing game made in the spirit of classic RPGs from the end of the last century. The story begins at the moment when the Queen gives you freedom in exchange for an assignment: to restore the Empire! This is the queen’s wish. Go explore the lands, fight enemies and shape the structure of the lands in such a way as to return it to its former glory.

item.title: Shortest Trip to Earth
item.description: Game Description Shortest Trip to Earth, a futuristic spaceship control simulator, sends the character to the distant future, where he must conquer the Universe. The project is not tied to the plot and the gameplay is presented through the passage of a large number of procedurally generated levels. The developers did not focus on the story campaign, but did a good job on the ship control capabilities and real-time tactical battles.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task inOxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: Interstellar Space: Genesis
item.description: Game Description Interstellar Space: Genesis is a turn-based strategy on a global map that uses the popular setting of outer space in an alternative universe where the distant future has arrived. The world is inhabited by various races that have their own history, advantages over others and disadvantages that they try to hide. Before starting a new save, the player is given a choice of 6 available factions. There is functionality that makes it possible to create a unique state for governance.

item.title: TheoTown
item.description: Game Description TheoTown is a city building simulator in which you can build a huge metropolis, limited only by your resources and imagination. Take on the role of mayor and organize the lives of thousands of citizens. Build buildings, manage the economy, or provide resources to several cities at once. Be the best manager who can turn a small town into a real technological metropolis. Create various transport networks, including highways, highways, etc.

item.title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
item.description: Game Description Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first game in the series that recreates epic conflicts in Ancient China. The game combines a turn-based campaign of empire building and conquest with epic real-time battles. 190 AD. A beautiful but fragmented country awaits a new emperor and a new life. The player will have to unify China, create the next great dynasty and leave a legacy that will endure for millennia.

item.title: Train Valley 2
item.description: Game Description Strategic Train Valley 2 allows you to build a railway empire and become what will start the industrial revolution. By building a transport network, the condition of cities and factories improves. The railway fleet is replenished with the best locomotives and life in the valley only gets better. Gameplay includes puzzle elements. The player is given an area with several stations. You need to combine them wisely, laying out the most efficient route.

item.title: Baba Is You
item.description: Game Description Baba Is You is a game in the popular puzzle genre. The project, developed by indie programmer Hempuli Oi, uses pixel graphics and a camera positioned high above, which creates conditions for greater visibility around the protagonist for faster response to changes. The single-player campaign is divided into 200 separate levels with increasing difficulty, introducing much more intricate puzzles on the way to the final scene, and the use of new mechanics.

item.title: Dawn of Man
item.description: Game Description A city planning simulator, civilization development and real-time strategy - Dawn of Man is one of the few games in the genre where human survival is presented in this form. For example, we start playing on behalf of the leader of a primitive tribe, and we need to get people to collect resources. Due to constant work, the brain begins to improve, and the first people appear in the world who think more or less intelligently.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Slay the Spire
item.description: Game Description InSlay the Spire the main task of the gamer is to climb to the upper levels of a tower consisting of many rooms. During the passage, you can have one of 4 characters, collect a collection of cards, defeat intermediate enemies and defeat the main villain. The locations and forks of the tower are constantly changing, the whole process can be divided into three acts and at the end of each of them the main character must defeat the local boss.

item.title: Penkura
item.description: Game Description Penkura combines several genres: action, adventure, RPG and strategy. Gamers find themselves in a unique world where they have to survive and thrive in an alien environment. The title begins with users traveling through an ancient singularity and landing on the distant world of Karenos. Here they will have to collect resources, explore ancient ruins and build a base that will help them cope with the upcoming trials. The combination of different gameplay styles creates an atmosphere that requires strategic thinking and adaptation at every turn.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crows
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Two Crowns is a cooperative microstrategy that tells about the brave, who has become a king and now he needs to gather his army. Having saddled the right horse, he goes on a long journey to expand the kingdom. He will be opposed by the army of greed, trying to take everything from him that he has set up with his own labor. The game offers to rush not only in European medieval landscapes, but also to see many radically new ones.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Granny
item.description: Game Description Granny is a first-person horror game in which you visit granny’s house. It is located far from civilization. However, the trip does not end entirely well. You find yourself locked in the mansion of a distraught old lady. You have five days to find a way to leave this damned place. Do you think you can do it?.. The old woman locks you in a dark basement, after hitting you on the head.

item.title: RimWorld
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city planning and strategic base development on a planet unknown to the player. The player inRimWorld must build a base where the last forces of people are concentrated. To survive, get food, study the technology tree and understand what the planet wants from you is the main task of the player. The project itself is characterized by the enormous depth of built mechanics that you can apply to your buildings and the base as a whole.

item.title: Airships: Conquer the Skies
item.description: Game Description Airships: Conquer the Skies (2018) is a multiplayer sandbox indie action and strategy game developed by David Stark under his own publishing house for various platforms, including PC. Airships has extremely positive reviews on various resources. The game is truly loved by gamers from all over the world. So what will you have to do? Build pixelated skyships in steampunk style! The buildings are shown in cross-section and from the side, and their modules are controlled by crew members.

item.title: Forged Battalion
item.description: Game Description In Forged Battalion, the entire Earth is destroyed due to global warming, making it simply impossible to exist on the surface of the planet. Miles Taymos is a brilliant inventor and comes up with his own system for transferring entire cities into the bowels of the earth. Now all factories, important technical centers, and indeed all living things, will be under a thick layer of soil. The scientist created his own movement called the Collective, supplying a large number of states around the world with underground colonies.

item.title: Star Traders: Frontiers
item.description: Game Description The role-playing video game Star Traders: Frontiers allows you to travel to the distant future and explore the vast expanses of the Universe as the captain of an independent ship. It also introduces elements of turn-based strategy and sandbox with the possibility of endless progression. According to the plot, which has virtually no effect on the gameplay, the action takes place in a world where people learned about the existence of other races and took their place among the dominant states in thirty galaxies.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy - Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War - united players in the knowledge of the history of the entire universe, where the turn-based type of construction and war is in no way accompanied by boredom. In this part we learn about Gladius Prime - a planet where a rich history combines the danger of the past and a new war in the present. Imperial scientists conducted a large-scale expedition to the surface of the planet and learned that the real danger is always kept not above, but in the depths.

item.title: Football, Tactics & Glory
item.description: Game Description Football, Tactics & Glory is a football team management simulator with strategy elements. As a coach, the player will need to identify the weaknesses and strengths of his opponent in order to identify unique tactics. With the help of a well-chosen strategy, you can defeat even a stronger opponent. Each match is like a puzzle where you need to find the key that helps you win. Each athlete on the field is a unique character, and you can even develop a relationship with each of them.

item.title: Just Shapes & Beats
item.description: Game Description Just Shapes & Beats offers gameplay based on the sound of music and beats. The difficulty level of the game depends on the rhythm of the soundtrack. The user takes control of a blue square; Many difficulties await him ahead. In the process, the hero is helped by friends, with whom he fights enemies. The game supports online and local co-op with 4 players in Story Mode and Challenge Runs.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Frostpunk
item.description: Game Description Frostpunk is an economic strategy game, a simulator of city construction in extremely harsh climatic conditions, where there are no wars, but there is a main enemy in the form of global cooling. The employees of the main office of 11 bit studios worked on the creation of this project. The official release of the game took place in April 2018. In technical terms, we have a three-dimensional strategy game, with a top-down view, a simulator of the leader of a surviving human population in the Arctic cold.

item.title: Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall
item.description: Game Description Ostalgie: The Berlin Wall is a political simulator that allows you to feel like the ruler of one of the socialist countries, such as East Germany, Romania, Poland and Bulgaria. The player’s main task is to survive until 1992. Each country has a set of problems and is driven by an individual goal. For example, the GDR wants to unite with West Germany, Romania wants to become a European version of North Korea, Bulgaria is determined to overthrow its ruler Zhivkov, and the Poles need to give a helping hand to General Jaruzelski.

item.title: Ash of Gods: Redemption
item.description: Game Description The world of sleeping gods in Ash of Gods: Redemption is revealed to its fullest extent as the plot of the three main characters begins to rid this world of priests who awakened too suddenly. The role-playing turn-based strategy tells the story of the legend of the game world, in which the reapers - the magicians of the dark side - were supposed to wake up no earlier than in a thousand years.

item.title: Bridge Constructor Portal
item.description: Game Description The Bridge Constructor Portal project was made into one big puzzle. We play as an employee of the Portal Nature Research Laboratory. Having a constructor under our control, we will build bridges, ramps and other objects in 60 different levels. Each built bridge will help the little men achieve a result - exiting a level to move to another, so Bridge Constructor Portal perfectly combines logical planning and tactical construction of levels.

item.title: Hand of Fate 2
item.description: Game Description A role-playing game using card strategies - Hand of Fate 2 is a lot of beautiful battles, partially drawn by hand; This is a completely random combat system where your enemies will become stronger, and you will rely on luck to give you a new weapon. A typical dark fantasy dungeon crawl, this card game features a random drop system. Those cards that you were able to pick up in battle will be randomly given to you before the next one.

item.title: Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game
item.description: Game Description Dresden Files Cooperative Card Game is a cooperative card adaptation, the plot of which allows you to play out alternative scenarios from the universe of the book series of the same name. Instead of strictly following the canon, the project proposes to join the efforts of iconic characters to jointly confront the monsters and mysteries of Chicago. The adventure is based on the events of the first five novels in the series, as well as a random case generator inspired by a collection of short stories.

item.title: Cogmind
item.description: Game Description Cogmind is a sci-fi roguelike in which you play as a robot assembled from components of other machines. Cogmind combat is presented in a turn-based style. You can explore the big world, hack devices, quietly sneak into strategic places, or act directly and attack your opponents head-on. The gameplay does not limit you to actions. Play the way you want. Your task is to assemble yourself from various modules.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description The action takes place in the fictional world of the writer Tolkien. The Middle Lands are full of adventures for our player, so the plot unfolds from half of them. Events introduce us to the continuation of the previous part. Talion and Celebrimbor forge a new ring, which Sauron does not know about - he will not be able to influence it. The new ring carries with it another responsibility: inMiddle-earth: Shadow of War, Celebrimbor loses his freedom in exchange for a new One Ring.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 2
item.description: Game Description Total War: WARHAMMER 2 is a turn-based strategy that invites you to immerse yourself in the gloomy campaign of the New World. The gameplay is highlighted by large-scale battles between six races. Enter the battlefield to save or destroy the world. Total War Warhammer 2 consists of two parts: a turn-based campaign in the open world and tactical battles in real time. Play both in single mode and take part in multiplayer battles.

item.title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description In this game, elves and other heroes gather in one flock. InDivinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition even Rivellon has undergone significant changes. The developers completely remade the entire game. No one knows where to start. The graphics in the game became more like realistic ones for some other world. There is nothing superfluous on the screen, and procasts, magical effects and the death of other heroes look better.

item.title: Aztez
item.description: Game Description Aztez is a 2D beat-em-up set in the Aztec Empire. You control an elite unit who is carrying out an important mission on behalf of the Emperor. There are many human warriors and mythical creatures standing in your way. The visual style is presented in black and white, where only the blood of enemies clearly stands out in red. Aztez’s gameplay includes turn-based strategy elements. A global map is available where you lead an entire squad of fighters.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: SAELIG
item.description: Game Description SAELIG (stylized as SÆLIG) is an RPG with strategy and management elements. The game focuses on managing the lives of the Anglo-Saxons in the kingdom of Wessex, extracting resources, managing life, and defending against attacks from warring savages from the Scandinavian lands. SAELIG is based on many simulation and role-playing elements, such as relationships, skills, health, needs, character interaction and constant control. Gameplay involves individual playthrough: live the life of a typical family man: get married, have children and work on a farm; start your own business: hire workers, produce goods and engage in trade; lead a criminal gang of thieves, terrorizing the area and stealing valuables from residents; become a monopolist and sabotage competitors; buy houses, rent them out, or live like a hermit without a roof over your head.

item.title: Colony Survival
item.description: Game Description Colony Survival is a unique first-person sandbox strategy game developed by a team of just two people! Build your own colony in the open world. Command guardsmen, farmers, miners and other colonists. Protect your colony from monsters that raid every night! Build bridges, tunnels, stairs and underground passages to make sure your colonists get where they want to go and the monsters don’t! As your colony grows, the number of monsters around will also increase.

item.title: Endless Space 2
item.description: Game Description In addition to the RTS filling, the developers added the ability to move to Endless Space 2, as was done in the same Civilization. And this choice is quite worthy. You are a worthy ruler of your people. People will not ask for constant improvements, but the senate you created requires the gradual adoption of new laws. Engineers cannot sit without work, and the army gradually refuses to fight if no one trains and trains the soldiers.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooterRavenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Little Nightmares
item.description: Game Description Little Six is ​​a girl who was brought on board the ship as a servant. She, like many nomes - the characters of the game - hides her face for unknown reasons. In the game we have to get out from the lowest sector to the upper decks, but the levels will not immediately allow us to do this. First, the player needs to know that sinister hands will always hunt for us.

item.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact that Bendy and the Ink Machine is a horror game with quite interesting graphics that keep you in the atmosphere even after beating the game, the developers manage to create a plot and a general feeling of fear through non-standard decisions regarding scares. We play as Henry Stein, who used to work as a cartoonist. One day he receives an invitation to the studio where he has been working for the last few years.

item.title: Idle Evolution
item.description: Game Description Idle Evolution is a strategic project in which the ultimate goal of achieving the highest stage of development is achieved through total control over atoms. The passage is built nonlinearly: gamers are asked to follow a certain path through a system of more than 200 missions, but at any time they can deviate from the proposed course to implement their own tactics. Instead of passive waiting, as in most similar products, there is an emphasis on active participation and making informed decisions.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
item.description: Game Description The open world of the new part -Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands - truly inspires what the developers tried to convict all players of. It must be said, but there is no plot in a third-person shooter. You independently write the story of your team, which is initially aimed at destroying the cartel that trades and produces drugs. But more on that later. First, it’s worth discussing the inner world of Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands.

item.title: Low Magic Age
item.description: Game Description Low Magic Age is a strategy game in a medieval setting with fantasy elements. When creating your character, you need to go through dangerous cities, villages and dungeons, fighting in a turn-based mode. The gameplay provides many opportunities, allowing you to choose the hero’s life path yourself. The gameplay during fights offers many different variations: limited field of view, fog, attacks, maneuvers, spells and much more. You can test your strength in the Arena, fighting against the strongest opponents.

item.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is a tactical stealth action game set in the Japanese Edo era (1603-1868). A conspiracy led by Kage-sama is carried out against the new shogun, after he was able to unite the lands of Japan. In order not to destroy the world, the ruler instructs his henchman samurai named Mugen to track down Kage-sama and his organization. For these purposes, the hero enlists the support of four companions - masters of secrecy and penetration.

item.title: Strategic Command WW2: War in Europe
item.description: Game Description Strategic Command WW2: War in Europe covers the greatest conflict in modern history. Take part in turn-based battles with deep immersion, controlling the Axis or the Allies. Control the forces of each nation included in your alliance. Experience the role of commander-in-chief of all operations. Determine priorities during battles, create your own tactics and coordinate your alliance on the global map. Your task is to direct the army to victory and get it by any means necessary.

item.title: Sid Meiers Civilization 6
item.description: Game Description A turn-based strategy from famous developers -Sid Meier’s Civilization VI, where the player’s main goal is to develop his own settlement from a small group of people. They build cities, become diplomats, politicians, officials, and make scientific achievements. The population of your city, and then the state, is gradually increasing, and you are moving towards capturing the land around you. Together with allies or alone, you fight against opponents controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Stellar Tactics
item.description: Game Description Stellar Tactics is an exciting journey through the unknown expanses of space. This game combines mechanics from a variety of genres, for example, from group tactical turn-based strategies or exploratory adventure games. The player is offered the role of a discoverer of many star systems that remained untouched during the colonization of space. There are 160,000 universes with their own stars and varying numbers of planets in them. The player always chooses what he wants to do - story missions or side activities that are not required to be mastered.

item.title: Niche - a genetics survival game
item.description: Game Description Genetic survival game Niche - a genetics survival game will allow you to deal with the population of special foxes. To survive, you need to collect edible plants or hunt very nimble game that brings a large supply of meat. The gameplay feature is the gene. The game allows you to experiment with DNA and pair a dominant gene with a recessive one, and then observe the result. Then find a new nest of other creatures and hatch completely new individuals.

item.title: The Hive
item.description: Game Description In The Hive, the player takes control of various insects. There are several types of units under your control: workers, one large queen, a healer, reconnaissance, a kind of tank, and several small warriors united in small groups. The latter are rifle and infantry detachments. Battles are fought in various locations: fields, oases, volcanic landscapes, tombs, on water and under water. The user can expect 10 levels, designed to take 10-12 hours to complete.

item.title: Dead Age
item.description: Game Description Dead Age has an excellent and non-linear story, consisting of many choices that lead to 6 different endings. You will have to carefully study the text of the tasks, otherwise the members of your squad of survivors will inexorably dwindle. The point of the game is to survive as many days as possible, replenishing food supplies, tools and new survivors. But don’t think that everything is so simple, in addition to collecting, the game has daily events that will fill your every new day in the game with various difficulties or opportunities.

item.title: Firefight
item.description: Game Description Firefight is a real-time simulation game set during World War II. It throws gamers into the heart of intense military battles, where strategy and tactical decisions are the key to success. You will not just command units, but manage their strengths and weaknesses, monitor their movements and carefully orchestrate each action to tip the scales in your favor. Infantry, tanks, artillery - they are all under your command, and each has their own set of attributes that determine their behavior on the battlefield.

item.title: Dead by Daylight
item.description: Game Description Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical cooperative horror game inspired by youth slashers. The story centers on four survivors facing off against a fifth player who controls a bloodthirsty maniac. The defending team’s job is to do everything possible to ensure they aren’t dead by dawn. Finding yourself in the same location with the killer, you need to use the environment and interact with your partners, trying to resist the monster.

item.title: Hearts of Iron 4
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact thatHearts of Iron 4 is famous for its realism, the new part has completely redesigned the focus tree for individual countries and nationalities. The strategy, dedicated to the Second World War, invites you to play in countries such as Italy, Ethiopia, Spain, Japan and China. Two scenarios that differ in their dates: 1936 and 1939. In one of them you will take part in the Second Italo-Ethiopian War and the Spanish Civil War, and in the second you will see how Japan invaded China, and the Second World War was fought.

item.title: Stellaris
item.description: Game Description Real-time strategy -Stellaris - immerses us in outer space, where we become kings of the galaxy from the very first minutes. The gameplay surrounds you with a huge number of ships and their types. For example, merchant spaceships will travel between different planets and sell/buy resources, reconnaissance ships will be able to explore new distances, and construction ships will help occupy - for friendly purposes - a new planet and recreate an entire empire on it.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: Twilight Struggle
item.description: Game Description Twilight Struggle takes place during the Cold War. The gameplay is presented in the form of a strategy, and you have to observe the world map and perform various actions. Each session provides you with original tasks and goals to accomplish. Move groupings of units and influence other factions to gain allies or increase your own power. The action covers historical moments that occurred from 1948 to 1967. Learn about and get involved in the Arab-Israeli conflicts, US peace rallies, the Cuban Missile Crisis and other similar incidents.

item.title: UnReal World
item.description: Game Description The plot of UnReal World takes place in the early period of the Iron Age in the northern regions of Europe, and more precisely in the territory of modern Finland.
