The game is a life simulator, and therefore does not have a main plot - the player gets complete freedom of action and determines the fate and career of the character under his care. The game’s mechanics focus on survival aspects.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning ofXCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Darkest Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Turn-based strategy with a side view -Darkest Dungeon - developed in a dark style and with rogue-like elements. A huge number of characters will not let you calm down until everyone on the playing field creates the perfect combination for victory. Each battle with opponents is a fascinating tactical adventure, where victory is 80% knowledge of the game and 20% knowledge of logic. Your characters are ordinary people with extraordinary health.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
item.description: Game Description A new installment in the first-person shooter,Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is a game of multiplayer destruction. We will not just destroy the map to which we and our friends were sent, but we will build traps, plant a bomb, and all this at a distance of a bow shot. The technical equipment of the new part is made specifically so that you can blow up everything in the open location of each level.

item.title: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
item.description: Game Description Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes is a cooperative sapper simulator. You are locked up with your friends. No one knows where the explosives are, but instructions are issued on how to disarm them. They must verbally explain what elements the bomb consists of and ensure that the player, acting as a sapper, can defuse it. Each round will be quite intense. Everything depends only on the correct and competent relationship between the participants.

item.title: Planetary Annihilation: TITANS
item.description: Game Description Planetary Annihilation: TITANS is a real-time strategy game with new elements and features. The player will need to equip his own planet in order to gather an army and smash the enemy’s planet to pieces. The gameplay has many story missions, gradually teaching the player and showing all the possibilities in the match. In addition to battles against AI, gamers can play against each other. Each match begins with the selection of one of the Commanders, the mandatory and most important character in the battle.

item.title: Batman: Arkham Knight
item.description: Game Description InBatman: Arkham Knight - a third-person action game, we eliminate this problem, and the Scarecrow himself too. After the events of the last part of Batman, Gotham City finally has a normal, friendly environment. Fights, robberies and murders continue, but if the protagonist does not hear about them, it means that everything is covered up by the police, or these are just rumors. Suddenly the Scarecrow appears and says that during the last incident he only used 100 grams of his drug.

item.title: Waste Walkers
item.description: Game Description Waste Walkers sets us in the harsh reality of a world ravaged by war, nuclear holocaust and societal collapse. Set in the near future, it features a landscape where survival depends on ingenuity. Humanity’s struggle to survive takes place in a crumbling society where bandits, mutated creatures and an unforgiving environment pose a constant threat. In this world of scavenger hunts and crafts, players navigate a city plagued by horrors, trying to stay one step ahead of those who want to take away what little they have.

item.title: Kerbal Space Program
item.description: Game Description In the space simulatorKerbal Space Program the player will lead the Kerbal race exploring the vastness of space. Be the one who guides them towards a brighter future, inventing new technologies, constructing many new mechanisms and helping in the exploration of the galaxy. Start your journey in one of three modes. In “Career” you will need to monitor the education and training of your charges, as well as help in modernizing their devices.

item.title: Elite Dangerous
item.description: Game Description Elite Dangerous is an online multiplayer game, the third part of the “Elite” franchise, which began in 1984. The player is given complete freedom to explore and travel, and has the opportunity to influence the storyline. The action takes place thousands of years later in the distant future on the territory of several million star galaxies. Most of the stars, planets, asteroids and other cosmic bodies that exist in the real world.

item.title: Cities: Skylines
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator -Cities: Skylines - is in the best traditions of the real game, in which its own physical laws were created to transfer them into gaming reality. On the territory of your new city, it will be taken into account that the profile road is built in one way, and the road at the airport - in another. It will count if you correctly lay the pipeline for the heating system, and also if you can show people that they live in a real paradise, and not just a metropolis where they want to buy them at the expense of shopping centers.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: Bloons TD 5
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 5 is one of many sequels to the series that uses tower defense mechanics. This franchise has more than 10 games in a shared universe; in addition to numbered parts, there are also separate spin-offs. The main goal is standard for the genre - to prevent opponents (in the case of this project, the antagonists are balls), attacking in waves, from crossing the line outside the screen; this is done with the help of towers that shoot at enemies and burst them in this way.

item.title: This War of Mine
item.description: Game Description This War of Mine is a cross-platform platformer game with elements of survival for an entire group of people. At the beginning of the game, you are given several characters to control the group, and you develop them depending on the time of day. During the day, the characters live in a house located in a city besieged by rebels. They arrange their everyday life, help each other, perform joint tasks and craft the necessary items.

item.title: RollerCoaster Tycoon: Deluxe
item.description: Game Description RollerCoaster Tycoon is a tycoon game in which you need to build an amusement park. The player is invited to follow a chain of tasks, building new attractions and improving the infrastructure of the park. There are dozens of roller coasters, log whirlpools, carousels, bumper cars, scare rooms, go-karts, Ferris wheels, ships and many other attractions to choose from. To maintain the life of the park, it is necessary to hire staff, among them:

item.title: 100% Orange Juice
item.description: Game Description 100% Orange Juice is a multiplayer board game that also has single-player modes against artificial intelligence. The characters used in this project are collected from many other Japanese universes, such as: Flying Red Barrel, QP Shooting, Sora and Suguri. There are also personalities created specifically for this game. The plot of the campaign tells about a growing piece of Evil that originated in a high-tech world, where people and machines learned to fly, and banditry was practically zero.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description InArma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific. More than 400 square kilometers of gaming space, where the player, playing the role of a NATO peacekeeper, will save his group from real traitors who show themselves at the beginning of the story campaign.

item.title: Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description InTotal War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition we are allowed to play as one of Caesar’s three followers. This is Octavian, the adopted son of a former ruler who is obliged to become the ruler of Rome; Mark Antony is Caesar’s loyal friend and best military leader; and Lepidus, the man through whom Caesar achieved universal recognition. After Caesar was killed, chaos erupted within the Roman Empire. The foreign policy of the empire maintained proper balance, while civil war was taking place inside, and the territory was divided into three parts.

item.title: Europa Universalis 4
item.description: Game Description A new part of the real-time strategyEuropa Universalis 4, the multiplayer mode of which allows up to 32 people to play on one server. Based on the previous parts, we can say that there are no more spies in the game, since they upset the overall balance of the game. The magistrate system has also changed greatly as the city’s development has undergone significant changes. The trading system has improved the most.

item.title: Papers, Please
item.description: Game Description The fictional country of Arstotzka is a small world of the game’s protagonist, where he will check documents at customs every day. The plot ofPapers, Please - a puzzle game with an unusual approach and graphics, as well as the beginning of the simulator - shows the events with the main character winning the profession of a customs officer at a checkpoint in the lottery. His task will be to check documents and apply stamps.

item.title: Company of Heroes 2
item.description: Game Description The events ofCompany of Heroes 2 unfold before us in snowy Norilsk, where one of the largest Stalinist Gulags is located. NKVD officer Churkin comes here, who understands that he will not survive the next Stalinist purge of officers. In the Gulag he finds his comrade from the front, who is serving his sentence and preparing to be shot. Isakovich is the name of the character, he wrote a tome with the real actions of the commanders of the Red Army, for which he was sentenced to death.

item.title: Gunpoint
item.description: Game Description Gunpoint takes the user to the near future, where many interesting spy things have been invented. Richard Conway works as a spy for hire, performing a variety of tasks. One day he gets a special copy - hyperpants. This item of clothing helps you jump over huge distances, and also help you fall from a height without harm to your health. The protagonist receives a new task - to investigate the murder of an employee of a weapons company.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game with many different improvements. Many years later, this game still remains unique and serves as an example for many strategy developers to follow. In the game, the player will have to take control of a small settlement of a certain faction and lead it to victory and prosperity. Events take place in the Middle Ages, roughly starting from the fall of the Roman Empire and up to the Renaissance.

item.title: FTL: Faster Than Light
item.description: Game Description FTL: Faster Than Light - this project is a two-dimensional simulator of a space combat ship. The creation and publication of this media product was carried out by the Subset Games studio. The official release took place in the first half of autumn 2012. The gameplay is based on the interaction between the player and the crew of the combat starship. The success of this space tactical strategy will depend on how successful this cooperation is.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders is an interesting game that combines a huge number of different genres: action, strategy, role-playing, RPG. This game is initially designed for multiplayer connections. Before we start, we have to choose the most interesting character class, his equipment style and the color of the magic crystal. This item is the most vital for the hero; if its structure is disrupted, the character’s death may occur. There are many different types of improvements in the game: hero characteristics, crystals and passive abilities, and most importantly, basic combat spells.

item.title: Sid Meier's Civilization 5
item.description: Game Description Sid Meier’s Civilization V is a strategy game with an RTS style, where we still build a civilization from primitive times to the present. You can choose from 18 strong powers of this world, within which you can add 7 wonders of the world, put in control a leader who has individual characteristics, and also does everything in his own way. The legendary turn-based strategy series introduces us to the sequel, in which a huge number of additional areas have been added.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies became the game of the year, winning in many categories. The developers invite us to once again plunge into battles in a small location in order to free ourselves from the shackles of various zombies, hold back all the ardor of the monsters and save the city by using the latest technologies in the agricultural industry. Among the primary weapons in strategy, we have a pea shooter, a cherry bomb and sunflowers, which we use to earn money to purchase new strategic weapons.

item.title: STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack is a collection of real-time strategies based on the Star Wars plot. You will play the role of an army manager on one of the sides in an intergalactic civil war. Command units of the Empire, Rebels, Republic or other civilizations. In Star Wars Empire at War, you will command your team, completing tasks and freeing planets from enemies. Visit Tatooine, Kashyyyk, Dagobah or other hot spots in the galaxy.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment,Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: Stronghold Crusader HD
item.description: Game Description A real-time strategy with an in-depth system for leveling up your settlement -Stronghold Crusader HD - was released with an addition that allows you to display the picture on a large screen with good quality. The basis of the game remains the same: we develop, build a large army, attack the enemy, whoever he is, win and move on. **The game has 4 historical campaigns, which are divided into stages in history.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: AGRONOM
item.description: Game Description AGRONOM sends players to 22nd century Mars to build a working estate. You arrive on a specific piece of Martian land with a specific task. This mission involves creating a living space designed to fulfill the wishes of Grandfather Makar and dedicated to the memory of his late wife Sofia. The idea extends beyond the simple construction of buildings, seeking to recreate the atmosphere symbolized by pancakes with plum jam, pickled cucumbers and home-made moonshine.

item.title: Alchemist's Alcove
item.description: Game Description Alchemist’s Alcove takes the player on a journey through ancient lands, collecting components from defeated enemies to create spells, tools and weapons. The process of battle and discovery is central to the gameplay, and the remains of opponents become the basis for a growing arsenal. Heroes navigate the territories of warring factions using a grid-based map, pursuing the ultimate goal of creating the Philosopher’s Stone through turn-based combat and exploration of the world.

item.title: Cultist Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cultist Simulator is a role-playing card game that allows you to create your own unique card deck. The plot tells us about a magical world, in which they give the opportunity to find out all the mysterious and mysterious events that happened in the real world. You can go fight witches, find Masons and go in search of other adventures. At the very beginning, gamers have the opportunity to choose starting cards, and then start completing missions and exploring a huge text world.

item.title: Earth of Oryn
item.description: Game Description Earth of Oryn is an indie city-building strategy game that challenges gamers to build and manage their kingdom in a medieval world. You start small and your goal is to shape the land according to your vision while balancing the needs of your people. The game offers a wide range of possibilities where you can create everything from cities and castles to complex political systems and armies. But it’s not just about construction: you’ll also have to navigate the complexities of managing resources, conducting trade, and defending against external and internal threats.

item.title: GODSOUL
item.description: Game Description Gamers in GODSOUL will be immersed in a cyberpunk atmosphere mixed with mythological creatures. The game is a card battler with elements of a role-playing visual novel, where the events taking place are demonstrated in the form of drawn anime art. Users will have to take control of rebel girls who have the power of the “Divine Soul,” which allows them to travel through different spaces. Players will be able to connect souls that resonate with each other to awaken God and deal with evil.

item.title: Mad Games Tycoon 2
item.description: Game Description Mad Games Tycoon 2 is a tycoon that takes you back to 1976, when the first game studios began to appear. Build your own studio and start developing games. Rent offices, install server rooms and improve production facilities. Try to develop the game of your dreams or create a next-generation console. Start your journey from a small garage company and grow into one of the most powerful corporations on the planet.

item.title: Merc Tactics
item.description: Game Description Tactical strategy Merc Tactics gives players the opportunity to control a small squad of fighters. Their task is to fight their way through an entire region to confront a huge number of militias. You will collect various weapons, armor and upgrades in locations. It is necessary to recruit new units into your squad and join forces with allied forces. Controlling your fighters in turn-based mode requires you to use cover and the environment to your advantage.

item.title: Mr. Magpie's Harmless Card Game
item.description: Game Description Mr. Magpie’s Harmless Card Game is a roguelike card game where the main goal is to defeat the boss piece. The process is built on a step-by-step system that forces you to calculate your chances of advancement. This card project takes place in a corporate environment with elements of psychological horror. Failure results in dismissal, signaling the end of that particular run. The central gameplay requires gamers to determine the level of risk for further progress.
